story:
Over 1000 people bought Pokeat on Kickstarter. If you missed it you can pledge for one here on Indiegogo !

Pokeat – a lunchbox without the bulk. But it's more than just a lunch box (well lunch bag really). It's an everyday pocket bag that takes up zero space in your bag so you can keep it with you for when you need.

It takes up zero space in your bag. Try that with a Tupperware lunch box.

 

Its leak proof food safe inner lining means you can use it for hot, cold wet or dry stuff which makes it great for kids packed lunches, sandwiches, dressed up salads, fruit salads, donuts and pastries. It's also great for takeaway foods as it is heat and leak proof.

 

It comes with cutlery in the bottom – chopsticks and a spoon so your ready to eat – no need to carry extra utensils or go searching for a spoon.

When finished just give it a wipe or a rinse if it needs a clean and roll it up, pop it in your bag/ pocket and go.

 

Use it instead of a plastic bag

Because of it's tiny size, you can carry it around everywhere and use it instead of a plastic bag. Next time you're in a shop and someone presents a plastic bag pull out your Pokeat and say 'no thanks, put it in my Pokeat instead'.

Great for Kids too !

Pokeat is not just for adults. Kids love Pokeat too. No more heavy bulky lunch boxes for them to lug home every day. Kid's just roll up their Pokeat, pop it in their jacket pocket and off they go.

It also makes great kids snack bags for long journeys too.

 

Optional Microwaveable Pouch

With our optional microwave pouch you can use this to make hot food in a microwave then pour the hot contents into your Pokeat and enjoy. (You can add this on after our campaign has finished for only US$9.00).

 

 

Eat healthier, more balanced, delicious foods at lunchtime with a Pokeat

 

 

 

 

 

Saves you money on takeaways and eatouts

that can cost up to 3x more than home prepared food. Use a Pokeat for lunch a few times a week and it will have paid for itself from the savings you make on takeaways.

 

Helps you reduce your plastic bag waste

Greener than plastic bags and it's reusable again and again. Use a Pokeat instead of plastic bags and Styrofoam lunch boxes. It's better for the environment and our oceans.

 

 

 

 

 

  • Zero bulk lunch box
  • Always handy and convenient
  • Versatile
  • Packs big
  • Leak proof food safe inner lining
  • Holds any kind of food
  • Microwave pouch for when you want hot foods
  • Lightweight
  • Chopsticks, spoon and fork included
  • Clips on anything
  • Easy to clean
  • and more
  • The zero bulk lunch box

 

Always handy & convenient

Because of its size you can keep a Pokeat with you in your pocket, handbag or backpack for when ever you need it. Getting a takeaway? Take it away in a Pokeat instead.

Versatile

Use it any way you want. It's great for:

 

  • kids school lunches
  • office breakfast
  • packed lunches
  • a takeaway lunch bag
  • a snack bag for the kids in the car or on a plane
  • a clip-on food and water pack for hiking
  • an air tight bag for donuts and pastries
  • a dog treat bag when walking the dog

 

 

 

 

Choose your colour

If we reach US$10,000 in pledges you will be able to choose from a range of colours from dark to light. Black, blue (dark and light), red, orange and Kickstarter green.

 

 

Material inner layer is made from 100% food-safe + toxin-free TPU

The outer layer material is toxin-free polyester

It is lighter than a wallet - only 40 grams

Open size is 15 cm 15 cm 27 cm

All fabrics inside and out are heat-resistant to 120 degrees C

It folds out to a large capacity of 3 Liters

story:
Lets Teach the World how to Juggle!

Hi, my name is Isaac Navias and I have been juggling since I was 11 years old. At age 15 I started teaching others how to juggle. Since then I have taught hundreds of people of all ages how to be awesome by juggling!

Now I am Pumped to teach YOU!

My goal with this project is to be able to offer my comprehensive juggling videos to the people for FREE! I had originally planned on retailing these videos for $24.99, but realized that my real goal was to pass on the joy of juggling to others. In order to do that I need YOUR help! For just $1 you will receive the Intro to Juggling Videos which brings you from 1 ball all the way to continuously juggling 3 balls.

  • You can help me greatly in this task by pledging just $1! The more funding I get the more time I can spend on new videos + hiring better video editors. When I get enough funding I will also get better equipment so I can offer better products to you!

  • Why am I so pumped to teach others how to juggle??! Well, juggling has greatly benefited me in my life in numerous ways! When I interviewed myself on how juggling has helped me I responded by saying “It's definitely helped me with other sports as my reaction time, hand-eye coordination, and problem solving skills were heightened due to my ability to juggle. Not only that, but since I started juggling at a young age it helped connect the right and left hemispheres of my brain so I could use my creativity and analytical skills simultaneously, which has helped me greatly in starting my own business.”

Juggling has been proven to improve multiple aspects of your life in a variety of ways.

  • Juggling has been proven to increase the amount of gray matter in the brain, which is responsible, in part, for forming new memories.

  • Juggling engages your problem-solving skills. 

  • Juggling maintains and increases range of motion in the arms and shoulders.

  • Juggling is one of the best ways to improve coordination, which can greatly help you in all other sports.

  • Juggling has even been shown to help people stop smoking by taking your mind off the cravings and replacing bad habits with good ones.

  • Ambidextrous activities such as juggling and playing musical instruments enhance whole brain thinking.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Since I want to offer this product for free all I am asking for is a $1 pledge in order to get access to 6 videos that will teach you how to juggle!

  • If just 500 people pledge $1 that will be enough for me to offer these for free to the public and enough seed money to begin working on my next video, basic 3 ball tricks!

The Impact

  • Juggling is not only fun and awesome to watch, but it is a healthy activity that can help engage both your mind and your body.

  • Each project I put out helps fund and build fans for the next project. My partner and I are working at making the world a more positive place and Indiegogo has been a great platform to help us! We have already run one successful Indiegogo Campaign where we helped fund the Single Mothers Association of Northern Ghana by providing fair trade value for their hand woven baskets.

  • You have nothing to lose! $1 will get you the full set of videos that will teach you how to juggle!

Risks & Challenges

  • My main risk is trying to make enough money because offering this product at a massive discount and want to still be able to fund future high quality juggling videos.

  • I am offering these videos to you at a 95% discount! So, in order for this to be successful I need a larger quantity of people to pledge.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • One of the biggest things you can do to help is to spread the word! You can share my Youtube video with this link,

  • Another HUGE help is when you use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of this page! This not only spreads the word, but it also helps boost my page ranking on Indiegogo.

story:
What is Pedal The Planet

I set out in February 2014 from Leitrim, Ireland to cycle 30,000km (18,000 Miles) around the world to help raise awareness for Suicide Prevention by sharing the message of Cycle Against Suicide - It's OK not to feel OK!

In eleven months I have completed over 19,000km (12,000 miles) so far through twenty three countries across Europe (Ireland -> Turkey), India (Mumbai -> Bangalore -> Kolkata), South East Asia (Bangkok -> Singapore), Australia (Perth -> Melbourne), New Zealand (Queenstown -> Auckland), America & Mexico

The Impact

In 2012, worldwide over 800,000 people took their own lives. Every day we read about murders and road traffic deaths in the papers, but we fail to talk about one of the biggest killers around. Suicide!

Depression and suicidal thoughts are treatable. Help is available from a variety of sources. We need to let people know that these options exist and point them in the correct direction

Four years ago, I was able to turn the direction of my life around simply by asking for assistance from my friends, family & colleagues. The support was then, and has been since, absolutely astounding. 

Every week this campaign reaches tens of thousands of people scattered around the globe with thousands of those people interacting regularly with Pedal The Planet through our social media.

How Can You Help

To help finance the final leg of the journey you can order a copy of the official Pedal The Planet book or documentary. (AVAILABLE: DECEMBER 2015)

Full details on each of these offers and others are listed to the right hand side of the page.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't in a position financially to purchase any of the rewards. There are two ways you can support this campaign

1. Follow or Like us on social media at Facebook, Twitter & Instagram

2. You can help simply by spreading the message using Facebook, Instagram & Twitter using the hashtag #PedalThePlanet and maybe with the power of a crowd we can help break the cycle of suicide.

3. Talk to your family, friends and loved ones, ask them how they are feeling and actually take a couple of minutes to actually listen and engage with their response.

If one person chooses to embrace live rather than the alternative, this entire campaign will be worthwhile.

Thank you in advance to everyone who supports this campaign. You have no idea of the difference this might make to a single person, their family, friends and community.

story:
Our backpacks and duffels...

1) Premium Quality. We use the highest quality 12oz waxed canvas and genuine leather. Our bags are designed to break in over time and withstand the toughest wear.

2) 25 Year Warranty. We're so confident that your Quarter Century bags will be the most durable set of duffels you've ever had that we're backing them up with a 25 year warranty.

3) 15 Amazing Features. We added many great features to our backpack and duffle including an easy-access laptop sleeve, RFID blocking pockets and much more.

4) 6 Colors & Wholesale Price. By offering the bags directly via Kickstarter we are able to offer 6 beautiful colors and cut out the retail channel to offer you a backpack that would usually retail for $350 at only $159 and duffel at $95.

Why is this "The Perfect Everyday Carry"?

We set out to make the most versatile yet minimal backpack and duffel collection on the planet. The Quarter Century Backpack and Duffle are made from durable 12oz waxed canvas that can pack a punch, and are then constructed with premium leather and hardware trimmings. They’re tough enough for outdoor adventures yet sophisticated and functional for the everyday workplace.

The best part of this set is how much it can do. We designed the bags with travel in mind, and tested them thoroughly in offices, airports, and many hikes through the Pacific Northwest. These backpacks and duffels are as functional and high quality as they are good-looking.

We’re so confident in the quality of these bags that we’re offering them with a 25-year warranty (it’s not called the Quarter Century Collection for nothing). If anything happens to your bags, send them back and we’ll repair it or replace it – that's a promise!

The Design Process

We tested a dozen samples before settling on the final version you see in this Kickstarter campaign. Many of these ideas for the collection came from creative sessions in our office, hours at our production workshop in our home state of California or traveling through airports and hikes in the Pacific Northwest. It's truly a travel set that we wanted to have and we think you'll love it too:

In order to give you an almost hands-on look of the design and quality of these bags we thought it'd be neat to use a stop motion to showcase all angles.

Both the duffel and the backpack are available in 6 colors - see details in "The Colors" section below:

Key Features

  • Premium waxed cotton canvas
  • Easy access laptop sleeve (top and side load)
  • RFID blocking security pocket
  • Large side pockets
  • Webbing holder for larger items
  • Comfort cushioned back
  • Heavy duty metal hardware
  • Genuine leather finishes
  • Security key holder
  • Adjustable straps

We designed the collection to fit our daily lives and frequent travel which means that we made our duffels large enough for an extended weekend trip but perfectly sized for your daily commute. The backpack has a capacity of 6.7 gallons and the duffel of 9 gallons.

The Colors

We are excited to offer The Quarter Century Collection in six beautiful colors: olive, tan, navy, charcoal, burgundy & black

 

The Price

For our early supporters, we are offering a Kickstarter early bird price at $159 for The Quarter Century Backpack and $95 for The Quarter Century Duffel including free shipping (US). Shipping to Canada is $20 and to the rest of the world $25.

The Reward Options

You can choose from a single duffel or backpack up to the double-double (the biggest savings). Every option allows you to pick the color of your choice. You can also add a reward to each of the ones listed below – if you want one backpack and two duffels, just pledge the sum of the two.

 

Who We Are

We are a small product team in Los Angeles, CA. Our journey is shaped by a radically new approach to everyday carry. It's the passion for minimal design, great functionality and superior quality that led us to design The Quarter Century Backpack & Duffel. We want to make quality products that will last you a lifetime and we need your support to bring these backpacks and duffels to life. Thank you! 

Press Information

High res photos here & press release here
story_txt:

story:
More information under our updates tab at the top of the page! 


INTRO

Rockyview Motorsports (RMP) is bringing a world-class European-style road course facility to Southern Alberta and Western Canada, to be located just east of Airdrie. We have engaged world-renowned German-based Tilke to design what will be one of the finest tracks in North America. 

RMP will be much more than a racetrack. Along with its 4 Km (2.5 Mi) road course, RMP will be home to:  

  • The first European-style advanced driver-training centre in Canada, providing a unique facility for all drivers to enhance their emergency handling skills
  • Recreational indoor and outdoor Kart tracks
  • A competition Kart track
  • The Calgary Police Services officer driver-training academy  
  • Restaurants and meeting facilities

THE BENEFITS

  • Improved driving skills (reducing accidents, saving lives and generally making our streets safer)
  • Provide a venue for motorsports
  • Minimized street racing (Friday night Secret Streets)
  • A safe and fun environment for the whole family
  • Direct economic benefit to the area
  • Increased tourism
  • Increased local employment 

DRIVER TRAINING CENTRE 

  • Through the use of slippery surfaces, water walls and skid plates, this training centre will teach drivers how to react to dangerous and unforeseen situations
  • The Driving Safety Centre is expected to reduce:

           o Accident & related injuries

           o Insurance claims

           o Stress and cost to the healthcare system


IMPORTANT PARTNERSHIPS

The Calgary Police Service 

  • The new officer driver training facility at RMP will allow the Calgary Police to meet the current and future needs of the service in terms of bringing high-level safety skills to the members


ENVIRONMENTAL AWARENESS

  • Rockyview Motorsports will be a showcase development for sustainability in Alberta
  • We will incorporate state-of-the-art technologies and methods for capturing and reusing storm and wastewater
  • Through the use of alternative energy and wetland research, we will strive to make our facilities carbon neutral

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET 

Rockyview Motorsports has been in the works for over two years. We have succeeded in securing the initial equity funds for our phase 1 build out; we have secured the land, invested in world-class designs, and planning. Extensive planning, studies, and reports have been undertaken and completed. Our Master Site Development Plan has been submitted to Rocky View County and we are now in the formal approval process stage. Now we need YOUR help.  Your pledges will prove to the County that this development has broad support. Your support will help fund our very important communications strategy.

This includes:

  • Public Open houses to communicate our plans and answer questions
  • One-on-one presentations with key individuals essential to the projects success
  • Engaging industry experts that will help us inform and educate interested parties on issues relating to RMP, including the economic and environmental benefits
  • Conduct a media campaign to publicize the benefits at RMP

                              THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!

                                     Lets make our roads safer.

         *All vouchers are subject to development approval of RMP which is expected towards the end of calendar year 2014 with construction occurring in calendar year 2015

        *All VIP gala party tickets are for you + a guest

TRACK AND PARK HIGHLIGHTS 

  • 4 Km (2.4 Mi) European-style road course
  • High speed straights
  • Multi-apex curve
  • Elevation changes 

MULTIPLE CONFIGURATIONS 

PLUS

  • Paddock / skills pad
  • Indoor / outdoor kart facilities
  • Auto-oriented services
  • Car condos & garages (vehicle storage units)
  • Community recreation area 

TIMELINE 

For a closer look at our timeline visit RMP Info Update page 22


SEE YOU AT THE PARK!
story_txt:
More information under our updates tab at the top of the page! 
INTRO
Rockyview Motorsports (RMP)
is bringing a world-class European-style road course facility to Southern
Alberta and Western Canada, to be located just east of Airdrie. We have engaged
world-renowned German-based Tilke to design what
will be one of the finest tracks in North America. 

RMP will be much more than a racetrack.
Along with its 4 Km (2.5 Mi) road course, RMP will be home to:   

The first European-style advanced driver-training centre in Canada, providing a unique facility
for all drivers to enhance their emergency handling skills

Recreational indoor
and outdoor Kart tracks

A competition Kart
track

The Calgary Police
Services officer driver-training academy  
Restaurants and
meeting facilities


THE BENEFITS

Improved driving
skills (reducing accidents, saving lives and generally
making our streets safer)

Provide a venue for
motorsports

Minimized street
racing (Friday night Secret Streets)

A safe and fun
environment for the whole family

Direct economic
benefit to the area

Increased tourism

Increased local
employment 

DRIVER TRAINING CENTRE 
Through the use of slippery surfaces, water walls and skid plates, this training centre will teach drivers how to react to dangerous and unforeseen situations
The Driving Safety Centre is expected to reduce:
           o Accident & related injuries           o Insurance claims           o Stress and cost to the healthcare systemIMPORTANT PARTNERSHIPSThe Calgary Police Service 

The new officer driver
training facility at RMP will allow the Calgary Police to meet the current and
future needs of the service in terms of bringing high-level safety skills to
the members

ENVIRONMENTAL AWARENESS

Rockyview Motorsports
will be a showcase development for sustainability in Alberta

We will incorporate
state-of-the-art technologies and methods for capturing and reusing storm and wastewater

Through the use of
alternative energy and wetland research, we will strive to make our facilities carbon
neutral



WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET 
Rockyview Motorsports
has been in the works for over two years. We have succeeded in securing the initial
equity funds for our phase 1 build out; we have secured the land, invested in world-class
designs, and planning. Extensive planning, studies, and reports have been
undertaken and completed. Our Master Site Development Plan has been submitted
to Rocky View County and we are now in the formal approval process stage. Now we need YOUR help.  Your
pledges will prove to the County that this development has broad support. Your
support will help fund our very important communications strategy. 
This includes: 

Public Open houses to
communicate our plans and answer questions

One-on-one
presentations with key individuals essential to the projects success

Engaging industry
experts that will help us inform and educate interested parties on issues
relating to RMP, including the economic and environmental benefits

Conduct a media
campaign to publicize the benefits at RMP


                              THANK YOU FOR YOUR
SUPPORT!! 
                                     Lets
make our roads safer. 


         *All
vouchers are subject to development approval of RMP which is expected towards the end of calendar year 2014 with construction occurring in calendar year 2015        *All VIP gala party tickets are for you + a guest
TRACK AND PARK HIGHLIGHTS 


4 Km (2.4 Mi)
European-style road course

High speed straights

Multi-apex curve

Elevation changes 


MULTIPLE CONFIGURATIONS 

PLUS

Paddock / skills pad

Indoor / outdoor kart
facilities

Auto-oriented services

Car condos &
garages (vehicle storage units)

Community recreation
area 

TIMELINE 
For a closer look at our timeline visit RMP Info Update page 22SEE YOU AT THE PARK!

story:
êkö is live on KickStarter:

http://kck.st/3s8q6De 

As of 1/22/2021 we are up to 110 KickStarter Backers from around the world.

Many Thanks!

1k of the Core êkö Cutlery Kits are made, ready-to-ship, to customers from our San Francisco, CA office. 2020 was a rollercoaster year for êkö product development, manufacturing, & logistics beset with challenges & delays since êkö is custom-designed & brand new. êkö was supposed be ready by August 2020 but due to manufacturing and logistical delays beyond our control we just received the first 1k shipment at the very end of last year.

That said, êkö was in a way "soft-launched" to mostly family and friends on IndieGoGo since the shipping dates along with product development was challenging in 2020.  2021 will be better!

 

Short Summary

EkoWareUSA® makes handy eco-friendly products. Our first launch is an ultra-portable eco-friendly flatware kit with clip-on wooden handles and a linen pouch. The idea came during a dive trip in SE Asia with eco-minded friends as a way to curb our reliance on single-use products which often ends up as pollution, or worse, in our oceans. We strive to help change this. êkö is also a safety measure during COVID for peace-of-mind whilst eating-out anytime, anywhere. 

*If you'd like to pick up your order in San Francisco, CA we'll refund the shipping charge. Just contact us to arrange day, time, and location


Product Description:  The êkö flatware kit is designed to be a portable sustainable alternative to single-use flatware. It's also a COVID measure. The food-grade 304 stainless steel fork  and spoon set has grips slots that could also lock-in optional clip-on handles with a click of a button.  The Core êkö Kit is the  most compact offering while the Premium êkö Kit includes additional clip-on handles extension attachments. The flatware integrates soft serrations that can cut through cooked foods for both lefties and righties. A soft linen roll-up pouch wraps the kit small enough to fit easily into a pocket, bag, or purse. The product is patent pending and trademarked.

We are based in San Francisco, CA, USA. 

What We Need & What You Get

EKO up and running! Hardware tooling and the carrying pouch are produced in Asia and we're making the handles here in San Francisco, CA. An initial production run of 1020 sets with pouches have been completed but some post-production finishing is needed and the optional clip-on handle tooling has to be slightly reconfigured. 

The êkö concept, at its core, was originally designed to be a versatile compact personal cutlery kit as a convenient everyday carry solution. As such, our Core êkö Kit includes:

The Premium êkö Cutlery Kit below will include clip-on handles extensions crafted from lacquered wood and industrial plant-based plastic.

 

The clip-on addition snaps into the metal êkö slots for compact carry and eating modes.  êkö slots lock-in handle extensions of different materials and lengths sold separately.

êkö R&D has been bootstrapped this past year with support from our friends, brand ambassadors, and manufacturing partners. Our goal is to make a sustainable, quality eating experience and form alliances with eco-friendly business partnerships in helping reduce our reliance on single-use flatware to help combat climate change. 

 

The Impact

Global Climate Change is real. êkö is designed as a sustainable alternative in a compact, re-usable, eco-friendly, stylish solution compared to disposable single-use flatware.

  • The average American uses 240+ disposable single-use flatware a year. 
  • 1/3 of recyclable and compostable flatware ends up as litter or landfill. 
  • Biodegradable flatware requires an additional industrial process to degrade.
  • Wood flatware uses trees and is leaves a high carbon footprint for a single-use item.
  • Millions of pieces of single-use cutlery are made each year.

êkö is also a COVID-19 safety measure. As restaurants slowly open, bringing your own (BYO) everyday carry (EDC) personal êkö decreases potential virus/bacteria contact tracing.

  • êkö is can be washed with soap and water or wiped down with wipes or napkins.
  • The linen êkö pouch is machine or hand-washable..  

Risks & Challenges

The first 1020 stainless steel êkö cutlery sets and pouches are ready to go.  However, the crafted wood clip-on handles require hand finishing and assembling at our SF, CA workshop until we can get the funding necessary produce more handles at scale.

The process involves crafting the handles by laser cutting/engraving gorgeous real wood, 3d printing with PLA+ industrial grade plant-based filament, wood sanding/lacquering, and bonding of components.  Each initial êkö kit will come with 2 clip on handles. Additional handle options, upgrades, and replacements will be available for sale on our online storefront. êkö can be used without the clip-on handles, however, and in different carry configurations to make it more versatile in suiting your tastes as an everyday carry personal portable essential.

  • 1020 êkö metal sets with pouches are now in production. 
  • Crafted Wood clip-on handles are made in SF, CA, USA for first 200 sets.
  • Your contribution will go to funding tooling/production of handles at scale & lower cost.
  • Clip-on Handle upgrades and replacements will be made available via our online store.

Other Ways You Can Help

Any help via a donation or shout-out to our campaign and cause would be appreciated.  Our goal is to help reduce the consumption, carbon footprint, and pollution that single-use disposable flatware poses to our environment in curbing climate change. 

  • Help in your own way and bring-you-own cutlery #saynotosingleuse 
  • Please Share in our endeavor to make a more sustainable world
  • Follow us on Instagram @ekoware.usa  or FaceBook FB @ekowareusa

The process involves crafting the handles by laser cutting/engraving gorgeous real wood, 3d printing with PLA+ industrial grade plant-based filament, wood sanding/lacquering, and bonding of components.  Each initial êkö kit will come with 2 clip on handles. Additional handle options, upgrades, and replacements will be available for sale on our online storefront. êkö can be used without the clip-on handles, however, and in different carry configurations to make it more versatile in suiting your tastes as an everyday carry personal portable essential.

1020 êkö metal sets with pouches are now in production. 
Crafted Wood clip-on handles are made in SF, CA, USA for first 200 sets.
Your contribution will go to funding tooling/production of handles at scale & lower cost.
Clip-on Handle upgrades and replacements will be made available via our online store.


Other Ways You Can Help
Any help via a donation or shout-out to our campaign and cause would be appreciated.  Our goal is to help reduce the consumption, carbon footprint, and pollution that single-use disposable flatware poses to our environment in curbing climate change. 

Help in your own way and bring-you-own cutlery #saynotosingleuse 
Please Share in our endeavor to make a more sustainable world
Follow us on Instagram @ekoware.usa  or FaceBook FB @ekowareusa

story:
INTRODUCING OUR NEW OUTERWEAR COLLECTION

Cortazu creates the highest-quality outerwear and sells it straight from the manufacturer to you. We're happy to introduce our new lightweight high-performance jackets, including all the features you need to embrace the outdoors. 

We like to call them outdoor essentials, made for all seasons: The Shell, The Layer and The Stretch. 

VERIFIED REVIEWS - THE CUSTOMER IS KING!

This is our third Indiegogo project and we have delivered thousands of products all over the world. Feedback has been incredible and we couldn't have arrived here without the Indiegogo community. 

LET'S INTRODUCE OUR NEW HIGH-PERFORMANCE JACKETS 

We used our passion for the outdoors and 40+ years of experience in outerwear production to create the perfect jacket. Made for all seasons. Ready for any adventure. 

 

THE SHELL - OUTSTANDING DESIGN & SMART DETAILS

We're proud to introduce our third 3-layer shell jacket, containing 20+ features all in one jacket. Check it out below.


THE CORTAZU JACKET VS. ARC'TERYX AND NORRONA

A picture is worth a thousand words. Let us show you why we believe the Cortazu Outerwear Shell can easily compete with the best in the industry.

OUR REVOLUTIONARY FABRIC        

Dermizax®EV - The perfect membrane that redefines comfort and protection for high-performance fabrics.

Created with proprietary technology in Japan and designed to protect you in all weather conditions.

 

WHY THIS FABRIC?

Dermizax®EV is a 100% waterproof, windproof and breathable membrane (fabric). Specifically developed to provide maximum protection against all kinds of demanding activities and weather conditions.

It's a durable and lightweight 3-layer fabric that can be washed like any other textiles. The perfect fabric for our collection of High-Performance jackets.

Besides waterproofness, we highly value the fabric's exceptional breathability.

See below how the Dermizax membrane compares to other high-performance fabrics.

THE LAYER - YOUR NEW BEST FRIEND IN EVERY SEASON

Perfect for any occasion, whether it's spring, autumn or a chilly summer day. This lightly insulated jacket is lightweight, breathable and easy to pack.


THE CORTAZU LAYER VS. ARC'TERYX AND THE NORTH FACE

A picture is worth a thousand words. Let us show you why we believe the Cortazu Outerwear Layer can easily compete with the best in the industry.


 

THE STRETCH - FOR YOUR ACTIVE ADVENTURES       

This lightweight jacket feels like a second skin. It's made of a fourway stretch fabric, it's durable and offers ultimate comfort. It will keep you warm during an active day in nature or the city. Whether you ride a bike in the mountains or take your kayak to the river. We believe it's a must have for every outdoor enthusiast 


 

THE CORTAZU STRETCH VS. ARC'TERYX AND NORRONA

A picture is worth a thousand words. Let us show you why we believe the Cortazu Outerwear Stretch can easily compete with the best in the industry.

FOR MEN AND WOMEN

Cortazu creates the highest-quality outerwear and sells it straight from the manufacturer to you. We're happy to introduce our new lightweight high-performance jackets, including all the features you need to embrace the outdoors.

We like to call them outdoor essentials, made for all seasons: The Shell, The Layer and The Stretch.

ALL BLACK - Pre-order at the top of this page for €329

LIGHT GREY - Pre-order at the top of this page for €329

BLUE - Pre-order at the top of this page for €329

Burgundy - Pre-order at the top of this page for €329

Dark Green - Pre-order at the top of this page for €329


THE LAYER COLLECTION 


THE STRETCH COLLECTION


REWARDS

See our packages below to find out everything you need to know.

*NOTE: you'll choose the model, size and color after the campaign has ended.

TIMELINE 

After our 2nd Indiegogo campaign, we delivered 2500+ packages to backers living all over the world. As this is our 3rd Indiegogo campaign we are 100% sure to do so again in 2019 and we will make sure each backer becomes a happy owner of their ordered Cortazu Outerwear products.

All production lines have already been reserved which guarantees us output on time, according to the timeline below.

 

SIZE CHART 

After your pledge on Indiegogo we'll contact you within 1 week to help you select the right size and color.

Nevertheless, below you can find our size chart to already measure your chest, waist and hips. This will help you to choose that one size that fits you best.

 

WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS SAY ABOUT CORTAZU

 

ARE YOU READY TO JOIN US?

This is us, rocking the Cortazu jacket! We are passionate skiers and outdoor enthusiasts with an extensive background in clothing production, fashion and entrepreneurship.

As the founders of Sqetch.co Wiebe and Wouter have helped hundreds of fashion brands and clothing suppliers to grow their business.

Herman has been working in the field of clothing production for 40+ years and is the owner of Vert Company, a true pioneer in sustainable production.

We're on a mission to create lasting outdoor experiences and re-green our planet. That's why we partnered up with Justdiggit and started to cool down the planet. For every jacket sold we re-green 50m2 of land on the foot of the Kilimanjaro (Tanzania) to reduce global warming.

At Cortazu you don't buy to get, you buy to give.

OUR DESIGN PROCESS

This is outerwear you are going to love, so we want to make sure it lasts.

Together with the most respected manufacturers in the industry we are ready for our second collection.

Highest quality products, outstanding design and build to last.

EXCELLENT VALUE: SELLING STRAIGHT FROM THE MANUFACTURER

By using a disruptive direct-to-consumer model, and cutting out the middlemen, we can offer our products for an exceptionally reduced price while maintaining the same high-quality standards as leading industry brands.

SPECIAL THANKS

Our first early supporting backers from our 1st and 2nd Indiegogo :)

Video & Photography credits: VISUALCHEFS - Creative Film Company. In particular, #janfillem, #stefanjansen, #visualentrepreneur and #woeiman

Product photography credits: Thomas van Schaik 

Design: Ivan Pashchenko

Cortazu superstars: Ioanna Zygogianni, Alex Cheuk, Laura Smetsers

AND OF COURSE..

We would love to thank our family and friends for their support during the Cortazu journey so far, we couldn't have done it without you!

Let's hope together we can make this a huge success!

This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped 5,000+ creators make their projects a reality, raising over $200MM through crowdfunding.

story:
Remember Jessi Evans

My name is Amber Handler.  I am the cousin of Jessi Evans. 

Jessi Evans, 17, of Norris City IL was murdered while on a fishing trip with her boyfriend on the weekend of August 26, 2012 . Her boyfriend was also murdered on this trip.

This campaign is to raise money for Jessi’s mom to help her with funeral expenses and to pay for the time she needs off from her job for emotional healing.  By contributing to this fund you will be helping out a mother who has tragically lost her daughter. The local community has started fundraisers to help Jessi's mom, but we wanted those who have heard about her story from afar to be able to help as well. 

She was born February 10, 1995 in Fairfield, IL. Jessi was entering her senior year of high school at NCOE. Jessi was a talented artist and loving aunt with many aspirations. She is loved and will be missed by the community, her friends and family. She was a wonderful light to all who met her, and her smile could brighten a room.

Jessi is survived by her mother Kris Evans, sister Megan Evans, nephew Miles Herrington, brother Ryan Evans, grandparents Jolean and Wesley Buzun, and grandparents Linda and Randal Godfrey, and many family and friends who miss her dearly.

We need around $2,000 in order to complete the burial costs for Jessi.  These funds will be going directly to Campbell Funeral Home in Norris City, IL and to Jessi’s mom. All monies raised beyond the funeral costs will go to Jessi's mother to be used how she needs

Even if you can't give, please help us get the word out. We can't bring Jessi back, but hopefully we can make the financial burden a little easier for her mother.

We need the money soon, so please use the tools on the Indiegogo website to spread the word!

She is loved and will be missed by the community, her friends and family. She was a wonderful light to all who met her, and her smile could brighten a room.Jessi is survived by her mother Kris Evans, sister Megan Evans, nephew Miles Herrington, brother Ryan Evans, grandparents Jolean and Wesley Buzun, and grandparents Linda and Randal Godfrey, and many family and friends who miss her dearly.
We need around $2,000 in order to complete the burial costs for Jessi.  These funds will be going directly to Campbell Funeral Home in Norris City, IL and to Jessi’s mom. All monies raised beyond the funeral costs will go to Jessi's mother to be used how she needs
Even if you can't give, please help us get the word out. We can't bring Jessi back, but hopefully we can make the financial burden a little easier for her mother.
We need the money soon, so please use the tools on the Indiegogo website to spread the word!

story:
¿Qué es "citysense/mag"?


El día 15 de Octubre dio comienzo nuestro viaje fotográfico a través de Santo Domingo (Rep. Dominicana) y San José (Costa Rica). Éstas serán las dos primeras etapas del proyecto "citysense/mag". 

"citysense/mag" es una revista fotográfica de viajes que tiene como protagonistas los habitantes de las ciudades que visitamos, sus historias y sus experiencias. 

Somos un equipo internacional formado por 4 fotógrafos profesionales: Joana, Roberto, Andrea y Klaudia. Nos conocimos este año en una de las mejores escuelas de fotografía de España y nuestra intención es crear algo a partir de la pasión que compartimos por los viajes, la fotografía y el periodismo.

En el contexto actual del mundo de la fotografía, en el que es cada vez más difícil encontrar un trabajo, hemos decidido crear nuestra propia revista para poder lograr el sueño de viajar por el mundo con nuestras cámaras. 

Cada número de "citysense/mag" recopilará las historias de los habitantes de una ciudad. El primer número de la revista estará dedicado a Santo Domingo, capital de la República Dominicana, y saldrá en el mes de Enero de 2014. El segundo número estará dedicado a San José de Costa Rica, y está previsto que salga en Marzo de 2014.

Desde nuestro blog http://citysensemag.wordpress.com podrás seguir día a día nuestro proceso de trabajo así como nuestras experiencias.

 

What is "citysense/mag"?

On October 15th began our photographic journey through Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic and San José, Costa Rica, which comprise the first two phases of the "citisense/mag" project.

"citysense/mag" is a photographic travel magazine which has as its lead characters the inhabitants of the cities which we visit, together with their stories and experiences.

We are an international team of photographers formed by four professional photographers: Joana, Roberto, Andrea and Klaudia. We met this year (2013) in one of the best photography schools in Spain and our intention is to create something from the passion we share for travel, photography and journalism.

In today's world of photography, in which it is becoming more and more difficult to get employment, we have decided to create our own magazine in order to fulfill our dream of traveling the world with our cameras.

Each issue of "citysense/mag" will gather the stories of the inhabitants of a city. The first issue will be dedicated to Santo Domingo, capital of the Dominican Republic, and will be issued in January, 2014. The second issue will be dedicated to San José, the capital of Costa Rica, and it is expected to be released in March, 2014.

In our blog http://citysensemag.wordpress.com you can follow our work process as well as our experiences.

 

/

 

¿Que necesitamos?


Hemos abierto esta página de crowdfunding para apoyar económicamente en la producción y ejecución de la primera fase de nuestro proyecto.

Esta financiación servirá para ayudarnos con la impresión de las revistas, con posibles aplicaciones multimedia y con diferentes gastos relacionados con el equipo técnico.

Según sea tu contribución podrás recibir diferentes recompensas, desde postales con nuestras fotos enviadas directamente desde las ciudades en las que nos encontramos, hasta las copias impresas de la revista. Si eres una empresa, una asociación, un centro educativo o una ONG y estas interesado en apoyar nuestro proyecto, ofrecemos también la posibilidad de poner tu logo en nuestro blog, en la revista y en los vídeos realizados durante los viajes. También incluiremos en nuestro blog algunos posts dedicados a tu empresa o asociación.

 

Con nuestro budget inicial llegaremos a concluir el viaje el 15 de Diciembre en San José de Costa Rica. A partir de entonces empezará la fase de postproducción e impresión de la revista. 

Con los fondos que vamos a recaudar no pensamos alojarnos en un hotel 5 estrellas ni tampoco salir a comer langosta, sino que serán utilizados para cubrir los gastos del seguro del equipo, para el tiraje de las primeras copias de la revista y para la creación de posibles aplicaciones multimedia.

 

Hemos optado por una financiación flexible, es decir, que si no llegamos al objetivo de 4000€ que hemos fijado, obtendremos igualmente las recaudaciones y adaptaremos el tipo de seguro y el numero de copias impresas al budget logrado. 

 

 

What do we need?

We have opened this crowdfunding page in order to support economically the first production and execution of the first phase of our project. This financing will serve to help us with the printing of magazines, possible multimedia applications, and with expenses related to technical equipment.

As a contributor, you can receive different rewards according to your donation. These can range from postcards containing our photos and which we will mail to you from the city where we currently are working, to actual printed copies of the magazine. If you represent a business, an association, an education institution, or an NGO and you are interested in supporting our project, we also offer the opportunity to place your logo in our blog, our magazine, as well as on the videos made during our travels. We will also include in our blog some posts dedicated to your business our association. We plan to conclude our first trip, with the help of our initial budget, on December 15th in San José, Costa Rica. From the on, the post-production and printing phases of the magazine will begin.

With these funds which we will gather, we are not planning to stay in five-star hotels or eat lobster every day! They will rather be used for insuring our equipment, for printing the first issues of the magazine, and for creating possible multimedia applications.

We have chosen a flexible financing goal, meaning, that if we do not reach our set goal of 4000€, we will likewise keep the donations and then adapt the insurance and number of printed copies to the achieved budget.

 

/

 

¿Por qué "citysense/mag"?


La revista "citysense/mag" está pensada para dar a conocer la forma de vida en diferentes ciudades del mundo a través de las historias de las personas que en ellas viven. Queremos enseñar la realidad de un punto de vista social, casi antropológico, de las personas comunes y corrientes que viven en las ciudades en la actualidad. 

¿Cómo vive una peluquera de Santo Domingo?, ¿Como es el trabajo de un taxista de San José?, ¿Cuales son los problemas de un estudiante de Hong Kong? Nuestro objetivo es responder este tipo de preguntas.

 

Why "citysense/mag"?

"citysense/mag" was conceived as a magazine dedicated to sharing the way of life in different cities of the world through the stories of the people that live in each of them. We want to show reality from a social, quasi-anthropological perspective of the common people that currently live in these cities.

How does a hairdresser live in Santo Domingo? How is a taxicab driver's job in San José? What are the problems of a Hong Kong student? Our goal is to answer these kinds of questions.

 

/

 

Otras formas de apoyarnos


A todos los que hayáis tenido la paciencia de leer hasta aquí, os agradecemos el haber dedicado un poco de vuestro tiempo para conocer nuestro proyecto. Estaremos infinitamente agradecidos con vuestra contribución, y si no podéis contribuir directamente también nos sería de gran ayuda si pudierais dar a conocer este proyecto a tus amigos, familiares o colaboradores que en tu opinión pudieran estar interesados en conocer ciudades a través de nuestra revista. 

Que la aventura comience!!!!

 

Other ways of supporting us

To those of you who have been patient enough to read this far, thank you for dedicating some of your time to get to know our project! We will be immensely grateful with your contribution and, if you cannot yourself contribute, please help us spread the word about our project to your friends, family and/or coworkers, as well as to anyone who might be interested to get to know the cities of the world though our magazine.

Let the adventure begin!!

 

//

story:
Our Story

The Carleton University Quidditch team was founded in January 2010 by Andrea Hill, and was the first quidditch team to form in Ontario. Since its inception, the team has grown by leaps and bounds - this year we were able to create two competitive teams, and our A team finished second at the Canadian Cup after finally overcoming our long-time rivals, McGill, in the semi-finals. 

Carleton qualified for the World Cup last year but was unable to attend due to conflicts with exam schedules. After qualifying again this year, we're determined to make our way down to Myrtle Beach and are training harder than ever to make Canada proud at the World Cup in April! However, we need your help to get there. Every little bit helps and we will be extremely grateful for anything that you can contribute.


What We Need & What You Get

With expenses to cover for plane tickets, hotel rooms, and tournament transportation, the costs of competing in the World Cup add up quickly. Our total projected costs for the tournament are about $12 000, or about $550 per person for our 21-player competitive roster. Raising $2500 through Indiegogo will allow us to subsidize these costs by at least $100 per player, which will cover our players' hotel costs. Any money raised above our goal will help to cover travel expenses.

We have a number of items available to thank you for your support, such as buttons, t-shirts, jerseys, and even handmade ornaments!

You also get to see us perform the 'Screaming Eagle' play, trust us, its totally worth it. It will also be Canadian beach weather during World Cup, so you'll get to see 4 Canadian teams running for the water.


The Impact

Your support will help to ensure the presence of Canadian teams at World Cup, and the continued growth of quidditch in Canada!

Also you can make a whole lot of new Canadian friends! We're the best kind of friends!

No seriously, we'll love you forever...ok, maybe not forever, but for a reasonable time.


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Share our campaign everywhere you can
  • Drag your friends who can donate here! Bring the sacrifices!

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
The Cause:

Access to solar lighting is so important to rural areas. Solar lighting replaces inefficient, expensive kerosene lamps which most Tanzanians are reliant upon. These lamps are dangerous and a respiratory hazard. Nobody should have to jeopardize their health when turning on a light!


The Difference You Make:

Ninty-five percent of rural households in Tanzania have no electricity at all.  A single solar-electric LED lighting kit has an immediate, immensely positive effect.

We will demonstrate this change; the health, economic, educational and environmental benefits a family experiences.  Our goal is to raise awareness of the importance of solar energy for the families of rural Tanzania, and help the international community understand how we can implement positive change.


About Myself:    

My name is Anna Geyer.  I am a film and video maker.  I make both commercial instructional videos and 16mm experimental films. My films have screened in numerous festivals internationally. I have been asked to shoot this piece and am looking forward to the experience. 


What Your Money Does:

The video will inform the audience about the challenges of life in a rural Tanzanian village and the extent to which solar energy can provide solutions.

When I was asked by Africa Solar Fund to shoot this piece, I immediately became excited. This is an opportunity to  share an unknown story with the rest of the world and in doing so people will learn how they can make a difference. It’s an issue to which a simple solution already exists.

  

Awareness of Africa Solar Fund is paramount to its fundraising goals.  Africa Solar Fund awards and administers grants to support East African nonprofit organizations working with villagers, healthcare clinics, hospitals, schools and other public and private institutions.



The Budget Will Cover: 

1)   Airfare and travel and expenses.        

2)   Hiring a local production crew.

3)   Equipment rental, insurance and shooting expenses.


The production itself should be challenging, and I’m up for it! We plan to shoot over a five-day period. All local personnel will receive payment.  I will travel with a minimum of equipment but must prepare for having little access to electricity.

 

Stretch Goal:    

 When our goal is met the surplus will be applied to the cost of post-production and then to provide solar lights to Tanzanian families.


What You Can Do:

Join me! Support is important — please tell your friends about this campaign. Share it through your social networks!

story:
~Friends of Springwater Provincial Park Needs Your Help~

 

Short Summary

I have lived in Barrie for most of my 43 years. In that time I have many fond memories of spending time at Springwater Park. As of April 2013 the Government is planning on closing this park.

Springwater Provincial Park also has several orphaned, injured and misplaced animals that cannot survive in the wild and have been given a second chance on life.

My goal is to raise awareness and funds to stop the government from closing this gem and to bring the public to this wonderfull park located in Midhurst ON Canada.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise awareness and funding to not only save the park and the animals but to educate people through social media, flyers, town hall meetings, silent auctions ect.

I'm also raising funds on my Facebook page Focus of Nature. I have hundreds of nature and wildlife photos for sale, many taken at the park. When you purchase one of my photo's a portion of the proceeds will go to this campaign.

The Impact

We can not allow the government to take this particular park away from us.

We ALL have a responsabillity to look after and protect these areas full of nature, wildlife, peace and serenity.

Other Ways You Can Help

Besides making a monatary donation you can also volunteer your time and expertise by helping with...

  • Fund raising / Public awareness
  • Educating the public
  • Handing out flyers
  • Speaking at public events
  • Donating items for silent auction
  • Car pooling for the public to visit the park.

 

Remember every little bit helps and is greatly appreciated!

story:
Love Bought- Orphan Revolution

Love Bought International is an organization started with the sole intent of changing the world...through helping the poor. We believe Love paid a price that made us all valuable yet equal. Everyone has intrinsic value and deserves to be appreciated and valued. Love Bought International has started an Orphan Revolution. Our goal is to turn orphans into Sons and Daughters.

Love Bought is lead by Mike & Lidiette Rosas...along with a team of world changers who are too numerous to mention but the work could not be done without them. GOD has put it on our hearts to fight for the orphan and help save their lives. We are a 501c3 organization in good status with the IRS. Our hearts are drawn to Colombia because of their massive need, over 500,000 orphans, and the fact that they have been in a 40 year civil war. With the need so great we tend to ask, "What can I really do?" Eventually we have to come to the reality that regardless of how big or small the impact, we must do something.

We began 7 years ago with a soup kitchen in Bogota, Colombia feeding and educating up to 125 children a day. As we saw the children grow, we noticed they'd stop coming to our soup kitchen as they approached their teen years. Soon after many would become village prostitutes and even get recruited by the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia (FARC). We felt like more had to be done to ensure these children would grow up better than what their surroundings offered and taught them. Giving the children a full time home was our only logical option to help them get out of the cycle of death that they were in.

The Goal

Our goal is to build an orphanage and school for 400+ children. Last November, we  put a $25,000 down payment on 5 1/2 acres of land in Tunja, Colombia just north of Bogota. The owners of the land have graciously given us 8 months to pay off the debt. Since the down payment was given we have raised an additional $50,000 which leaves us with a remaining balance of $125,000 due by April 30th. 100% of your donations will be used to pay off the balance of the land. Our Indiegogo goal of $20,000 in conjunction with other fundraisers will help us pay off the land in full!! 

The Impact

Paying off the land will allow us to commence the building phase which over time will take 400+ children off the streets and give them a home. In Colombia the orphans are known to many as "The Disposables"...our goal is to show them how valuable they are by giving them the home and love they desperately long for. There are millions of orphans around the world, a problem which seems impossible to solve. However, the truth is that these children are individuals and not just a statistic. You may think of this as a project to house 400+ orphans, but rather think of it as John, Suzie, Michael and Sarah being swept up and rescued of the streets! For us it's not just about doing a good deed, but saving a life. This is our life's work! We will stop at nothing to help the poor, the orphan, the forgotten and the unloved. Were not this multi-billion dollar corporation. Were just a couple of people who are crazy enough to think we can change the world!

The Truth

In all honesty were in over our heads! There's a problem here that is much bigger than us...but we can't just sit around waiting to be qualified to help. These children need us. We feel like with GOD and your help, we can change the world. We have no other option that to succeed. This amount of money is more than we have ever raised in a year, but we won't let that stop us. We've seen these children on the streets and in the sewers. We can't just go back to our regularly scheduled lives and act like nothing ever happened. We just can't...

How You Can Help


  • Your financial donation OF ANY AMOUNT will help us pay off the land and further the work to save these children.
  • Not everybody has money and we understand that, but you can still help with the Orphan Revolution. Spreading the word or forwarding this link will help bring awareness to the cause and unite other people with hearts to change the world.
story_txt:
Love Bought- Orphan Revolution Love Bought International is an organization started with the sole intent of changing the world...through helping the poor. We believe Love paid a price that made us all valuable yet equal. Everyone has intrinsic value and deserves to be appreciated and valued. Love Bought International has started an Orphan Revolution. Our goal is to turn orphans into Sons and Daughters.
Love Bought is lead by Mike & Lidiette Rosas...along with a team of world changers who are too numerous to mention but the work could not be done without them. GOD has put it on our hearts to fight for the orphan and help save their lives. We are a 501c3 organization in good status with the IRS. Our hearts are drawn to Colombia because of their massive need, over 500,000 orphans, and the fact that they have been in a 40 year civil war. With the need so great we tend to ask, "What can I really do?" Eventually we have to come to the reality that regardless of how big or small the impact, we must do something.
We began 7 years ago with a soup kitchen in Bogota, Colombia feeding and educating up to 125 children a day. As we saw the children grow, we noticed they'd stop coming to our soup kitchen as they approached their teen years. Soon after many would become village prostitutes and even get recruited by the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia (FARC). We felt like more had to be done to ensure these children would grow up better than what their surroundings offered and taught them. Giving the children a full time home was our only logical option to help them get out of the cycle of death that they were in.   The Goal
Our goal is to build an orphanage and school for 400+ children. Last November, we  put a $25,000 down payment on 5 1/2 acres of land in Tunja, Colombia just north of Bogota. The owners of the land have graciously given us 8 months to pay off the debt. Since the down payment was given we have raised an additional $50,000 which leaves us with a remaining balance of $125,000 due by April 30th. 100% of your donations will be used to pay off the balance of the land. Our Indiegogo goal of $20,000 in conjunction with other fundraisers will help us pay off the land in full!!    The Impact Paying off the land will allow us to commence the building phase which over time will take 400+ children off the streets and give them a home. In Colombia the orphans are known to many as "The Disposables"...our goal is to show them how valuable they are by giving them the home and love they desperately long for. There are millions of orphans around the world, a problem which seems impossible to solve. However, the truth is that these children are individuals and not just a statistic. You may think of this as a project to house 400+ orphans, but rather think of it as John, Suzie, Michael and Sarah being swept up and rescued of the streets! For us it's not just about doing a good deed, but saving a life. This is our life's work! We will stop at nothing to help the poor, the orphan, the forgotten and the unloved. Were not this multi-billion dollar corporation. Were just a couple of people who are crazy enough to think we can change the world!   The Truth In all honesty were in over our heads! There's a problem here that is much bigger than us...but we can't just sit around waiting to be qualified to help. These children need us. We feel like with GOD and your help, we can change the world. We have no other option that to succeed. This amount of money is more than we have ever raised in a year, but we won't let that stop us. We've seen these children on the streets and in the sewers. We can't just go back to our regularly scheduled lives and act like nothing ever happened. We just can't...   How You Can Help
  Your financial donation OF ANY AMOUNT will help us pay off the land and further the work to save these children. Not everybody has money and we understand that, but you can still help with the Orphan Revolution. Spreading the word or forwarding this link will help bring awareness to the cause and unite other people with hearts to change the world.

story: California or BUST!!! To our extended family. We have decided to send Nana/Winnie to San Francisco with Cindy Houser and Martha FitzGerald for her 95th birthday. We thought it would be amazing for her to experience wine country with two of her daughters. For those of you who can’t make it to her gathering in July or those who just do not know what to get for someone who is 95 years old, this is the perfect birthday gift to pitch in on. Total cost with airfare, food, lodging, winery tour, etc. is $1000. I am setting up a fundraising account for her where you can make a contribution for your family accompanied by birthday wishes. If a few of us pitch in between $50-100 per family, as we did for her Ireland trip, I think we can easily reach our goal. Please note, there is no minimum that families have to contribute. Any contribution will be appreciated. Any extra money will be given to her in cash for spending or whatever she likes. I will purchase a card and every family who was able to participate will be mentioned on the card. I will have the funding site set up in a few days so please keep your eyes open for it. Thanks!

story:
Show your support for Hilwan, who’s taking on earth’s highest mountain with Team Everest (Singapore) 2015.

By day, digital developer; by night, rock-climber; and when on annual leave, marathoner, adventurer and mountaineer.

By 2015, with your help, I’m hoping to ascend to the summit of Mount Everest with Team Everest (Singapore). Our aim is to represent Singaporeans, to bring our little nation to the peak of Mount Everest on her 50th birthday, and celebrate her independence.

Our climb is symbolic of our country’s ascent from colony to republic, from third to first world, from disparate to united, from 1965 to 2015.

We climb for country and people and we’re hoping to make the 9th of August 2015, a day to remember.

 

 

How can you help?

Help to fund Hilwan’s gear, acclimatisation climbs, mountaineering permits and fees, and logistical costs for Everest. 

On the summit of Mera Peak (6400m) in 2012

 

A short history of money

Since the formation of Team Everest (Singapore) in 2010, our climbing equipment and training expeditions have been self-funded.

We’ve used our savings, our parents’ savings, and all our lunch money to fund our dream of summiting Everest.

Contrary to popular belief, we’re not funded by government agencies. We’ve approached many to ask for sponsorship but response has been lukewarm. So far, we’ve received many pats on our backs but we’ve never received any money.  

Despite this, we’ve continued to train for Everest, going on one self-funded expedition at a time. So far, we’ve summited 4 peaks and an ice climbing course, and spent a total of S$10864 each –

  • Malaysia, Mount Kinabalu, 4095m – S$800
  • India, Mount Shiti Dhar, 5251m – S$3334
  • Nepal, Mera Peak, 6467m and Island Peak, 6189m – S$4089
  • China, Ice Climbing Course – S$2641

Total Spent on Expeditions: S$10,864

We’re determined to fund ourselves and carry on with our training expeditions in preparation for the summit in 2015. We just need your help with our individual summit gear, acclimatisation expeditions, and mountaineering outfitter fee.

 

 

Where will your money go?

Remaining gear, S$3000

  • Down suit, S$1000 – To keep warm, but mostly to stay alive.
  • 8000m climbing boots, S$1000 – Because climbing on ice is impossible with sneakers.
  • Oxygen masks and tanks, S$1000 – Because when you’re at this altitude, there’s only about a third as much oxygen to breathe.

Left: La Sportiva, Olympus Mons 8000m boot. Right: Mountain Hardwear Sub Zero 8000m down suit.

Everest altitude acclimatisation expeditions, S$17000

  • 6000m China Chengdu Ice Climbing Course, S$3000 – A requirement to be proficient on ice before attempting the next ascent.
  • 8201m China Cho Oyu, S$14000 – Another requirement before the final push to the summit.

Mountaineers climbing Cho Oyu above Camp 1: Source Eric Simonson

Everquest Expedition, S$40000

  • Full service cost of climbing Everest; includes acquisition of permits, transportation to/from Base Camp, food, tents, ropes, medical assistance, accredited mountaineering guides, and experienced porters.

Grand total: S$60000

That’s a lot of money so I need a lot of help.

 

Note

Perks on the left are in USD Currency

 

Publicity

We made the news (wish we could say the same about money).

Singapore, Berita Harian, 11 July 2013

 Singapore, National Day Parade 2013 – Our Storybook, 9 August 2013

Singapore, Radio 938 Live Interview, 16 May 2013

 

 

Help me take on earth’s highest mountain for Singapore. Thank you for your contribution!

Find out more about Team Everest (Singapore) 2015 at teamsingapuraeverest.com and share my campaign with your friends.

story:
What is Voxera?

We all travel for different reasons, but one thing’s for sure—we all want to stay connected to whomever we left behind.

VoxEra allows you to do just that, without any roaming fees!So how does it work? Let’s break it down, All you have to do is put your SIM Card into VoxEra (make sure your device is connected to the Internet before you go) and you’ll be on your merry way. When you reach your destination, wherever that may be, just connect to the Internet through WiFi or data and open the VoxEra app. Here, you’ll be able to call and text with the highest quality connection.And the best part? You can do all of this without the dread of receiving your phone bill. So whether you want to wish your mom a happy birthday, share your adventures abroad with friends, or get in touch with clients, VoxEra helps you stay in the conversation as if you never left!

Stay connected anywhere anytime

Wherever you are, with VoxEra you will be always connected, VoxEra works everywhere, during flights, Cruises, Even in the middle of nowhere ,all what you need is an internet connection.

Why VoxEra is the best solution for roaming?

There are a lot of apps for calling and texting while traveling. The problem with those roaming apps is that the recipient of your call or text needs to have a smartphone, download the app, and be connected to WiFi (or use a ton of data) to receive your message. VoxEra patent-pending technology , on the other hand, is completely different! for few reasons:

How does it work?

Think of VoxEra as a message converter. When you receive a call, VoxEra receives a GSM call and then converts it into a VoIP call. It then sends that converted message to the Cloud through the Internet. In the same way, when making a call, VoxEra sends a message through the Cloud. When the device has received the message, our device converts it into a GSM call, at which point, it is delivered to the number you’ve dialed. Easy, right?

 

Sending and receiving calls​

Sending and receiving SMSs 

But don’t just take our word for it!

Testing VoxEra from Georgia

Testing VoxEra from Cairo

Who's it for?

VoxEra’s technology is simple yet brilliant, because It is suitable both for short and long travel. It’s designed for 

Prototype development

What is GigSky ?

GigSky is a world data SIM that provides 3G/4G Internet in 90 countries with the most affordable prices. 

GigSky SIM card comes with 100MB Free Internet included. That's enough to make 500 minutes calls with VoxEra.

 

Why GigSky?

Because of its worldwide coverage and low prices GigSky prices are as low as $0.01 per MB in Europe, $0.05 per MB in Americas, $0.05 per MB for Asia Pacific and $0.10 per MB in Middle East/ Africa.

 GigSky SIM card is compatible with any phone or tablet.

you can get more information about GigSky

https://www.gigsky.com

According to statistics

Most phone companies address their roaming charges with hard-to-read phrasing and hidden fees. And trust us, we’ve done our research. Believe it or not, over 1.2 billion people travel per year and every month 29 million people use mobile roaming while abroad.

 According to a study by JuniperResearch, cell phone companies in 2013 made $57 billion USD. And get this: 64% of that revenue was made just by voice roaming fees, alone. Researchers predict that the hefty chunk of change will increase to $90 billion USD by 2018.

Ready for more numbers? Eighty-eight percent of travelers pay more than $100/month in roaming fees. And, despite all of those cool VoIP apps and online messaging, these individuals are still using their original cell numbers abroad.

Not only do individuals pay more than enough in roaming charges, but also businesses are losing money by reimbursing their employees for roaming fees. A 2012 CCMI survey found that more than a third of Fortune 1000 companies spend over $1,000/ month on roaming charges per employee they send abroad.

So there you have it. Whether you’re traveling for work, or for pleasure, VoxEra will save you the hundreds or even thousands of dollars that come from roaming fees. 

A mind blowing device

What about Security?

Your privacy is important to us. All of your calls made through VoxEra are encrypted, making this product 100% secure. So go ahead and talk business—no one else is listening! 

Rewards

How can you get internet?

There are many ways to find an Internet connection abroad, but they can be difficult to spot if you’re new to the area. Don’t worry, we’ve got you covered! Check out this map to find a location nearest you with accessible Free WiFi.

How did we come up with idea?

I am a man of technology who fell in love with a woman of travel. When we got married, I promised her that we could travel twice a year three months as long as I could check in at work every now and then, between our adventures. Our first trip was magical and she allowed me (as part of our deal) to call my clients and my work team during our time abroad. However, upon returning, my phone bill littered with roaming charges was anything but magical. So in order to uphold my promise without worrying about the cost of staying connected. I searched for a solution, but found no answers.

In my research, I realized that majority of the travel community faced the same issue; the price to stay connected to home, to loved ones, and to work was too much. I was determined to keep my promise to the woman I love, so I used my love of technology to create VoxEra in hopes that I, and everyone else who decided to use this device, could stay connected.

This is, of all things, a true love story.

As a team, what sets us apart?

We care about our investors and the travelers who use our product. We aren’t just trying to sell; we want to address the growing issue of roaming fees.

We have a passion for travel and for technology. We want you to stay connected to home easily, and without cost.

Our plan and execution are entirely different. We’ve designed VoxEra to adapt to the flexibility of travel so that you can reach whomever, whenever. 

We have the experience, and we’ve done our research! We are confident that VoxEra will help eliminate the ridiculous roaming charges, and overall, help the traveling community.

VoxEra in the News

Do you have any questions?

Ask away! send us a message or post a comment and we'll do our best to get back to you with an answer.

or Feedback?

Got a creative idea you think we should implement with VoxEra? Don't hesitate - let us know! VoxEra is being made possible by you, and we want you to be a part of the creative process as well.

We can't do this without you! Help out by sharing VoxEra with your friends.

Contact Information:

Name: Amr Elgbaly
E-Mail: info@voxera.net

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us at info@voxera.net

Risks and challenges

VoxEra has been in the works for 1 year now and we have made many prototypes. We have perfected the design. Now we have turned our attention to mass production, allowing us to offer VoxEra at a reasonable price.

We have been working with manufacturers in China and have found excellent sources. It’s time to take production from the office to the manufacturer.

We have VERY high quality standards and will not move forward with mass production until we are completely satisfied. Please know we have you in mind. we want to ensure the service we offer is completely live up to the standards that we had set and shared with you.

Assembly we might run into problems or delays with assembly, so we will make sure to run with at least 2 suppliers and assembly partners to reduce risk of late delivery. Additionally, since we’re very serious about the product we are designing, we might not be satisfied with the results that we are getting and therefore it might take us more time to address.

story:
The RetraStrap  stands for "Retractable Strap",  is designed to enable you to pull your carry-on luggage hands free, but It also prevents thieves (and forgetful minds!).  It is adjustable to your body type, Comfortable, easy to use, easy to store due to the retractable feature, and compatible with the majority of wheeled carry-on luggage. This product is perfect for travelers, professionals, students, and people with disabilities or injuries alike.  

  • Great maneuverability between objects and people, make up to 90 degree tuns. It does not require any extra skills to maneuver, it turns when you do.
  • Stable: The incorporated elastic works as a shock absorber and prevents the bag from wobbling. 
  • Comfortable The bag stays far enough not to constantly bump into you or touch your feet while walking. 
  • Reduces the chances of dropping your bag or tipping over when on moving objects such as buses, trains, electric escalators or when you stop and try to balance your bag in the upright position. 
  • Works with most wheeled carry-on luggage recommended weight up to 30lbs for most comfortable operation. NOT designed for the large check-in bags
  • Retractable: It looks neat, easy to reach, easy to use and easy to store.  
  • Adjustable to work for any body type. Adjust the height of the handle so it's within reach when needed.
  • Reduces the constant strain on your muscles and joints from constantly pulling your bag in an awkward position.  
  • Better for your back as it allows you to walk in a straight posture while pulling the bag load using the torso. 

The RetraStrap attaches to most carry-on luggage handles and is retractable. Simply pull the shoulder pad, wear around your opposite shoulder as a cross body.

 

 

 
 

 

Tip the bag and walk hands free.(It works with the 4 wheel spinner but only when the bag is tipped over)

 

Hold other items, perform other tasks or just relax and walk freely without being handcuffed to your bag.

 

 

Save money on airport luggage carts,

 

It keeps the bag attached to you to deter thieves and reduce the chances of forgetting the bag behind.

 

Use your free hands to hold on to a moving bus or train instead of trying to balance your luggage.

 

 

You don't need to park your bag in the upright position or reach out to it each time you stop and go.

 

Keep your hands free for the important tasks.

 

Free your hands to push a stroller, a wheelchair or a cart. Traveling with children is much easier while hands free!

 

Accessible and simple to use adjustment mechanism located in the shoulder pad. 

 

TSA friendly, The RetraStrap can stay attached to your carry-on handle throughout the whole trip, no need to remove it and store it unless you are checking in your bag. 

 

The RetraStrap is designed for carry-on size luggage only. Not suitable for the large check-in luggage due to weight load, weight distribution, shape, and height.

Recommended carry-on luggage weight up to 30lbs. 

 

 

 

Awards:

 

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

After a successful campaign we are extending our funding to Indiegogo InDemand to help raising an additional $5000. These funds will go toward increasing our first inventory batch of RetraStraps and continue our journey to bring it to the mass market.

Tooling is ready and we got our first factory samples, we will be delivered the first batch of RetraStraps in April 2018, settling on packaging, shipping, and marketing in the meantime and then making deliveries to you, our valued contributors, starting in May 2018.

***UPDATE***

We got our first inventory and we are now shipping worldwide. You will receive your RetraStrap within 2 weeks after your contribution. 

****

 

 

First factory samples. 

 

 

For FAQs click here 

For more detailed instructions and limitations Click here 

 

 

If you are a journalist and would like to feature the RetraStrap please feel free to use material from our Media Kit here. Please Link back to http://www.RetraStrap.com
