story:
Rollux provides you with freedom and flexibility to change between carry-on and full-size check-in suitcase. Whatever fits your needs at that moment is for you to choose.

When flying with Rollux in carry-on mode, you save yourself time not having to wait for your bag at the baggage claim.

By using Rollux, one can avoid extra baggage fees when returning back home from a trip. 

You may travel with a full-size suitcase and once you arrive at your destination, you may store it as a carry-on in order to save as much space as possible. 

Never stress about baggage space again. Shop as much as you want on vacation because you will have double the space to bring home all your purchases!

 The suitcase is user-friendly and easy to operate without requiring special skills or technicalities. 

    

Do you find yourself shopping on vacation and needing to buy another suitcase to bring your stuff home? Are you tired of paying expensive airline baggage fees? Do you wish there was a way that you could buy a single bag and have the option to use it as a small carry-on or full-size suitcase whenever you want?

Rollux is the smartest suitcase you will own. It’s a sleek, modern-looking, and extremely durable expandable suitcase. Think of a carry-on, that’s the perfect size for quick trips or one-day business travel, and now imagine you could turn that exact carry-on into a full-size suitcase. Yep – that’s Rollux.

Rollux is made with your freedom and flexibility in mind. Say you’re going on a trip and only want to bring a carry-on, but may want to do some shopping once you’re there. No worries. Just expand your carry-on size Rollux, and in a few seconds, you have yourself a full-size suitcase to bring your new items back.

The world has evolved technologically and there are improvements in various fields. However, the changes made in the luggage industry all add up to standard suitcases that bunch together existing electronics; some are even named “smart” suitcases. We believe the time has come for the suitcases to become really smart. 

Rollux is made with quality in mind – 4 spinner wheels, tons of room in its carry-on size, durable material, expands in a few seconds, and is just SMART! 
 

 Since we ship our product directly to customers, we’re able to cut out third-party distributors and offer you a high-end product for a reduced price. 

We’re saving people money on their flights by allowing them to avoid unnecessary and expensive baggage fees, which are only getting worse! If you buy 1 Rollux, you will have made your money back on saved baggage fees within just a few flights! But we’re not promising you’ll become a billionaire.

Aside from avoiding baggage fees, Rollux solves another major pain that almost all travelers experience – the problem of shopping on vacation and having to buy another suitcase to bring your stuff home. Why spend that money when you don’t have to? Rollux is your secret weapon.

USB charging port 
Each Rollux comes with a USB charging port that can be connected to a powerbank for charging your devices on-the-go. The charging port has 2 cables, one to charge the power bank itself, and one to charge your phone. A protective dust cover for the port is also included. Charge your phone in the airport, on the plane, or anywhere else. 
 

 Folding mechanism  

We’ve put a lot of thought into the folding mechanism to ensure it’s as durable and as convenient as possible. It’s made out of PP, so you don’t have to worry about it creating extra weight, is compact and space-friendly. It also expands in seconds. To expand your Rollux, just undo the clip at the bottom of the suitcase, expand the bag by pulling the handle up, lock the structure holders in place, and you’re good to go! 
 
 

4 Detachable spinner wheels Every Rollux suitcase comes with 4 removable spinner wheels, which easily move around and wheel along floors. The removable wheels are made to be durable, so they withstand all the scraping, dragging and lugging involved in traveling. Being able to remove the wheels of your bag allows you to protect the wheels as they are delicate and often the first thing that gets damaged on suitcases. The wheels of the bag are secure and sturdy, but if necessary, may be removed. This ensures a proper fit in overhead compartments and fits necessary airlines requirements.

Materials used We sourced the best material for our bags. Every Rollux is made out of an elastic fabric that allows you to get the most amount of clothes into the allowed suitcase size. Yes, the extra pair of shoes and 3 shirts are needed! The plastic material is made of polypropylene (PP), for it to be elastic, flexible and lightweight. The fixed metals at each corner provide stability and durability so that all parts will be secure and strong.

Size & dimensions 

Rollux meets all current airline requirements for carry-on luggage and full-size luggage. Moreover, it meets all Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) and Transportation Security Administration (TSA) requirements.

  • Powerbank - a powerbank is included in both the Business Class package and First Class package  
  • GPS - a GPS is included in both the Business Class package and First Class package. Having a GPS in your suitcase is the only way to ensure it never gets lost. Use the GPS tracker to keep an eye on your bag, and if it gets lost along the route, you will know exactly where it is.
  • Accessories - a laundry bag, shoe bag, toiletry bag and a pair of locks are all included in the First Class package. These items are all high quality and made out of durable and travel-friendly material. The bags are lightweight and washable, so if anything should open up and spill, you can just throw it in the wash! 

Looking for a small, compact, and just-as-smart laptop bag? Well, it’s your lucky day.

 
Minilux is Rollux’s little sibling and is designed with the same attention to detail and convenience as Rollux was. Minilux is small and compact, but don’t let its size fool you.

The Minilux transforms into a desk with a handy cup holder so you can work on-the-go, has tons of useful functions, like portable chargers, and convenient straps to take it from a laptop bag to a backpack.

Got time to spare in the terminal? Just turn your Minilux into a desk, set up your laptop, and you’re back up in no time. Now that's smart.

Told you – we’ve thought of it all!

 

OUR COLORS

The idea behind FUGU was born in 2013 after our founder and CEO, Isaac, had one-too-many frustrating experiences while traveling with his family. He came up with the idea to design a smarter suitcase.

After spending months developing a prototype and a proof of concept, we launched our first Kickstarter campaign to raise funds for development and production. This first product expanded with an inflatable walls mechanism.

The campaign was a huge success, raised around a half a million dollars, and received massive media coverage. Our videos got over 100 million combined views on social media, and we won the IF Design award. Our first suitcase paved the way for new technology surrounding expandable suitcases. As groundbreaking as the idea was, it was also new and original, which always means it comes along with challenges.

Like many campaigns, we had delays. But we did our homework and tons of research to improve and make our next suitcase EVEN better! Hence, we are not are expecting any delays or any other surprises in terms of production schedules. 

With tons of experience working closely with factories and suppliers, designers and engineers, we bring you our new and improved product, Rollux.

Rollux and Minilux are ready for mass production  

We know you will love it!

story:
We are LiteTravel. Last year we brought Qubix1 right here to Indiegogo and successfully delivered over 30,000 cubes to our backers alone. Since then, we served over 10,000 happy customers around the world.

 

Your incredible support and feedback inspired us to take the double compression packing cube family to the next level. 

 

 

Lost items, creased clothes, scruffy shoes, tangled cables and all the rest... 

 

 

Thanks to Qubix2’s hook and hang system, you can unpack your entire suitcase in a matter of seconds. 

 

Simply hook and hang your cubes on the rail, on a hanger, or anywhere you want!

 

 

Getting access to your clothes is an absolute breeze. Simply unzip your cube (even without de-compressing it) and… voilà! 

Oh and did we mention? The hook and hang system doubles as a carrying handle. 

 

So you can grab your cubes with ease, anytime and anywhere.

 

 

The double compression zipper is a revolution in packing efficiency. 

 

The centre compression zipper wraps twice around each cube, giving you the added flexibility of a 2 level compression.

 

Qubix2 features a new super lightweight RipStop parachute fabric that is woven using a special reinforcing technique, making it resistant to tearing and ripping.

 

 

And as the name suggests, skydivers trust it to keep them safe at 15,000 ft. So you know you can trust it on your travels!

 

In a nutshell, if you want super durable packing cubes, that’s exactly what you get when backing Qubix2. 

 

Whether you roll or fold, the folding board keeps your cubes flat and flush when zipped and compressed. 

 

SEE QUBIX2 IN ACTION FOR YOURSELF.

 

 

The Qubix2 Toiletry Cube is epic, and is one of our proudest upgrades!

 

It has a retractable hook you can use to hang it anywhere.

 

It comes with an optimised pocket configuration of different sizes for complete versatility. 

 

So you can fit all your favourite grooming items. No seriously, I mean aaaaaaaall of them, and then some!?

 

 

To make it even better, the Toiletry Cube is made with waterproof material. Aaaaand it comes with a tear-away pouch and a waterproof zipper.  

You can even hang it in the shower using its very own integrated hook and hang strap.

 

 

 

 

This is the newest addition to the Qubix family. It's optimized to hold and organise your electronics in an efficient and compact way.

 

It can comfortably fit all your cables, chargers, gadgets and accessories. The outside walls are lightly padded to offer extra protection for your valuables.

Keep all your tech accessories neatly organised and easily reachable in one place. And say goodbye to damaged gear and messy cables forever.

 

 

We wanted the laundry bag to be discreet yet super useful. 

 

 

So we made it double the size compared to Qubix1. 

 

And it folds so tiny, you won’t even know it’s there until you need it.

 

 

No one wants the dirt and grime from the pavement rubbing against their clothes! 

 

 

Universal sizes are made to fit pretty much every hand luggage, suitcase, or backpack.

 

HEAR WHAT QUBIX2 BETA TESTERS HAD TO SAY... PRESS PLAY!

 

In the highly unlikely case you encounter an issue with your cubes, all you have to do is contact us. We trust our backers and promise to resolve any issues as fast as possible.

 

 

⏰ Choose Your Reward FAST  ⏰ before the discounts run out! 

 

 

 

*Both the Large Cube & Medium Cube come with a folding board in their respective sizes.

 *Add ons will not incur any extra shipping.

You want more Qubix2 sets or separate cubes and bags? Awesome! You can easily select them in your BackerKit survey, the pledge management platform we use.

You’ll be able to select however many other extra units you want, without any extra shipping fees on BackerKit. That’s also where you will be able to choose your color for the Qubix2 sets and add-ons you have in your order (Classic Black or Sky Blue).

A very simple survey will be sent to you 11 days after placing your contribution (according to Indiegogo rules) and you’ll be done with it in minutes. Click here for the update in which you can find out all the steps you need to take once you receive your survey. Please make sure to always keep an eye on our Indiegogo Campaign Updates.

 

 

 

Heads up: long post, but worth your while!

If you however want the short version, you can scroll all the way to the bottom to the TLDR section.​

Here we go:

Because the community is growing, we wanted to take a moment to introduce ourselves to the members meeting us for the first time, as well as share some more insight into the journey since Qubix 1 with our existing backers.

We're a small group of travellers who understand the need to stay light and very organised, no matter how far or for how long you travel. And we're passionate about coming up with solutions (hacks, if you will) that make our travels (and life) easier. ✈️✈️

You might already know that approximately this time last year we brought to Indiegogo InDemand Qubix 1 - the super strong double compression packing cubes we created as a solution to a problem we had struggled with for years: messy luggage that's been a pain to pack, unpack and manage throughout our travels.  

 

Qubix 1 received so much ❤️❤️ and support from our backer community... It was unexpected, positively surprising and humbling all at once.

With over 5,500 people rallying behind our idea on Kickstarter and Indiegogo, we were determined to meet your expectations and got to work as soon as we received the funds pledged to the campaign.

We basically slept at our manufacturer's facility and supervised the entire production process before we packaged every single reward and shipped it out to our backers.

Although it was our very first experience producing something at such a big scale, we managed to overcome all the challenges of that process and delivered the rewards from both campaigns on time. Whew!

Since then we shipped out over 30,000 cubes to our crowdfunding backers alone and served over 10,000 happy customers across the world. We're secretly very proud of this, but we didn't rest on our laurels. 

 

Requests to keep producing and selling Qubix have continued to pour in and we also keep receiving proposals from large distributors to include Qubix in their family of products.

But our main focus has always remained on our backers because without your support, Qubix would have never been created.

So rather than going wide (expanding the distribution of Qubix across as many channels as possible), we chose to go deep (listen to our backers' input and work to make their packing experience even easier than ever before).

So... to make sure we are laser focused, we paused the expansion of Qubix 1 and started working on implementing all the feedback brought forth by our backers.

Among some of the most popular upgrades suggested were:

  •  adding a handle to the compressions cubes for easy carry
  •  compartmentalising the toiletry cube better to neatly fit all your travel essentials for short, medium and longer trips
  •  adding an electronics cube that's small and compact yet spacious to fit the most common gadgets, chargers and cables you travel with

Adding our own voices to those of our backers', we also:

  •  changed the fabric to ripstop nylon - extremely durable, water resistant and light weight
  •  redesigned the toiletry cube to include a tear-away compartment made of waterproof material and with waterproof zipper so you have the flexibility to pack as many or as little toiletries as you need for your trips + we added convenient hangers to both partitions so they can be used together or separately without losing functionality or convenience
  •  doubled the functionality of the carrying handles to include the hook and hang system -  meaning you will no longer have to unpack when you reach your destination. All you'll have to do is hook and hang, then unzip your cubes (even without releasing the compression) and have easy access to all your clothing in seconds.
  •  doubled the size of the laundry bag yet made it fold tiny so you won't even notice it's there until you need it
  •  increased the warranty period and made our replacement process quick and painless [i.e. if you experience any product failure, all you need to do is send us a clear picture and a quick description of the problem and we'll send you a replacement right away].

 

And so much more...

Having come this far, we're very excited to share Qubix 2 with you because you've contributed to making it what it is today.

If you've been with us from the beginning of this journey, we really can't thank you enough! Qubix wouldn't have been possible without you and we are beyond grateful for your trust and support.

*****************

TLDR

The first iteration of Qubix was launched in 2018 and received the support of over 5,500 backers

Over 10,000 happy customers and over 30,000 cubes delivered worldwide since then

The incredible feedback from our backers and customers helped us take the overall design and functionality to the next level - this is how Qubix 2 came to be

The most significant upgrades compared to version 1 include: 

- hook & hang system that eliminates the need to unpack, gives you easy access to your clothing and doubles as a carrying handle for convenience;

- super durable lightweight ripstop parachute nylon now used for Qubix 2 items; 

- compartmentalised toiletry cube that features a tear-away pouch made of waterproof material and with waterproof zipper and you can even take it with you in the shower; 

- doubled the size of the laundry bag yet made it fold tiny so you won't even know it's there until you need it; 

- versatile electronics cube added to the set 

- quick and painless replacements,  and so much more...

 

Thank you for joining us on another exciting ride of the Qubix journey.
story_txt:
We are LiteTravel. Last year we brought Qubix1 right here to Indiegogo and successfully delivered over 30,000 cubes to our backers alone. Since then, we served over 10,000 happy customers around the world. Your incredible support and feedback inspired us to take the double compression packing cube family to the next level.  
 
We all know the pain of a messy luggage! Packing can be a struggle, especially when trying to fit in all your essentials. 
 

 
When you finally arrive at your destination after a long trip, dealing with the dread of unpacking is the last thing you ever want to be doing.   Lost items, creased clothes, scruffy shoes, tangled cables and all the rest...  
 
 
Now you can finally say goodbye to the dreadful task and epic waste of time that is unpacking!
  Thanks to Qubix2’s hook and hang system, you can unpack your entire suitcase in a matter of seconds.  Simply hook and hang your cubes on the rail, on a hanger, or anywhere you want!  Getting access to your clothes is an absolute breeze. Simply unzip your cube (even without de-compressing it) and… voilà!  Oh and did we mention? The hook and hang system doubles as a carrying handle.  So you can grab your cubes with ease, anytime and anywhere.  The double compression zipper is a revolution in packing efficiency.  The centre compression zipper wraps twice around each cube, giving you the added flexibility of a 2 level compression. Qubix2 features a new super lightweight RipStop parachute fabric that is woven using a special reinforcing technique, making it resistant to tearing and ripping.  And as the name suggests, skydivers trust it to keep them safe at 15,000 ft. So you know you can trust it on your travels!  In a nutshell, if you want super durable packing cubes, that’s exactly what you get when backing Qubix2.  Whether you roll or fold, the folding board keeps your cubes flat and flush when zipped and compressed.  SEE QUBIX2 IN ACTION FOR YOURSELF.

 
*Image inspired courtesy of backer Michelle H. <3  The Qubix2 Toiletry Cube is epic, and is one of our proudest upgrades! It has a retractable hook you can use to hang it anywhere.  It comes with an optimised pocket configuration of different sizes for complete versatility.  So you can fit all your favourite grooming items. No seriously, I mean aaaaaaaall of them, and then some!?  To make it even better, the Toiletry Cube is made with waterproof material. Aaaaand it comes with a tear-away pouch and a waterproof zipper.   You can even hang it in the shower using its very own integrated hook and hang strap.    This is the newest addition to the Qubix family. It's optimized to hold and organise your electronics in an efficient and compact way. It can comfortably fit all your cables, chargers, gadgets and accessories. The outside walls are lightly padded to offer extra protection for your valuables. Keep all your tech accessories neatly organised and easily reachable in one place. And say goodbye to damaged gear and messy cables forever.  We wanted the laundry bag to be discreet yet super useful.   So we made it double the size compared to Qubix1.  And it folds so tiny, you won’t even know it’s there until you need it.  No one wants the dirt and grime from the pavement rubbing against their clothes!   Universal sizes are made to fit pretty much every hand luggage, suitcase, or backpack. HEAR WHAT QUBIX2 BETA TESTERS HAD TO SAY... PRESS PLAY!  In the highly unlikely case you encounter an issue with your cubes, all you have to do is contact us. We trust our backers and promise to resolve any issues as fast as possible.
  ⏰ Choose Your Reward FAST  ⏰ before the discounts run out!    *Both the Large Cube & Medium Cube come with a folding board in their respective sizes. *Add ons will not incur any extra shipping.You want more Qubix2 sets or separate cubes and bags? Awesome! You can easily select them in your BackerKit survey, the pledge management platform we use.You’ll be able to select however many other extra units you want, without any extra shipping fees on BackerKit. That’s also where you will be able to choose your color for the Qubix2 sets and add-ons you have in your order (Classic Black or Sky Blue).A very simple survey will be sent to you 11 days after placing your contribution (according to Indiegogo rules) and you’ll be done with it in minutes. Click here for the update in which you can find out all the steps you need to take once you receive your survey. Please make sure to always keep an eye on our Indiegogo Campaign Updates.   

  Heads up: long post, but worth your while!If you however want the short version, you can scroll all the way to the bottom to the TLDR section.​Here we go:Because the community is growing, we wanted to take a moment to introduce ourselves to the members meeting us for the first time, as well as share some more insight into the journey since Qubix 1 with our existing backers.We're a small group of travellers who understand the need to stay light and very organised, no matter how far or for how long you travel. And we're passionate about coming up with solutions (hacks, if you will) that make our travels (and life) easier. ✈️✈️You might already know that approximately this time last year we brought to Indiegogo InDemand Qubix 1 - the super strong double compression packing cubes we created as a solution to a problem we had struggled with for years: messy luggage that's been a pain to pack, unpack and manage throughout our travels.   Qubix 1 received so much ❤️❤️ and support from our backer community... It was unexpected, positively surprising and humbling all at once.With over 5,500 people rallying behind our idea on Kickstarter and Indiegogo, we were determined to meet your expectations and got to work as soon as we received the funds pledged to the campaign.We basically slept at our manufacturer's facility and supervised the entire production process before we packaged every single reward and shipped it out to our backers.Although it was our very first experience producing something at such a big scale, we managed to overcome all the challenges of that process and delivered the rewards from both campaigns on time. Whew!Since then we shipped out over 30,000 cubes to our crowdfunding backers alone and served over 10,000 happy customers across the world. We're secretly very proud of this, but we didn't rest on our laurels.  Requests to keep producing and selling Qubix have continued to pour in and we also keep receiving proposals from large distributors to include Qubix in their family of products.But our main focus has always remained on our backers because without your support, Qubix would have never been created.So rather than going wide (expanding the distribution of Qubix across as many channels as possible), we chose to go deep (listen to our backers' input and work to make their packing experience even easier than ever before).So... to make sure we are laser focused, we paused the expansion of Qubix 1 and started working on implementing all the feedback brought forth by our backers.Among some of the most popular upgrades suggested were:
 adding a handle to the compressions cubes for easy carry
 compartmentalising the toiletry cube better to neatly fit all your travel essentials for short, medium and longer trips
 adding an electronics cube that's small and compact yet spacious to fit the most common gadgets, chargers and cables you travel with
Adding our own voices to those of our backers', we also:
 changed the fabric to ripstop nylon - extremely durable, water resistant and light weight
 redesigned the toiletry cube to include a tear-away compartment made of waterproof material and with waterproof zipper so you have the flexibility to pack as many or as little toiletries as you need for your trips + we added convenient hangers to both partitions so they can be used together or separately without losing functionality or convenience
 doubled the functionality of the carrying handles to include the hook and hang system -  meaning you will no longer have to unpack when you reach your destination. All you'll have to do is hook and hang, then unzip your cubes (even without releasing the compression) and have easy access to all your clothing in seconds.
 doubled the size of the laundry bag yet made it fold tiny so you won't even notice it's there until you need it
 increased the warranty period and made our replacement process quick and painless [i.e. if you experience any product failure, all you need to do is send us a clear picture and a quick description of the problem and we'll send you a replacement right away].
 And so much more...Having come this far, we're very excited to share Qubix 2 with you because you've contributed to making it what it is today.If you've been with us from the beginning of this journey, we really can't thank you enough! Qubix wouldn't have been possible without you and we are beyond grateful for your trust and support.*****************TLDRThe first iteration of Qubix was launched in 2018 and received the support of over 5,500 backersOver 10,000 happy customers and over 30,000 cubes delivered worldwide since thenThe incredible feedback from our backers and customers helped us take the overall design and functionality to the next level - this is how Qubix 2 came to beThe most significant upgrades compared to version 1 include: - hook & hang system that eliminates the need to unpack, gives you easy access to your clothing and doubles as a carrying handle for convenience;- super durable lightweight ripstop parachute nylon now used for Qubix 2 items; - compartmentalised toiletry cube that features a tear-away pouch made of waterproof material and with waterproof zipper and you can even take it with you in the shower; - doubled the size of the laundry bag yet made it fold tiny so you won't even know it's there until you need it; - versatile electronics cube added to the set - quick and painless replacements,  and so much more... Thank you for joining us on another exciting ride of the Qubix journey.

story:
Please visit www.waverlylabs.com to pre-order the Pilot Translation Kit for $249.00.

 

Our Indiegogo campaign for early backers is now closed.

If you purchased the Pilot Translating Earpiece via our IndieGoGo campaign, you are part of our special early backer community: you will receive the Pilot Translation Kit in the Fall 2017.

If you MISSED THE CAMPAIGN, please know, we’re now taking pre-orders for the next shipment which are scheduled for delivery in the Fall 2017, as well.

Don’t forget to subscribe to our Newsletter to stay up to date or follow us on social media

Facebook I Twitter I Instagram

If you have any questions, please visit: https://support.waverlylabs.com/

 

 

Being lost in translation has happened to everyone while traveling, even us, and that's exactly how the idea was born. Waverly Labs is at the convergence of wearable technology + machine translation, developing the world's first smart earpiece language translator.

Using the latest technologies in speech recognition, machine translation and the advances of wearable technology, our smart earpiece allows wearers to speak different languages but still clearly understand each other. Simply put, when one person speaks, the other hears it in their language. Science fiction has called it many things, but we call it Pilot. 

 

 

 

 

 

Will it translate everything around me?

NO. This first generation does not translate everything happening around you. It only translates with people who also have the Pilot earpiece. Future generations will be developed to translate everything around you.

 

What if the other person doesn’t have an earpiece?

 

The full system comes with 2 earpieces for sharing during conversation with someone else. If someone does not have an earpiece, they can use the smartphone app which is included. Also, the app can be used as a loudspeaker during conference mode.

 

How fast is it?

 

Currently the translation only takes a couple of seconds of delay, but we are working very hard to get this lag shorter and we will release updates to the app with every improvement.

 

Is the translation perfect?

 

No, machine translation is not perfect and it will make mistakes sometimes, but the more people use it the better the translation engine becomes.

 

Can it be used offline?

 

We are developing an offline version so that you can use it while traveling overseas without a data connection. However this may be a later stage version of the app. The first version of the app will require online connectivity. We anticipate the offline use to be available by fall/winter 2017.

 

When will the app be delivered?

 

An early version of the translation app is expected this summer (August 2016) for basic translation. It will be the first iteration and allow for testing with our current backers throughout the year as we perfect the experience. This is included in your pre-order. The full app system with the Pilot earpieces will be delivered in May 2017.

 

 

What languages will be supported?

We are first introducing latin/romance languages this summer (English, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese). Expected additional languages ase as follows: (*subject to change)

Germanic: German, Danish, Swedish

Russian and Slovak: Russian, Ukrainian, Czech, Polish

Hebrew/Arabic

East Asian: Mandarin Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Vietnamese

Hindi and Urdu

African: Afrikaans 

 

Are these the ONLY languages which Waverly Labs will release?

NO. We expect to investigate a wide array of languages, including those which are not listed. We'll listen to the feedback of our community to prioritize other languages throughout our development.

 

Are additional languages free?

Only for backers on Indiegogo. For everyone else, additional language packs will be available for a premium fee,

 

Will it translate for my dialect?

 

Every language has various dialects and the earpiece is designed to translate common dialects, although thick accents could disrupt this and cause improper translations.

 

 

Will the app work with other smart earpieces?

No. The app and Pilot are designed to work together using specific communication protocols.

 

When will the earpieces be delivered?

The earpieces require much more testing, manufacturing and production time. Therefore, we anticipate the earliest will be Christmas, although this is an aggressive timeline. Backers should be prepared to have orders fulfilled next spring 2017.

 

Where will you ship?

 

We will ship internationally, and shipping costs are automatically calculated when you preorder.

 

When will I select my colors?

 

We will send you an online form to collect your color preference later this fall.

 

Do you have a working prototype?

 

Yes! We’ve prototyped the software to allow for two people to carry a conversation using the app. The next stages of the software development will focus on building a scalable infrastructure of the system to support a large number of users. The Pilot earpieces have gone through several stages of the hardware prototyping, including component selection, pcb design and industrial design. The full system of hardware and software development begins this summer as we move into the engineering validation testing phase.

 

Can I be a beta tester?

 

We will invite a select group of the early bird supporters to become beta testers. This will be invite only based on certain factors, such as languages, geography and use cases. We’ll send a notice later this fall to allow for beta test submissions.

 

Are the earpieces waterproof?

 

No.

 

How can I reach out to your team?

We are developing a community portal on our website to get to know you! In the meantime, message us on facebook and we’ll be sure to respond as soon as possible.

 

I’m having trouble making a contribution. What should I do?

 

Email support@indiegogo.com

story:
ORSEN Airfresh Snorkel Mask is a CO2 safety standard snorkeling mask with an automatic breathing system, which allows people to breathe effortlessly during snorkeling. With our newly invented walkie-talkie, you can even be connected with another talkie to achieve real-time conversation with your partner. At the same time, we have also solved a series of problems that snorkelers suffer from , such as water leakage and fogging. Take our orsen airfresh snorkeling mask and start your safe snorkeling journey.

 

Our orsen snorkel mask with airfresh system can reduce the carbon dioxide concentration below 800ppm,which is a reliable indoor carbon dioxide content range, while other masks have a carbon dioxide concentration of more than 6000ppm, which poses a great threat to life.     When snorkeling, you can breathe the way you do naturally with both nose and mouth by using our Orsen Airfresh snorkel mask, featuringan innovative airflow exchange system. You don't need to exhale and inhale very hard as our airflow exchange system will automatically let air circulate in and out. This creates an airflow with reduced resistance, allowing more fresh air to circulate through the mask and thus preventing CO2 buildup. No safety issue anymore! Our masks can even be used regularly without the Airfresh system.

 

 

 

 

Solve the obstacle of underwater intercom! You can connect this IP68 waterproof walkie talkie with your phone via Bluetooth to answer your phone, listen to music and connect with another talkie to achieve real-time conversation with your partner. You can share what you have seen and heard while snorkeling with your family and friends. The Bluetooth walkie talkie can achieve a transmission distance of 80 meters. (Only suitable for snorkeling, DOES NOT WORK UNDERWATER)

 

According to the ergonomic design and data report, our Airfresh snorkel mask can perfectly fit everyone's face shape, and there is no need to worry about water leakage anymore. We use surgical grade allergy-proof silicone certified by FDA to bring you unprecedented facial comfort!

 

Impeccable attention to detail is put into every Orsen mask. Considering the buckles of most snorkel masks will become loose, our anti-loose buckles specially designed to snugly fit against the head's natural curvature, maintaining great fit and unprecedented comfort. 

 

No more fogging. Our anti-fog mask utilizes the latest separation system on Inhale and Exhale. The exhaled air will be automatically discharged from the mask via air flow exchange system, while the fresh air will be continuously delivered to the breathing area so that the lens can be kept clear without fogging.

With a 180-degree lens, your viewing area is expanded by 30%, so you can take in everything below the surface and truly enjoy the mind-blowing marine life beneath with wider views.

 

Our patented snorkel tube can be easily folded for storage and safe transportation. No more worry about the missing tube and no efforts required to detach and attach the snorkel tube.

 

In addition, the detachable motion camera support will also bring you great convenience.

 

We set out to make a product that would revolutionize the snorkeling experience. We have spent 3 years designing, developing, testing and engineering the ORSEN Airfresh snorkel mask. Below are just a few initial sketches.

 

The ORSEN snorkeling mask offers an unparalleled design and improves the problems that appear on the market, greatly enhancing the snorkeling experience. At the same time, we have optimized the breathing structure and invented an automatic air circulation system so that you can breathe effortlessly and enjoy the snorkeling safely.
Under the operation of our airfresh system, we have eliminated CO2 buildup, and passes CE Certification For CO2 Build Up. In conjunction with our ultra-light air valve, we have minimized the air resistance. The low-resistance airflow allows fresh oxygen to enter the mask at a high rate and provides a comfortable breathing experience where people can breathe freely as if on land.

 


 

 

also reviewed by famous outdoor website  Globosurfer

Orsen Airfresh has colorful items to choose

 

 

Follow the sizing chart  to select the right fit

 

About us

We are Orsen snorkeling team, a famous brand established in 1994. Our team has been innovation focused and dedicated to improve the snorkeling experience, by designing superior products tailored to meet the evolving needs of snorkelers. Different from the traditional mask, our newest model -the Airfresh snorkel mask makes the best use of snorkel shape to maximize air circulation, and optimizes the lens shape to provide unparalleled underwater visibility.

We are honored to have your support, and we are thankful for your trust. We want to say thank you, and that we appreciate the faith you have in our brand to back our product.

Your feedback, good or bad, makes us a better brand and lets us serve you better, so please don’t keep quiet. Feel free to email us directly at  indiegogo@orsensports.com

story:
We all have small things we carry with us every day: phones, cables, makeup, notebooks, pens, loose change--you name it. After searching far and wide for the perfect way to organize these items, we found that the existing options were not very durable, tend to soak up water and grime over time, and didn't keep our things organized very well. We knew there had to be a better way.

 

 

That's why we created the transit pouch.  With it's unique silicone construction paired with a water-resistant zipper and internal organizer, it's destined to be the last pouch you ever need.

 

 

 

 

The transit pouch is the perfect everyday pouch for protecting your goods, whether you're traveling, exploring the outdoors, exercising, or simply on the go. Constructed with durable, BPA-free silicone, a water resistant zipper, and featuring an internal organizer as well as a handy integrated loop that’s perfect for clipping, holding or swinging, these pouches are the perfect solution for organizing and protecting your daily necessities.

 

 

Available in 3 sizes and 4 colors, we’re pretty sure you can find one that’s perfect for you.

 


 

 

 

 

The Transit is constructed of high-quality, food-grade silicone that is durable and long-lasting, yet soft to the touch. 

 

 

 

 

 

A water-resistant zipper keeps your belongings safe from the elements.  Perfect for the beach, outdoors, or rainy days. (Note: Our zippers are highly water resistant, but not completely waterproof.) 

 

 

 

 

Every pouch comes with an internal wallet to keep all of your small items organized.  It's perfect for your phone, credit cards, loose change, lip balm--just about anything. The wallet features: 

  • A soft pocket for your phone or other electronics
  • Zip pocket for valuables and coins
  • Elastic slots for cards and miscellaneous items

 

 

 

 

 

The handy integrated silicone loop, which is built right into the pouch through an innovative molding process, is perfect for clipping, hanging, and attaching to just about anything.  (It's also super fun to swing around on your finger!) 

 

 

 

Every pouch also comes with a removable wrist strap for even more carrying and attachment options. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Since the Transit pouch is constructed of silicone, it does not absorb stains or odors, and can easily be washed by wiping or rinsing it off. 

 

 

It is even dishwasher safe--we left one in our dishwasher for over 50 cycles and it is still in perfect condition!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The small is perfect for small accessories like makeup, cards, coins--things you carry with you everyday. It makes for a great wallet, small clutch, or gear pouch.  This size will fit standard-sized smartphones.

 

 

 

The medium is great for everything from organizing small accessories within a backpack, to packing travel supplies, to keeping some emergency supplies in your car. It works great as a makeup case or small clutch.  This size will fit all sizes of smartphones, including Plus-sized phones.

 

 

 

The large has quickly become our personal favorite--it is spacious enough to fit a full toiletries kit, lots of electronic supplies, and is great for travel.  It also works well as a small purse.  This size will fit all sizes of smartphones and iPad minis.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are a group of product designers-turned-entrepreneurs who share a desire to make the best travel and lifestyle products out there. In 2016, we banded together to form viavia to bring our ideas to life.

 

 

 

As with all new projects, there are some risks involved in bringing a product to market. However, we are skilled product designers and developers and feel confident in our ability to deliver a great product. We have a reputable factory lined up for with expertise in this area of manufacturing, which we have visited in person and confirmed their quality. We've tested many final samples to make sure the design works properly. We've created sample molds of the final design to give us accurate samples as to what we are getting in production. That said, one of the risks would be potential delays in production based on the factory's schedule to produce. Slight variations within the products can occur with silicone and sewn components, including subtle color variants and sewing inconsistencies. However, we will guarantee any failed products by replacing them upon return of the defective product.
story_txt:
We all have small things we carry with us every day: phones, cables, makeup, notebooks, pens, loose change--you name it. After searching far and wide for the perfect way to organize these items, we found that the existing options were not very durable, tend to soak up water and grime over time, and didn't keep our things organized very well. We knew there had to be a better way.
 

 
That's why we created the transit pouch.  With it's unique silicone construction paired with a water-resistant zipper and internal organizer, it's destined to be the last pouch you ever need.
 

 
 

 
The transit pouch is the perfect everyday pouch for protecting your goods, whether you're traveling, exploring the outdoors, exercising, or simply on the go. Constructed with durable, BPA-free silicone, a water resistant zipper, and featuring an internal organizer as well as a handy integrated loop that’s perfect for clipping, holding or swinging, these pouches are the perfect solution for organizing and protecting your daily necessities.
 
 Available in 3 sizes and 4 colors, we’re pretty sure you can find one that’s perfect for you.     The Transit is constructed of high-quality, food-grade silicone that is durable and long-lasting, yet soft to the touch.      A water-resistant zipper keeps your belongings safe from the elements.  Perfect for the beach, outdoors, or rainy days. (Note: Our zippers are highly water resistant, but not completely waterproof.)     Every pouch comes with an internal wallet to keep all of your small items organized.  It's perfect for your phone, credit cards, loose change, lip balm--just about anything. The wallet features: 
A soft pocket for your phone or other electronics
Zip pocket for valuables and coins
Elastic slots for cards and miscellaneous items
     The handy integrated silicone loop, which is built right into the pouch through an innovative molding process, is perfect for clipping, hanging, and attaching to just about anything.  (It's also super fun to swing around on your finger!)    Every pouch also comes with a removable wrist strap for even more carrying and attachment options.       Since the Transit pouch is constructed of silicone, it does not absorb stains or odors, and can easily be washed by wiping or rinsing it off.   It is even dishwasher safe--we left one in our dishwasher for over 50 cycles and it is still in perfect condition!           The small is perfect for small accessories like makeup, cards, coins--things you carry with you everyday. It makes for a great wallet, small clutch, or gear pouch.  This size will fit standard-sized smartphones.   The medium is great for everything from organizing small accessories within a backpack, to packing travel supplies, to keeping some emergency supplies in your car. It works great as a makeup case or small clutch.  This size will fit all sizes of smartphones, including Plus-sized phones.   The large has quickly become our personal favorite--it is spacious enough to fit a full toiletries kit, lots of electronic supplies, and is great for travel.  It also works well as a small purse.  This size will fit all sizes of smartphones and iPad minis.                      We are a group of product designers-turned-entrepreneurs who share a desire to make the best travel and lifestyle products out there. In 2016, we banded together to form viavia to bring our ideas to life.   As with all new projects, there are some risks involved in bringing a product to market. However, we are skilled product designers and developers and feel confident in our ability to deliver a great product. We have a reputable factory lined up for with expertise in this area of manufacturing, which we have visited in person and confirmed their quality. We've tested many final samples to make sure the design works properly. We've created sample molds of the final design to give us accurate samples as to what we are getting in production. That said, one of the risks would be potential delays in production based on the factory's schedule to produce. Slight variations within the products can occur with silicone and sewn components, including subtle color variants and sewing inconsistencies. However, we will guarantee any failed products by replacing them upon return of the defective product.

story:
Short Summary

We are trying to raise money to send our students to Rome, Italy for the ITF TaeKwon-Do World Championships at the end of July.

What We Need 

We need funds to pay for entry fees and flights, hotel rooms and meals. It is very expensive to travel internationally and we do not have large national sponsors. So each of our students are responsible for raising funds to make their trip happen.

The Impact

These students have trained for many years and have competed to earn these spots on Team USA and they need your help to make it happen.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
Our mission with this project, as with all our projects, is to create something creative and interesting that involves the people and place we will be donating part of the profits to. A product that not only engages us, but people of all ages and walks of life, as well as providing the consumer with something creative that not only involves them in the project, but draws them in. The Road to Baja, will take us on a 12-day trip through Baja California on a 1974 Yamaha DT360 with a modified surf rack. On a mission to map the road through Baja with photographs. We will take the photos and compile them into a selection of prints, a coffee table style photo book with each photo having an attached GPS location, and a short documentary. We will be donating fifty percent of the profits from the book and print sales to orphanages in Baja California. The Road to Baja, is just the beginning. We plan on doing similar projects, mapping the road all the way through central America, with every project taking on a personality and voice of its' own, reflecting the unique people and places we come across. Every project by, The Open Road Project, will be donating fifty percent of the profits to the people in whatever area is documented by the project.

members for the project:

Ryan Stephenson - www.glenporter.org

Anders Rostad - www.andersrostad.com

Matthew Brush - www.matthewbrush.com

David Iwane - https://www.facebook.com/david.iwane.9?directed_target_id=0

                   http://society6.com/DaviesBabies 

Matthew Mcmillan

story:
Finally, a wheelchair that lets people with mobility challenges get off the beaten path.

The AdvenChair Off-Road Wheelchair is a game-changing, human-powered vehicle that will allow people with mobility challenges to comfortably travel off of hard surfaces and onto rugged trails, sand, and snow.

With its ergonomic design and lightweight harness, a team of one to five people can navigate the AdvenChair over rocky, soft, or steep terrain with the comfort and protection of a wheelchair, as well as the stability and durability of a mountain bike. At the same time, its removable front wheel, adjustable handlebars, small casters, and sleek design allow the AdvenChair to easily pass through doorways and maneuver indoors, or to be folded for transport in the trunk of a car.  

ADVENCHAIR 2.0:

We need you to help us gain traction.

​

We are hoping to raise at least $100,000 to build, test, refine and market our second-generation prototype, AdvenChair 2.0, in early 2019. With additional refinements next summer, we expect to be selling chairs to the public via an e-commerce website before the end of 2019.

  • Choose from an exciting assortment of perks designed to enhance your AdvenChair experience, including journals and baseball caps with our stylin’ logo.
  • Or choose a pair of hand-crafted mugs from Basko Creative with a pound of coffee from Smith Rock Coffee Roasters.
  • Better yet, choose either of two limited-edition, ready-to-frame 11 x 14 nature photographs from Darlisa Black.
  • Pledge $1,000 or more and receive the unique experience of an overnight test campout in the Oregon wilderness with Geoff in one of our prototype AdvenChairs next spring. (Includes four delicious camp-cooked meals and beverages.)
  • Pledge $5,000 or more to pre-purchase a fully stocked AdvenChair prototype of your very own. Be the first outside of our team to hit the trails and offer real-world feedback.

  • If you'd like to  pay by check* :
    The Onward Project, LLC
    20841 SE Westview Dr
    Bend OR 97702

    * your contributions are not tax deductible
     

The planet is covered with trails. And people who want to explore them.

The potential market is massive. Whether suffering from muscular difficulties or paralysis due to accidents, it’s estimated that more than 65 million people around the world are confined to wheelchairs.

More and more studies confirm that escapes into the wilderness provide both physical and psychological benefits for people, especially those with disabilities. Being together with family and friends is an important part of this healing process.

Through his work with Healing Reins Therapeutic Riding Center, Oregon Adaptive Sports, Stroke Awareness Oregon, and the City of Bend Accessibility Advisory Committee, AdvenChair founder Geoff Babb is well attuned to the needs of the disabled community in Central Oregon. His ongoing experience organizing events and fundraisers for non-profits serves him well in this campaign.
 

Next steps.

As we move from the CAD model stage to the working prototype we have some important questions to address, including:

  • Can we lower the weight?
  • Should we include a seat that is adjustable on the fly?
  • What will the ultimate production cost be?

We intend to go into the prototype testing phase with our eyes wide open, prepared to challenge our assumptions and adjust our thinking accordingly.
 

Help us move onward and upward.

Just because you don’t know someone in a wheelchair doesn’t mean you can’t help changes lives. The AdvenChair can benefit individuals of all ages, not just through private ownership, but through adaptive sports and recreation programs. Even National Parks have the potential to provide chairs for visitors to explore unpaved trails.

Here are some ways you can help:

  • Share our campaign story with your friends via email, Twitter and Instagram.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word about AdvenChair to your friends, local senior centers and adaptive sports outlets.

Looking for more information or have a question? See the FAQ
 

"Learning to Fly"— Geoff Babb's Story


Hi, I'm Geoff Babb, creator of the AdvenChair.

Thirteen years ago, I was a Fire Ecologist and an avid outdoorsman in Bend, Oregon, who loved to ski, mountain bike and backpack with my wife Yvonne and twin 12-year-old boys. That is, until November 10, 2005, when a near-fatal brain stem stroke left me confined to a wheelchair and with only limited use of one hand.

While the stroke forever changed my ability to move, I soon took to adaptive horseback riding and skiing through Healing Reins and Oregon Adaptive Sports to help me get outdoors again. However, I immediately discovered that the biggest obstacle to experiencing the great outdoors with my family again was not so much my body, but my wheelchair. There was simply nothing out there that could easily and effectively get us off of a paved path, let alone a gravel one.

After modifying a wheelchair to give it beefier tires, a detachable front wheel, handbrakes on the handlebar, and a harness that would allow a small team to guide me up and down steep terrain, we went exploring and put it to the test. While we had some great adventures in my “AdvenChair,” a failed trip to the bottom of the Grand Canyon in 2016 eventually proved that a whole new chair was needed – one designed from the ground up, more like a sit-ski with high-grade aluminum mountain bike components and larger 27.5-inch mountain bike wheels.

During the development of this chair in 2017, and ironically 12 years to the day after my life-threatening stroke, I had a second stroke. While it set me back physically, forcing me to learn how to swallow, eat solid foods, and use my right hand all over again, it heightened my determination to bring the “AdvenChair 2.0” to reality. Not just for me, but for the millions of people around the world with limited mobility, and even more limited one-dimensional chairs. That brings us to today. In desperate need of funds to help produce several prototypes that can be thoroughly tested and ultimately brought to market in 2019. 

My goal is to have these chairs in widespread use throughout the world within the next five years. And through the Onward Project, LLC, I hope to have an extensive network of users sharing their AdvenChair stories and inspiring messages around the globe. Thank you for supporting me on this exciting journey. 

Onward!

 

OUR PARTNERS:

story:
The Story Summary

I graduated with First class honors in Hospitality management but wasn't very lucky in job searching as a fresh graduate. So i decided instead of scrambling for the few available opportunities, I should create new ones. So here we are.
story_txt:
The Story Summary
I graduated with First class honors in Hospitality management but wasn't very lucky in job searching as a fresh graduate. So i decided instead of scrambling for the few available opportunities, I should create new ones. So here we are.

story:
Short Summary

Growing up in the San Francisco Bay Area, we have seen a growing housing shortage as our valley transitioned from an agrarian society into the computer age and technology. Artificial Intelligence is beginning to drive some of our cars, we are saving photos and important documents to share in The Cloud, our phones allow us to do what it used to take a room full of computers. Simple supply and demand has driven those with average incomes in search of cheaper housing out of the valley and even out of state. Business still needs to be done face-to-face at times, so business travelers fly in a few days at a time and then when there are conventions, when the few hotels there are multiply their high rates many times the usual high price.  What is going on in our childhood home in Silicon Valley is a microcosm of several metropolitan cities.

Travel nurses are also becoming common, requiring stays away from their home city for 30 days to six months. In our area alone, in the past 12 months there have been 15,673 searches by travel nurses to find a room in one of only 200 properties posted on one platform. 

Beyond business, our area has many other great reasons to visit: beaches, concerts, weddings, funerals, reunions, and more, when travelers prefer to stay in a home environment where they can cook and relax in comfort, like they can't find in a sterile hotel.  In a home you don't have to overhear bachelor parties, drunk guests, anyone keeping a different schedule than you need or want. Staying in one of our properties, whether in the Bay Area or elsewhere, will give you that home away from home experience.

 

Steve: With 36 years in the trades, from landscaping to plumbing & electrical, etc. (18 years as a general contractor), Steve spent years in property management and design/build. A high level of customer service has always been his forte.

Bobbi: As an Executive Assistant for many industries for over 30 years supporting executives, Bobbi discovered her own drive toward entrepreneurial pursuits.  She loves refurbishing furniture and decorating homes and getting fresh ideas from HGTV.

Together: Bobbi & Steve have been a team since high school, married for 35 years, working together and traveling together (Canada & Mexico, England, Czech & Slovak Republics, Tanzania, The Netherlands) and hosting international students from all over the world for short visits or year-long visits has been a passion. The past two years we have been hosting in our home a friend who travels from his home in Oregon to work for a week or two at a time.  He compares our guest room to other Air BnBs he has stayed in and says we rank at the top.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need your help to launch our solution to travelers' desire to be able to relax in a quiet and comfortable environment. To get our network started, for our first 2-3 rentals including furnishings, we estimate will cost about $60,000. Bobbi is a master at gathering free and used furnishings and repurposing them and Steve is a great help with that. After we get three short-term rental properties going, we hope the net profit will allow us to add more properties. Our goal is to have 20-30 properties scattered throughout the Bay Area/SF/Santa Cruz, Monterey/Carmel, Lake Tahoe, San Diego and Disneyland Area (maybe popular areas in LA), Orlando, Texas, Nashville, and beyond. Your input for future locations is welcome, too!
  • Our perks are very useful.  Basically, you receive half your donation in discounts for a future stay beginning March 1, 2020 and never expiring.
  • Of course, we would love your help getting the word out about not only our 40-day crowdfunding campaign, but also as you stay in our properties, share with your friends and family about how you like the. Think local: friends and family for weddings, funerals, reunions, holidays and other family gatherings, etc., and then as you travel to your some of favorite destinations we may have properties there. The wonderful thing about a home is the limits on numbers like in a hotel room are not so stringent. Instead of only four, you can house 6-8 or more in a three bedroom house and more in a larger home.
  • Traditionally, for VRBO or Air BnB rentals, the owner is the one who posts and manages the rental. We are using a new model which has been successful for others we know, leasing rental properties with full knowledge and acceptance of property owners and actively managing the maid service, maintenance, master scheduling even employing a 24/7 Virtual Front Desk, and amenities.  This is our business and we will treat it as such, offering the personal touches that bring our travelers back time and again.

Benefits to property owners: 

  • no emergency calls (our maintenance teams handle all repairs under $100 free and manage after approval any maintenance that must be done
  • no worries about late rent (income from short-term renters more than covers all expenses)
  • professional cleaning each week for longer stays and definitely between guests upon check out
  • no funky paint colors, satellite dishes or unruly pets or children
  • no broken down cars or RVs in the driveway or on the street 
  • yards are professionally maintained
  • insurance policies carried by us cover accidental damages
  • we inspect each property several times a year, and weekly maid service regularly notifies us of any repairs or upgrades that need to happen
  • Not only will we be locating our short-term rentals in areas near universities and hospitals for students and professors and nurses, but hotels spend millions of dollars researching where to place their hotels so we will follow locations where there are hotels, of course offering our rooms much below the cost of hotels to help us judge the best locations to add properties. 

 

Indieogogo offers share tools for you to forward information about our campaign to your friends and family.  This campaign is planned to be in force for 60 days though so time is of the essence so we can launch this venture.

 

Check back on Indiegogo for updates and progress as we add properties and also at our website at www.workplaystays.com.

The wonderful thing about a home is the limits on numbers like in a hotel room are not so stringent. Instead of only four, you can house 6-8 or more in a three bedroom house and more in a larger home.
Traditionally, for VRBO or Air BnB rentals, the owner is the one who posts and manages the rental. We are using a new model which has been successful for others we know, leasing rental properties with full knowledge and acceptance of property owners and actively managing the maid service, maintenance, master scheduling even employing a 24/7 Virtual Front Desk, and amenities.  This is our business and we will treat it as such, offering the personal touches that bring our travelers back time and again.

Benefits to property owners: 

no emergency calls (our maintenance teams handle all repairs under $100 free and manage after approval any maintenance that must be done
no worries about late rent (income from short-term renters more than covers all expenses)
professional cleaning each week for longer stays and definitely between guests upon check out
no funky paint colors, satellite dishes or unruly pets or children
no broken down cars or RVs in the driveway or on the street 
yards are professionally maintained
insurance policies carried by us cover accidental damages
we inspect each property several times a year, and weekly maid service regularly notifies us of any repairs or upgrades that need to happen
Not only will we be locating our short-term rentals in areas near universities and hospitals for students and professors and nurses, but hotels spend millions of dollars researching where to place their hotels so we will follow locations where there are hotels, of course offering our rooms much below the cost of hotels to help us judge the best locations to add properties. 


 
Indieogogo offers share tools for you to forward information about our campaign to your friends and family.  This campaign is planned to be in force for 60 days though so time is of the essence so we can launch this venture.
 
Check back on Indiegogo for updates and progress as we add properties and also at our website at www.workplaystays.com.

story:
No matter what’s on your agenda, having an organized, neat, efficient backpack is critical to a successful, stress-free day.

Studies have shown that levels of cortisol (the stress hormone) are higher when your environment is cluttered, messy and disorganized.

The Organizer is here to let you customize your backpack for optimal efficiency. By choosing a better backpack, you’re preventing small daily frustrations and ultimately preserving your mental health. 

 

Modular Divider System™ 

Personalize your storage space and never dig around a messy backpack again.

Adjustable dividers feature Velcro ends to perfectly adhere to the interior walls of the backpack. There are two large dividers that can be rearranged to give you three total sections. These flexible dividers let YOU control compartment sizes, instead of a manufacturer.  

Instant Overview Side Opening

The side zipper opening gives you instant access and a quick overview of all your gear, eliminating the frustration of digging around in a seemingly never-ending bookbag hole. 

You can even access this without taking the bag off your body!

Laptop Compartment

The Organizer’s padded laptop compartment safely stores up to a 16" laptop or tablet.

Easy-access Top Compartment

Get quick access to items like your tablet, chargers, larger headphones and more, or use the mesh pocket for smaller items like your phone, wallet and earbuds. This compartment features a key holder to keep your keys close and secure, too.

Luggage Trolley Strap

The discretely and seamlessly designed luggage trolley strap lets you smoothly transport the Organizer on top of your travel suitcase when on the go.

 

Smart Inner Mesh Pockets

On the inside of the backpack flap, there are two perfectly sized mesh pockets with zippers to keep your items from falling out.

The mesh pockets can store items such as socks, undergarments, computer chargers or power banks, sunscreen, toiletries and more.

 

Activity Hook System™

With ten activity hooks, neatly and conveniently toting your accessories is easier than ever. With the two Activity Straps you can carry a tripod, yoga mat, skateboard, snowboard, skis... well you name it.  They are detachable and can be placed on the front and the sides of the backpack. 

 

Adjustable Comfort 

The back is made out of foam cushion and topped with 3D mesh to make sure the material is as breathable as possible. It’s designed to rest comfortably on the major muscles of your back, giving your spine a nice rest without direct pressure. 

The adjustable chest strap helps you stand taller and feel better while wearing a backpack. Plus, the ergonomic shoulder straps are padded, curved, and adjustable to meet the custom needs of your back

 

Daniel Ekstam spent about 300 days each year touring on the road, keeping most of his life in the backpack he carried. With his extremely busy schedule, it didn’t take much each day for him to start feeling burned out. When he burned out, he found that he had a really hard time packing his bags and staying organized for the day. This process would trigger a burnout again and again.

He started looking into small changes he could do to help him get by. His messy bags were the first place he looked — he decided to take an old photo backpack and remake it into a more organized solution. He tweaked and modified the bag to better suit his needs, and from there on, ZEEKSACK was born. It became his mission to help others customize their organization to reduce stress in the same way. After years of designing, researching and prototyping, Daniel teamed up with David Brudö, a mental well-being expert and entrepreneur, to help bring his ideas to life.

ZEEKSACK uses smart functionality and clever design to help people organize their lives and calm down, preserving their mental health and wellbeing. ZEEKSACK strives to show the world that small changes in unexpected ways can help you reduce stress and bring calmness to your everyday life. ZEEKSACK plans to continually introduce new travel gear and accessories that not just carry your stuff, but simplify and enrich your life by relieving unnecessary stress.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

There are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. That being said, we’re confident in our ability to produce, and have taken all the necessary measures. We have a highly qualified team and have partnered with leading manufacturing and fulfillment companies around the world. We just need your help to bring everything to fruition. Don’t worry, we’re completely prepared to bring The Organizer to you, and we have the manpower to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, you’ll be the first to know.
 

Warranty & Exchange

LIFETIME WARRANTY! Yes, We offer a lifetime guarantee on most of our products - even products received as Rewards or Perks (in this case, The Organizer backpack). If we're unable to fix or repair a manufacturing defect, we will replace the product, no questions asked.

Please note that scratches, scuffs, dents, and other blemishes that occur due to normal wear and tear of travels will not fall under The Organizer product warranty.

However, we do not offer refunds, returns, or exchanges on items received as Kickstarter Rewards or Indiegogo Perks.

Here is why:

As our Crowdfounding community, the items that you receive after making a pledge are referred to as "rewards/perks" because they are not purchases in the traditional sense. The support you’ve given us as backers enables us to grow and evolve our business, create new products, improve existing ones, and, last but not least, gather customer feedback. Therefore, we’re unable to offer refunds, returns, or exchanges on any rewards from this campaign.

We hope that you love The Organizer as much as we do and are satisfied upon your backpack arrival!

story:
I am a Russian born artist based in London. I am working on a unique photographic project entitled “Baltic Exchange”, for which I do a 7000 mile motorbike trip around the Baltic Sea. 

I am travelling from London to St Petersburg and back, creating a complete circle around the Baltic Sea, exchanging objects with people I meet on the way. Main outcomes of the projects will be a photography book and a touring exhibition starting in St Petersburg and London simultaneously. 

More about me and the project on my web site:

http://www.alexeymoskvin.co.uk/presentproject.s...

The project is supported by Icebreaker, WinSpeed, Rovaniemi Tourism & Marketing, Travel Marketing Oulu and NARITK, St Petersburg. Until some days ago I had all the funding I need to cover the travel expenses. However, going through St Petersburg had an accident which threw my budget out of the window. The story is published on the blog:


http://alexeymoskvin.wordpress.com/2011/06/10/s...


The full amount for the repair (and that's only to replace necessary parts, never mind scratches) is about £6500. I'm expecting to get about £2000 from insurance - unfortunately that is the limit of this type of insurance payouts in Russia. I am about £2500 short and cannot handle that on my own at this stage. The most expensive parts need replacing are the front frame, exhaust manifold, left cylinder cover, instrument cluster and all kinds of bits and bobs to reconstruct the front. 

If, by any chance, we exceed the amount needed, the rest of the money will go towards the costs of the production stage of the project - printing, show openings etc. 

Please spread the word and we'll get through this together.

story:
The aquabionic abs system is the result of a 3 year development process with the goal of creating a standardized, rock-solid binding interface between a boot and a fin-blade.

Inspired by progress made in similar applications in modern alpine skiing and in Shimano’s SPD bicycle pedal-binding-system we applied these same quality and performance standards to the abs system.

With our background in developing technology for the ski industry, collaboration with a leading manufacturer of ski-binding components in Austria was the logical choice- ultimately resulting in the realization of our intrinsically safe Y-frame binding system.

Changing the way diving fins will be used in the future! 

During the last 6 years of distributing our aquabionic1 fins- we learned that regardless of how progressive or efficient in design, with the standard model of fins the underlaying problems in fit, handling and performance persist.

By introducing the aquabionic abs system we proved that there is better technology than the outdated solution of using foot-pockets. 

Our protected slogan ‘ technically barefoot’ paraphrases our aspiration to create the perfect balance between physical requirements, ultimate user friendliness and design.

Due to the elimination of all material not contributing to thrust, the abs system weighs up to 35% less than the average open heel fin. This increases efficiency due to the reduction of accelerated mass on the up- and downstroke during finning. The system eliminates standard foot-pockets, diving booties and heel-straps while delivering unsurpassed comfort, performance and safety. 

The replacement of basic ‘foot-pockets’ with sophisticated technical footwear - the logical step in the evolution of diving fins. Our abs aquatic hybrid boots feature sole integrated technology that distributes blade forces homogenously into the “system diver”- without stressing or constraining the foot. Special boot uppers stabilize and cushion to provide a comfortable and secure fit, both on the ground and in the water.

 

Ergonomically and functionally advanced abs boots, offered in a whole size range, connect to fin-blade modules in different performance parameters, specifications and styles. 

abs technology eliminates common foot-pockets, traditional diving boots and heel straps. Divers now can connect any boot size to any fin-blade module. We eliminated all material not contributing to thrust to minimize drag and applied sole integrated ski-binding technology to optimize the transfer of blade forces to our new boot.

 

Similar to cross-country or alpine ski-bindings, the abs integral blade/binding units interlock with the abs boots and form an inseparable unit- until you release the blades with the flip of a lever.  The abs binding clips are a part of the blade-module and will not come off unintentionally.

abs integral binding clips are a combination of materials typically used in the production of ski bindings- also produced by a leading ski-binding component manufacturer in Austria. They are designed to guarantee very high functionality and safety, are assembled by hand to ensure maximum quality, are resistant to UV and Saltwater and guarantee high fatigue resistance.

Modular fin-blades with patented, integrated Y-frame technology feature the world’s first standardized contact point for a fin-blade to a technical boot. This enables integral attachment of all present and future fin-blades to all available boot sizes. All fin-blade components are manufactured using top of the line injection molding machines from ENGEL and BATTENFELD. Our fin blades are made of virtually indestructible thermoplastic polyurethanes in various shore hardnesses to provide perfect dynamic performance.

CARBON-BLADE MODULE: Very responsive and powerful blade bridging the gap from advanced snorkeling to free diving and spearfishing. Provides carbon material and free diving performance at a very competitive price point.

WARP-BLADE MODULE: Latest version of our patented warp technology, first introduced with the original aquabionic1 fin. Perfect for SCUBA and advanced snorkelling. Featuring forced adaptive dynamic cupping and spreading, warp technology amplifies a diver’s kick impulse by aligning and accelerating water into mono-directional thrust. This innovative technology allows the fin to be precise and maneuverable at low thrust and increasingly powerful and responsive when more propulsion is needed.

HYBRID-BLADE MODULE: Perfect entry level fin-blade for all activities. Combines the ease and comfort of a typical paddle blade with the thrust of our patented warp technology. 

 

abs thermal neoprene socks provide warmth and foot protection or can be worn with slightly oversized boots for an additional layer in cold diving conditions. Choose the long version when diving with a wetsuit. Liners are made from 2/3/5/6 nylon 2 neoprene with a multi-panel design allowing for an anatomical shape. A non-slip screen print on the sole provides better grip on slippery surfaces. The socks seams are glued and blind stitched for strength and comfort. Available in multiple sizes.

 

Funding goes in its entirety to the generation of final tooling and into fine-tuning of components. We are in the final stages of our R&D/design process and already own tooling for several components of the abs system. Preparing gradation for our range of abs boots based on the MondoPoint sizing system is the next step in the development process- before the creation of molds for all required boot sizes.

A heartfelt thank you to everyone who is helping to bring the abs system to life!

By supporting us you are bringing innovation into the water sports industry to reinvent equipment that has been largely unchanged for over 90 years.

THE CETATEK TEAM
