story:
We spent over a year designing and perfecting the ultimate packable bag. The lack of  GOOD options in the market called for a technical, lightweight, and packable bag that is made to go EVERYWHERE. We bring you exactly that in the E-Pack... and then some.  

      Your new favorite travel companion 

The E-pack is perfect for hiking, biking, traveling, and quick jaunts around town. With over a year of field tested designs and technical fabrics, our pack is completely dialed.

    

          

                    Built For The Journey

Ykk zippers, Duraflex buckles, water-resistant/stain-resistant fabrics, and H.P. mesh allow the E-pack to attach to anything and go everywhere. The self contained compression port is constructed from high performance mesh and rip-stop fabric to make packing and unpacking the E-pack effortless. 

 

     B

                                Bag Weight: 10.5 oz without blanket | 12.5 with blanket

  

                        Adapts to your daily transitions

Life's changing beat requires the perfect bag as your sidekick. The E-Pack adapts to your needs, whether it's commuting around town, traveling abroad, or charging up a summit. It's designed to be precisely the pack you'll reach for when you need one. 

  

      

          ADAPTABLE PROTECTION + SECURE STOWAGE

 Locking YKK zippers and internal pocketing keep the main compartment secure so you can       easily store a laptop, passport, and other valuable essentials worry free.   

   

     

      

   

 

      

            

             

 

         

Risks and challenges

PRODUCT WARRANTY: 
We back our products for a lifetime and have a warranty facility in Salt Lake where a crew of expert technicians can repair your product.

SHIPPING, VAT, CUSTOMS & DUTIES: 
Your pledge does not include VAT, GST, or other country taxes. Our terms of sale for International order is FOB destination which means all freight, duties and taxes are paid by those who have supported our kickstarter campaign.

All order will ship directly from our distributions center in Salt Lake City, UT. Each package will come with a tracking number and we will be happy to help solve any problems that arise during the shipping processes.

PRODUCTION QUESTIONS: 
Luckily you have chosen to back a team that collectively has years of manufacturing experience. We love manufacturing but sometimes it does not run as smooth as planned. Using large textile mills and large factories help to produce quality and timely manufacturing.

We are using the highest quality trims (Ykk + Duraflex) and these manufactures have a large supply chain. This insures that if one manufacture is fully booked, they are other manufactures in place to produce.

The E-Packs fabrics come mainly from Taiwan. These are the same mills that make fabrics for your favorite brands such as Timbuk2, Arcteryx, Patagonia, Northface, Adidas, and so on. All preproduction steps have been taken so that once we are funded, the mills will go into production. We are not expecting any delays longer than 2-3 weeks, in the event of a scheduling delay.

Manufacturing is where things get complicated because of all the inbound pieces to the puzzle. We have a great relationship our factory and have taken the appropriate steps to ensure a timely production. We ask that you have patience if our project has astronomical orders. Fabric and trims are made by machines, our products are made by people and we are loyal to those people. In the event of astronomical orders, we foresee a 2-4 week delay.

Shipping and clearing customs is standard and will have no delays unless an unforeseen event occurs such as a typhoon, earthquake, or strike.

Fulfillment will be an easy process. We will have daily updates and tracking numbers on each item. A label will be placed on the package and a tracking number sent to your email.

We hope to bring you a transparent and fun look into production. Due to our previous years in production we have a team of forwarders, designers, pattern makers, technicians, and sewers who will produce your product to perfection.

story:
Our Story

We're eight Columbia University students heading for warmer climes this spring break â€“ but weâ€™re swapping tanning in Cabo for community service in Cairo. From March 9th to 17th, we'll be in the Egyptian capital interacting with the local community in two ways.  First, we'll be spending our days helping out at an orphanage in an impoverished neighborhood to ensure that both the kids and the staff are getting the support they need.  Then, in the evenings, we'll be meeting with NGOs and civil society groups to discuss their experiences during Egypt's transition.

The Impact

We're aiming to impact three communities.  First, in Cairo, we'll be helping out at the Sisters of Charity Orphanage in the Muqattam neighborhood, which is largely populated by Egyptian Copts whose main livelihood is garbage collection.  The current political climate in Cairo has kept many volunteers away and the orphanage is in greater need of assistance than ever. Not only will we be helping out an especially deprived community, but doing so at an especially needy time.  Second, through our evening discussions, we want to gain a ton of insight into the experiences of Cairenes past the headlines we see everyday. During our discussions with activists, ranging from womenâ€™s rights representatives to fellow college students, we will be delving into the challenges facing civil society in a period of transition. Finally, we hope to spread awareness about such experiences to our own community in New York by engaging in various post-trip projects, including a photography exhibition, newspaper articles, and on-campus events such as guest lectures.

What We Need & What You Get

This trip is a collective effort, and any contribution you can make helps!  The total cost of our trip is $10,000, and we'll be supplementing our fundraising here with a matching grant from Columbia and corporate sponsors, as well as on-campus events.  Your contributions will help us pay for airfare, hostel accommodations, transportation once we're there--all of which are bare bones and low budget.  Any amount you can contribute, even $5, $10 or $20, will pay major dividends: not only are we directly impacting the local community while we're there, but also affecting our own after our return.

In return, we'll keep you in the loop on all our activities through our blog and e-mails.  If you donate $25, we'll send you a goody bag of Egyptian treats after our return, and if you donate a minimum of $50, we'll also include some crafts from Cairo!

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help us out by spreading the word!  Do you know somebody who's interested in the issues facing Egypt and wants to be involved in a low key way?  Or just has a particularly philanthropic streak?  Or likes children?  Let them know about our trip and how they can make a big impact with just a few dollars.

newspaper articles, and on-campus events such as guest lectures. 
What We Need & What
You GetThis trip is a collective
effort, and any contribution you can make helps!  The total cost of our
trip is $10,000, and we'll be supplementing our fundraising here with a
matching grant from Columbia and corporate sponsors, as well as on-campus
events.  Your contributions will help us pay for airfare, hostel
accommodations, transportation once we're there--all of which are bare bones
and low budget.  Any amount you can contribute, even $5, $10 or $20, will
pay major dividends: not only are we directly impacting the local community while
we're there, but also affecting our own after our return.
In return, we'll keep you
in the loop on all our activities through our blog and e-mails.  If you
donate $25, we'll send you a goody bag of Egyptian treats after our return, and
if you donate a minimum of $50, we'll also include some crafts from Cairo!
Other Ways You Can HelpYou can also help us out
by spreading the word!  Do you know somebody who's interested in the
issues facing Egypt and wants to be involved in a low key way?  Or just
has a particularly philanthropic streak?  Or likes children?  Let
them know about our trip and how they can make a big impact with just a few
dollars.

story:
What is Pedal The Planet

I am currently undertaking a huge challenge of cycling 18,000 miles (29,000km) through 25 countries in an attempt to break the current World Record for circumnavigating the globe. The current target is sub 125 days. I am aiming to complete this as an example to people who also find themselves without hope and not seeing a future in their lives

In October 2010, weighing 125kg, unhappy in work, single, depressed and feeling suicidal, I set ten personal challenges to try and turn my life around in a positive direction. Challenge Ten became the diary of my journey of fifty blind dates, changing careers, learning to cook and swim, losing 20kg, finishing a marathon, cycling around New Zealand, triathlons and open water sea swims and overcoming a fear of public speaking and performing. Pedal The Planet has evolved from that starting list.

What We Need & What You Get

I am accompanied on the cycle by a support team of two people (Sara & Louise), their roles include driving the support vehicle, cooking, bike maintenance, filming for the documentary, photography as well as all the crazy things that crop up from time to time. None of the support staff or myself will benefit financially from any funds raised as part of this crowd-funding campaign. All members of the team are providing our time (100+ days) for free.

The complete budget for this project including all three staff is €55,000. This includes bike and camping equipment, flights, ferries and transfers, insurance, communications, visas, immunisations, etc. I have paid €14,000 towards the campaign which represents the cost of my participation in the event. The remaining costs are being raised through a number of sources including this campaign. Any remaining monies will be passed to Cycle Against Suicide to continue the important work.

The Impact

In 2012, worldwide over 800,000 people took their own lives. This figure was 525 in Ireland alone. That's more than triple the number of deaths on our roads for the same period and almost nine times the number of murders which took place in the country. 

Every day we read about murders and road traffic deaths in the papers, but we fail to talk about one of the biggest killers around. Mental Health! Depression and suicidal thoughts are treatable. Help is available from a variety of sources. We need to let people know that these options exist. 

Three years ago, I was able to turn the direction of my life around simply by asking for assistance from my friends, family & colleagues. The support was then, and has been since, absolutely astounding. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't in a position financially to purchase any of the rewards, it's not the end of the world. There are two ways you can support this campaign

1. You can help simply by spreading the message using Facebook and Twitter using the hashtag #PedalThePlanet and maybe with the power of a crowd we can help save lives.

2. Talk to your family, friends and loved ones, ask them how they are feeling and actually take a couple of minutes to actually listen to the response.

If one person chooses to live, this entire campaign will be worthwhile.

Thank you in advance to everyone who supports this campaign. You have no idea of the difference this might make to a single person, their family and community.

story:
• Battery Charger
  • Bluetooth Scale
  • Spacious
  • Water resistant
  • TSA approved
  • Lifetime warranty
  • Free shipping worldwide

Tooling has been started! We are testing the aluminium frame and polycarbonate hard shell.

 

No one likes to pay for the overweight luggage. There is a weight sensor in the suitcase's handle that lets you weigh your luggage. You just lift up and look at the companion app for the measurement and repack the bag in last minutes. 

 

This is a great feature for the more forgetful among us, especially if you are in a rush to a gate and leaving your bag behind.

Reserve your Ready luggage today and get hands on it before others.

Order Now and get the FREE SHIPPING

 

 

The hard shell exterior is made of 100% Bayer Makrolon polycarbonate, a material unrivaled in strength and impact resistance. If you put weight on it, it bends rather than cracks.

 

Ready also has rubber gasket seals protecting contents from the harshest weather conditions. The exterior is completely water-resistant, capable of protecting my stuff from wet grass, dirty floors, and sudden summer showers.

 

Ready is built with advanced technology to keep it always looking good, so you don't have to worry too much about the dents (again using it as a chopping board is not recommended).

Ready can charge any USB device, so you can find a seat, park Ready next to you, and charge your phone before boarding your flight. You’ll always be able to check your email or take a call.

Battery being removable means you can get through the security without problems. It also means you can use the power bank you already have, so you don't have to pay extra for a new one.

For those who don't have an extra power bank, we also offer a 10,000mAh one, please choose the battery perk and place the order.

Ready carry-on will be delivered (Free Shipping) to you in June, perfect for your summer break! Time to plan a new journey with Ready luggage.

Ready, Go.

Ready carry-on's body is spacious enough for a week's stuff.

Ready pouches can create protective compartments for your belongings and keeping them tidy and organized throughout your trip. Get one pouch set at discouted price.

A helpful strap to fasten your handbag, backpack or briefcase securely on top.

After trying several alternatives, we find out one simple and elegant solution to avoid the bag falling off.

Travel could be the beginning of future, the story of present and the memory of past.

Ready shares many design elements of Bauhaus-style electronic products, together with the cross-border material crafting, Ready carry-on stands out through unique design.

The frame is made of aircraft grade aluminum and can absorbs impact from the outside, thus better protecting your items.

In addition, Ready is produced by molds, then secured together with screws and rivets, which makes Ready more durable and you do not have to worry about annoying zipper failures.

Ready luggage has a multi-stage handle made of Aluminum, it is strong enough to stand on top of it (we won’t recommend doing this though).

Ready luggage has no zippers, instead there is an integrated TSA combination lock that provides peace of mind when checking cases through security.

Its four 360° spinner wheels make moving around the airport a breeze. The wheels glide extremely smoothly on both carpeted and smooth floor.

Ready fits within the TSA size regulations and with a hard exterior shell, it will stay within those regulations no matter how much you pack.

Available in Black, White and Green.

We are a team aiming to deliver products that can bring you the best travel experience. Our work on Ready started a year and half ago and now we are already in the mass production stage. Below are some videos taken from the factory.

 

 

Polyurethane tires make for one smooth 360 degree ride.
 
Strong top handle bar is strong enough to hold 30kg weight.
 
Smooth aluminum handle is undergoing testing. 

 

Ready was thoughtful about its design. The luggage is packed in an easily opened cardboard box. The carry-on suitcase arrives in a high quality bag that you can keep for storage when you're not traveling.

By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first Ready Carry-On off the line plus exclusive access to prices only available during the Indiegogo campaign.

And we offer FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE during the campaign. There is no surprise when you checkout.

Pre-orders for all Ready Carry-On now will be delivered for Mid June. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.    

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

Have a friend who needs this? Want to share? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!
The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become.
Let's do this.

We designed and build Ready to last a lifetime and we stand behind the quality and durability of our products. If your bag ever breaks down, just ship it back to us. We'll either repair it or replace it, and return it to you. It's our lifetime guarantee to you.

 

What would a suitcase be like? Before started, I cleared my perception of the conventional suitcase, simply start form “LESS BUT MORE”, follow the train of thinking to seek the true meaning of travel, and then redefine the suitcase. It should be more than just a simple box, just as the radio carries the music, the suitcase should save your feeling when travel. It will have witnessed the journey you have share with it for a certain period of time. Since it shared many design elements of Bauhaus-style electronic products, together with the cross-border material crafting, Ready carry-on stands out through unique design.

What is it? Ready is a stylish and smart Carry-On that makes your trip as convenient as possible. It has a built-in charger and weight scale. Made from aircraft grade aluminium and 100% polycarbonate, it can protect your items better. With a TSA-lock it provides peace of mind when checking cases through security. Carry-On approved.
Who created it? We're a team of 5 who come from a variety of backgrounds including engineering, design and commercial manufacturing. Our brand, Ready, is a fashion brand that specializes in truly innovative travel accessories.
Why should we use it? Stylish, Smart and Strong, Ready luggage will be a personal travel companion for your future trips. We aimed higher to ensure Ready is a perfect balance of form, function and fashion.
How much does it cost? IndieGoGo backers can get Ready Carry-On at $199 - up to 40% off the retail price of $339. And FREE Shipping!
Where can we buy it? Right here on Indiegogo! Pre-order yours today to be one of the first people to get these bags.
What do we get when we order? One Ready carry on of your choice.
Why are you crowdfunding? We love crowdfunding! For us, it's a perfect solution to ensure we meet minimum order quantities for the first production batch - our tooling is done and we're ready to scale up our manufacturing.

Which airlines does it work with? Ready Carry-On is sized to fit official airline regulations at 55cm x 36cm x 23cm (21” x 13” x 9”). It flies on (almost) any plane, anywhere, anytime.
How do I charge my phone? The USB ports are located on the back and near the handle of your suitcase. You can plug in charge cable the USB port no matter the handle is lifted on not.
How do I recharge the battery in the luggage? Ready Carry-On comes with a micro-USB cord for charging the suitcase. Or you can take out the battery and charge it like a normal power bank. Because the Ready battery has such a high capacity, it can take up to 12 hours to fully charge—we recommend plugging it in overnight before your trip.
Is the battery removable? Yes! To remove the battery, open the zipper under the side handle of Ready Carry-On. Then just slide it out.
Is the battery legally allowed in a Carry-On bag? Your suitcase battery is compliant with FAA, TSA, and DOT regulations and meets UN/DOT 38.3 requirements. It can be carried onto any flights. If you need to take out the battery for any reason, simply open the zip for quick removal.
What colors do you offer? White, Green, Black.
Why should I choose a hard shell luggage? Durability is a high priority for travelers, especially considering that most people will use laptops, iPads, cameras and other sophisticated electronics. Hard shell suitcases have obvious advantages in protecting electronic products.  The same is true for keeping the luggage clean. Softer cases can absorb water, and are more susceptible to stains and smells.
What’s aluminum frame?  The aluminum frame absorbs most of the impact from the outside, thus better protecting your items. In addition, the suitcases are made by molds, then secured together with screws and rivets, which makes them more durable and you do not have to worry about annoying zipper failures.

When does shipping begin? Shipping for the first batch of Ready Carry-On will begin in June 2017.
When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps? All orders are expected to be delivered to your doorsteps for mid June 2017.
Where does it ship? We're proud to ship Ready Carry-On worldwide. There is no shipping cost for all the orders during campaign.
How much is shipping? We offer FREE Shipping worldwide! No hidden cost!
I'm interested in a distribution partnership. Please contact support@readytravel.co and include in your email the region(s) you distribute to.
What are the risks and challenges of getting the device today? There are risks with production at every step of the way, but luckily for you, we've done all the hard work of getting a product through the tooling process and getting ready for scale. We are using Indiegogo as a way to validate our product. All of the numbers are real, and the backers are real. We want your help to keep us and our team accountable at every step of the way. Now, we just want your help to scale the production process and get all units ready to ship. If there is anything you need to change or update, just reach out to us!

Is there a warranty? Yes. Ready Carry-On comes with a Lifetime Warranty. Our luggage, excluding the electronic components, is guaranteed by a lifetime warranty which covers any damage to the shell, wheels, handles, zippers, or anything else that functionally impairs the luggage. If anything breaks, we will fix or replace it for you. It does not cover gradual wear and tear throughout it's lifetime that is to be expected from normal use.
The electronic components themselves are guaranteed by a two-year warranty. We will offer replacement batteries for purchase in the future and will make sure they improve with technology advancements.
How do I order an extra Ready Carry-On? Ready Carry-On is quite expensive for us to make and ship. We’ve tried to keep the pricing to a bare minimum and offered  FREE Shipping. 
What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign? See these steps on How to Request a Refund. During the Indiegogo campaign, you can process the refund at any time by contacting crowdfund@indiegogo.com or searching their help center. Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.
What is your return / exchange policy?​ If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, with extra shipping & handling fees. Indiegogo does process refunds during the campaign. If you would like a refund, we're sorry to see you go. Please see here for How to Request a Refund. 
How do I choose more than one reward? To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.
How can I check the status of my pre-order? By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.
If I have other questions, who should I contact?

Support: support@readytravel.co

story:
HEAT-O is... 

a wearable modular heating system key to maintaining optimal body temperature in the cold environment.

Over the last couple of decades, technology has been known to satisfy and increase our daily lives, but when it is cold everyone is affected in the same way. This is why we have been inspired to change this particular instance, this is why we have created HEAT-O.

 

 

How to use it?

You place heating elements on your body under any kind of clothing. You configure and control eight heating elements. Plug in to the battery, and viola! 

 

Basic set of components: remote controller, charger, battery and heating pads.

 

 

Who is it for?

HEAT-O is for professionals, amateurs, and everyone in between. Specify the type of cold activity you are participating in and we will ensure that HEAT-O has a purpose for you. From daily use to professional use in sports, hobbies and work duties.

Thanks to the modularity you can also use HEAT-O for rehabilitation purposes (thermotherapy) and any disability.

 

 

Why it rocks?

HEAT-O is solving common problems encountered when using the standard electrically heated clothing, such as water resistance, safety and multitasking. The system does not interfere with movements, is fully waterproof, works and is safe in full water immersion.

 

 

For Divers

 

TEMPERATURE RANGE
The temperature range created by heating pads is from 15°C to 40°C (from 59°F to 104°F). There is also Auto mode for automatic temperature holding via build in thermostat inside main heating panel.

AUTO MODE FOR DIVING
We are preparing a heating program for one hour diving. It starts on a low heating setting and rises proportionally to the diving time. 

ACCESSIBILITY IN ANY CONDITIONS
Controller is equipped with spin a switch to work in underwater pressure. Legible Led indicator will show you on which setting you are even in a complete darkness.

WATER RESISTANT
All components are IP68 (all elements under the suit) except for a controller that is 100WR.

STANDARDS
For controller we are providing universal connectors to work with any type of drysuit inflation valve with integrated 12V connector.

SAFETY
Battery interior components – electronic and cells – are fully covered in a flexible polyurethane so there are no air spaces.

IN CASE OF EMERGENCY
Battery is smart, in case of any malfunctions in heating installation it shuts off the power automatically. 

 

 

HEAT-O is designed to be placed close to the body to gain a maximum heating performance with minimum energy loss. It’s a combination of two sets. Thanks to this, you can cover all crucial upper and lower body parts. You can place the heating pads directly where you want and you don’t need to change your outfit to suit the fitting. You can make as many variations as you wish.

The heating pads are made of a very thin, flexible and resistant material. Your grip and sensitivity of your hands stay the same and they’re very comfortable when performing any manual work. The same attributes apply to the heating pads when worn in your shoes.

HEAT-O has been designed to ensure that there is no obstruction to the user. This installation is a combination of carbon fiber and high quality electric cables in silicone insulation with an additional cable housing.

To maximize the efficiency of the heating, the elements are made based on your gender, height and weight.

  • Waterproof. The heating pads and the whole installation is fully waterproof including battery, connector and controller IP68. 
  • Flexibility. Feel the freedom of keeping warm in cold temperatures: HEAT-O is made of two units (upper and lower), each one with 4 heating elements. The heated pads are made up of carbon fiber and are water isolated thanks to our design. Place them wherever you decide. 
  • Wardrobe Compatibility. Irrelevant of whether you are wearing a sweat suit or heavy gear, HEAT-O will ensure the ultimate comfort, and no particular outfit is required. It will perform according to your requirements, will fit to any kind of dress code, and will not obstruct you in any way. 
  • Light & Warm. HEAT-O is light and non-invasive. You'll feel its effect when youre body warms up. Heating panels are breathable and they do not stop evaporation of your body.

 

 

 

 

The Battery is the centre of every HEAT-O related activity. It has been designed to work for up to 15 hours. A combination of special silicone and polyurethane, which make up the battery case, increases its protection from damage, and can bend and adjust to fit your body. 

The DC connector, which connects the battery and heating pads, is waterproof. In the event of any mechanical damage to the installation and heating pads, the battery will switch off automatically to keep its use as safe as possible. 

Both batteries – small and large have control buttons on the case to set up the temperature level just in case you don’t want to use O-Remote or your smart device.

  • Temperature range: from 15°C to 40°C (from 59°F to 104°F)
  • Operating hours: HEAT-O Core, HEAT-O Dive: up to 15 hours (auto mode); HEAT-O Lite small battery: up to 5 hours; O-Remote – up to 40 hours
  • Charging: The battery can be charged with your HEAT-O Charger, and every charger with DC socket or 12V in car charger

 

 

 

 

To set up the heating level we have designed a waterproof remote controller – the O-Remote which communicates with the battery via Bluetooth. We take its ergonomic quality as one of our utmost priorities.

 

 

O-Remote in action

 

Ergonomics. O-Remote controller has got a spin switch and a led display to set up the heating level. This is why you can operate your remote even with the thickest gloves and in the darkness.

Application. It is not a necessity to use the remote if you prefer to control your temperature by means of your smartphone or smartwatch. For this purpose, you will be able to download the free application for your mobile device.

 

 

 

 

 

The HEAT-O Charger can easily charge your O-Remote (inductive charging) and the battery (wire charging) at the same time. We’ve equipped the charger with 2 additional USB ports and an induction charging capability, so you can use it for your other devices, like your mobile phone, tablet or smart watch.

 

 

 

HEAT-O is available in four versions for different types of activity:

 

HEAT-O Core is a basic set designed for most users. For drysuit diving enthusiasts there is a diving set available – HEAT-O Dive. If you are a fan of open machines, ie.: motorcycles, quads, snowmobiles, there is a HEAT-O Drive set – to power the heating system directly from the vehicle battery or 12V lighter socket. For less demanding users, there is a HEAT-O Lite – fleece vest with six heating elements.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

For each HEAT-O Core and HEAT-O Dive set you will receive additional elements: a led bag and scarf. 

 

Led Bag. The led bag is designed for carrying your set. In the centre there is a led installation and a 6.4 ft. (2 meters) power cord. After connecting the cable to the HEAT-O battery you will have a glowing lantern, which can also be used as a led torch or lamp.

The bag also includes a 6.4 ft. (2 meters) red led strip as extra lighting or an SOS signal. If four people have a HEAT-O red led strip, a red cross signal 13 ft. (4 meters) can be arranged. You can set up the brightness level directly from your remote controller, O-Remote. All less are IP65. 

 

 

Scarf. The Fleece Scarf has 6 pockets, into which you can insert the heating elements. You can use it as a scarf, mask or hat.

 

 

Design

After two years of prototyping, developing and testing our HEAT-O device, we have come up with the ultimate shape and design. We wanted to ensure that the heating system works well in the toughest conditions and make sure it is user-friendly.

Moving from concept sketches towards 3D project.

 

All the elements of the HEAT-O device are our own design and creation. Along the way we encountered many challenges such as achieving:

  • Heating installation modularity (possibility to fit to every individual’s shape) 
  • Waterproof abilities for all elements 
  •  Battery life due to impulse output and receiving thermostat signal 
  • Battery flexibility
  • Resistance for mechanical damages
  • Remote controllers and apps
  • Charger

 

 

 

30 seconds...

...so much of your time is needed to bring us closer to the aim pursued and share HEAT-O with the world.

Help us by sharing HEAT-O with your friends! 

Like what you're seeing? Great! Don't be shy about sharing HEAT-O with your friends. We've made it super easy. Just hit one of the buttons below (or at the top of the page) – it's just 30 seconds!

The more people know about HEAT-O the closer to the aim pursued, let's share it with the world! We cannot do this without you!

 

 

 

Size

For the correct fitting, we just need your gender, height and weight. HEAT-O will be individually designed to match your size. We will conduct a survey for these details when the campaign ends.

 

Warranty & Return

 

 

  • 3-year warranty on every element. Your warranty begins on the date of the receipt
  • You can return it within 14 days

 

Shipping

  • Estimated delivery June 2017
  • Shipment from UK
  • The price does not include taxes and customs duties for your country

 

 

 

Artur Stawicki. Has experience in many engineering works for large construction projects in the Nordic winters as an engineer. This gave him the idea to develop a new heating system from scratch, for people who need it. He likes to spend his spare time actively and follows new technical innovations. His most important goal was to ensure that this project could be used by everyone, during all kinds of activities and in all conditions.

Adam Hudyma. A huge enthusiast of outdoor activities, extreme sports, and survival techniques. On a regular basis he is following and testing the latest technical solutions on those matters. He joined the HEAT-O project without any hesitation. By profession he is a UX and visual designer. The external appearance and functionality of the components is his input. He also made valuable comments on the practicality of the HEAT-O in the field.

James Gray. James has the sweetest character in our entire package, and has the gift of winning people over :) He is also a fan of active living, he likes swimming and cycling. A specialist in internet selling and customer service. Keeps track on technical innovations, especially in the field of IT and wireless technology.

We would like to thank our friends and collaborators, especially:

  • Photez
  • Stamtad Film
  • The Origin

 

Anything else do you need to know?

Yes! For your convenience we have created a FAQ section where you can find more detailed information. We will be posting the updates on Kickstarters Update Wall. With a great pleasure we will reply to your comments/questions/emails so please feel free to contact us at any time! 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Prototype. 
The product that you can see before you is complete, but for now is still a prototype, and will be put through more tests to improve it.

Production. 
To limit manufacturing delays, we have decided to produce HEAT-O in the EU. We designed the product and now we have designed a production line. The funds that we need will be used to supply the tools required in order to produce the individual components of the product and to purchase materials. The whole production will be carried out alone to have a guarantee of the highest quality. We are ready to start any time now, however, we can be affected by material shortages from our suppliers. Many years of experience in producing sportswear allows us to properly plan production and shipping. We are also ready to meet large orders and satisfy many of our backers and supporters.

Delivery. 
We will do our best to meet the promised delivery date but there may be: 

  • Shipments that are lost or damaged. 
  • Delivery delays due to weather conditions. 
  • Incorrect address provided. We will keep you updated on any of the above obstacles that may affect us.

Thank You for your support and stay warm! 
HEAT-O Team

HEAT-O is... a wearable modular heating system key to maintaining optimal body temperature in the cold environment.Over the last couple of decades, technology has been known to satisfy and increase our daily lives, but when it is cold everyone is affected in the same way. This is why we have been inspired to change this particular instance, this is why we have created HEAT-O.  How to use it?You place heating elements on your body under any kind of clothing. You configure and control eight heating elements. Plug in to the battery, and viola! 

 


Basic set of components: remote controller, charger, battery and heating pads.
 
 
Who is it for?

HEAT-O is for professionals, amateurs, and everyone in between. Specify the type of cold activity you are participating in and we will ensure that HEAT-O has a purpose for you. From daily use to professional use in sports, hobbies and work duties.
Thanks to the modularity you can also use HEAT-O for rehabilitation purposes (thermotherapy) and any disability.
 
 
Why it rocks?
HEAT-O is solving common problems encountered when using the standard electrically heated clothing, such as water resistance, safety and multitasking. The system does not interfere with movements, is fully waterproof, works and is safe in full water immersion.


 
 
For Divers
 
TEMPERATURE RANGEThe temperature range created by heating pads is from 15°C to 40°C (from 59°F to 104°F). There is also Auto mode for automatic temperature holding via build in thermostat inside main heating panel.
AUTO MODE FOR DIVINGWe are preparing a heating program for one hour diving. It starts on a low heating setting and rises proportionally to the diving time. 
ACCESSIBILITY IN ANY CONDITIONSController is equipped with spin a switch to work in underwater pressure. Legible Led indicator will show you on which setting you are even in a complete darkness.
WATER RESISTANTAll components are IP68 (all elements under the suit) except for a controller that is 100WR.
STANDARDSFor controller we are providing universal connectors to work with any type of drysuit inflation valve with integrated 12V connector.
SAFETYBattery interior components – electronic and cells – are fully covered in a flexible polyurethane so there are no air spaces.

story:
The Rohk Pen has a phenomenal list of features (below), rarely seen even in well-designed Everyday Carry products.

Its striking aesthetic took shape after researching the weaknesses of disposable plastic pens and metal tactical pens.

As long as supplies last, every backer gets a stylish aluminium capsule with each pen - free! (See its numerous uses below)

The Rohk Pen eliminates all the above weaknesses and more.

As a result, it is guaranteed for life.

The Rohk's single-piece body features an integrated pocket clip that can never be detached, has zero assembly hardware, and is very difficult to break.

The bolt (the single moving part) features an ergonomic handle that cannot be broken, bent, or otherwise compromised.

Pocket-friendly in size, weight and price.

Ideally sized for hammerfist grip.

The bolt handle is also angled away from the body to prevent pokes.

The bolt action has proven to be an exceptional mechanism for pens.

Its fail-proof nature prevents inked pockets, and the absence of caps allows single-handed use :

In addition to lifetime reliability, the addictive latching sound has become very popular with fans of cool design.

Glove-friendly.

Built to stand out. The gimping on the right is inspired by knife blades.

Shockproof body will punch through obstacles without a scratch.

Sits securely in MOLLE /PALS webbing. Ideally sized for EDC pouches.

The Rohk Pen is made of a special Glass Fibre Reinforced Polymer. Our impact-specific GFRP formula results in a brutally tough structure.

Fibre-reinforced polymers are commonly used in making ballistic armor, and in aerospace-, automotive-, marine- and construction industries.

Due to its simple mechanism, the Rohk Pen will likely outlast all others (especially metal pens with assembly hardware).

The Rohk Pen is compatible with most refills.

It comes with a G2 or Parker-style refill (1mm nib, black). This is the industry standard, and used by 90% of the world's ballpoint pens.

This Epic Refill Reference Guide shows the massive list of Rohk-compatible refills. You can also find most nib point sizes for the G2.

For those who prefer Fisher Space refills - you'll be happy to know every SPR-series refill comes with a Parker-style insert that is compatible with the Rohk.

There are 9 reward levels, all clearly outlined on the right. Please message us if you have any questions.

Backers get a free aluminium capsule with every pen ordered! (until supplies last)

These tubes are a useful accessory while travelling/camping/hiking, and make for stylish gifts along with the Rohk Pen -

 

Keyn-2 Pocket Key Organizer (A relaunched Keyn bonus - only for backers!) :

 

Risks and challenges

Yes, there are risks involved in designing something from scratch and bringing it into the world.

However, we've had a running start. After a successful Kickstarter campaign, our suppliers are ready for another production run. The pen's injection moulds have been made, tested, and are standing by. The pictures you see above are production quality samples from these moulds.

Shipping delays are sometimes outside our control, and if they occur we'll keep you posted every step of the way. Having shipped key organizers to customers worldwide, we're better equipped to anticipate these delays and adapt swiftly.

Those of you who are familiar with Ketalon's customer service will also know that if things go wrong, we do anything to make it right.

story:
The New Standard for the Discrete Storage and Transport of Dry Herbs, Oils, Waxes and Accessories.

Arriving Early Summer 2016


The Hi-Lifer Solution

The concept for creating the Hi-Lifer was born out of the frustration we've all felt attempting to haphazardly transport our smallest, most-prized possessions without success. Before Hi-Lifer, transportation mediums usually took the form of baggies, pop-top pill bottles that never seem to stay closed, socks and anything else that made sense.  Utilizing these types of arbitrary carrying cases typically resulted spills, leaks, strong odors and, ultimately, discovery.  Hi-Lifer provides a solution for everyone who is ready to have a sensible option to carrying their most cherished items. 

Superior Design for Dry Pockets, Bags & Purses

Hi-Lifer's designers and engineers have created a product that is stylish yet functional, and easy-to-use. The classic double-O ring design allows users store smaller size products in the top compartment and larger items in the bottom compartment.  One big advantage of the Hi-Lifer is that it allows both wet and dry items to be transported in the same device  without mixing.  Finally, oils, waxes and dry herbs can be stored and transported together!


A Case for Everything

These days it seems like every product has its own standardized carrying case; so why doesn’t the one which you most highly covet? Introducing Hi-Lifer, the dual-chamber, leak-proof and smell-proof, discreet storage and transport device that allows you to carry your smallest and most treasured items from A to B without mixing, leaving a scent, or leaking.


The 80's Inspiration  

We love the 80's so we let it inspire us when trying to build a retro case for an age old product set. If you notice a little bit of Zack Morris meets Silicon Valley coder, it is by design.

Storing Uses

You can store anything in the Hi-Lifer! 

The Hi-Lifer Features


Transport Anything

Hi-Lifer is the newest and most ideal way transport your tiniest possessions in a secure and discreet way.  Not only will you be able to carry your items anywhere without the worry of messy or embarrassing spills, but you will also be able to keep small items hidden in plain sight.  No matter what, your accessories, tools, dry herbs, oils and waxes will remain intact, and so will your privacy.


Simple to Use, Easy to Clean

The operation of the Hi-Lifer storage device is easy!

Simply remove the cap by pulling straight back to insert the smaller items or remove the bottom chamber by pulling down to insert your larger items.

Either way, your items are being stored in the only dual-chamber, leak-proof, and smell-proof device around.

The Hi-Lifer is also dishwasher safe!


Keep Your Stuff Safe

When was the last time you grabbed someone's highlighter just to see what was inside? Probably never. That's because the success of Hi-Lifer depends upon users and observers alike to quickly assume it is a normal highlighter and therefore not hold their attention for long. This is the definition of hiding in plain sight! 

Not only that, but Hi-Lifer's double O-ring design ensures that your items are safe from mixing, spilling or smelling, no matter where you take them!


Available in Pink, Gray, Black and Yellow

Write Your Own Story:

  • You need to quickly leave the house but all of your stuff is spread out; you pull a Hi-Lifer out of your pocket and…
  • You are headed out to a ball game and you need to bring your stuff; you load up the Hi-Lifer in your bag and…
  • You are tired of smelling like a smokestack and you don’t want to experience a spill in your nice purse again; you grab your Hi-lifer and…

You use your Hi-Lifer “Because it’s not what they think it is”.

The Perks


A Team That Has Already Brought You:

Hi-Lifer is brought to you by the Convectium.com team behind customized products and brands such as the high-quality vapes & accessories of Blackout X (now shipping to 48 countries), HazeSticks: The Jimi Hendrix Collection, the-first-of-its-kind 710Shark oil cartridge filling machine and it's GrayLabel design and branding division. Convectium has been in business for over two years and brings 30+ years of combined industry experience.



We couldn't have brought this amazing product to market without the help of great collaborators and partners on our team:

Danny Davis - Convectium Investor for Development
Christy Harner - Creative Principal Binary Ventures for Design
Rick Wayne - Creative Director Underscore Films for Creating Our Video
Nick Gross - Founder of STRZ Studio for the Music as well as artist "Bean"

Now, we need YOUR help! We want to bring Hi-Lifer to the masses and end the complicated, inconvenient way people are transporting their dry herbs, oils, waxes, accessories and tools. 

It just makes sense that we have a standard carrying case for our most prized possessions!  Any help you can give is appreciated, no matter how small.
FAQ's

Q: Where is this designed and what is it made of?
A: Designed in the US and made of Recyclable HDPE Plastic

Q: Is this product intended for carry of items illegal in nature?
A: No, at no point should you use the Hi-Lifer to conceal any product that is illegal.

Q: Who is this product intended for?
A: Anyone who needs to carry and transport small personal items in a uni-sex discreet case.
story_txt:
The New Standard for the Discrete Storage and Transport of Dry Herbs, Oils, Waxes and Accessories.Arriving Early Summer 2016



The Hi-Lifer Solution
The concept for creating the Hi-Lifer was born out of the frustration we've all felt attempting to haphazardly transport our smallest, most-prized possessions without success. Before Hi-Lifer, transportation mediums usually took the form of baggies, pop-top pill bottles that never seem to stay closed, socks and anything else that made sense.  Utilizing these types of arbitrary carrying cases typically resulted spills, leaks, strong odors and, ultimately, discovery.  Hi-Lifer provides a solution for everyone who is ready to have a sensible option to carrying their most cherished items. 


Superior Design for Dry Pockets, Bags & Purses
Hi-Lifer's designers and engineers have created a product that is stylish yet functional, and easy-to-use. The classic double-O ring design allows users store smaller size products in the top compartment and larger items in the bottom compartment.  One big advantage of the Hi-Lifer is that it allows both wet and dry items to be transported in the same device  without mixing.  Finally, oils, waxes and dry herbs can be stored and transported together!








A Case for Everything
These days it seems like
every product has its own standardized carrying case; so why doesn’t the one
which you most highly covet? Introducing Hi-Lifer, the dual-chamber, leak-proof and smell-proof, discreet storage and transport device that allows you to carry your smallest and most treasured items from A to B without mixing, leaving a scent, or leaking.


The 80's Inspiration  


We love the 80's so we let it inspire us when trying to build a retro case for an age old product set. If you notice a little bit of Zack Morris meets Silicon Valley coder, it is by design.




Storing Uses
You can store anything in the Hi-Lifer! 



The Hi-Lifer Features










Transport Anything


Hi-Lifer is the newest and most ideal way transport your tiniest possessions in a secure and discreet way.  Not only will you be able to carry your items anywhere without the worry of messy or embarrassing spills, but you will also be able to keep small items hidden in plain sight.  No matter what, your accessories, tools, dry herbs, oils and waxes will remain intact, and so will your privacy.









Simple to Use, Easy to Clean
The operation of the Hi-Lifer storage device is easy!
Simply remove the cap by pulling straight back to insert the smaller items or remove the bottom chamber by pulling down to insert your larger items.
Either way, your items are being stored in the only dual-chamber, leak-proof, and smell-proof device around.
The Hi-Lifer is also dishwasher safe!

Keep Your Stuff SafeWhen was the last time you grabbed someone's highlighter just to see what was inside? Probably never. That's because the success of Hi-Lifer depends upon users and observers alike to quickly assume it is a normal highlighter and therefore not hold their attention for long. This is the definition of hiding in plain sight! 

Not only that, but Hi-Lifer's double O-ring design ensures that your items are safe from mixing, spilling or smelling, no matter where you take them!







Available in Pink, Gray, Black and Yellow

Write Your Own Story:



You need to quickly leave the house but all of your stuff is
spread out; you pull a Hi-Lifer out of your pocket and…


You are headed out to a ball game and you need to bring your
stuff; you load up the Hi-Lifer in your bag and…


You are tired of smelling like a smokestack and you don’t
want to experience a spill in your nice purse again; you grab your Hi-lifer
and…


You use your Hi-Lifer “Because it’s not what they think it
is”.


The Perks


A Team That Has Already Brought You:
Hi-Lifer is brought to you by the Convectium.com team behind customized products and brands such as the high-quality vapes & accessories of Blackout X (now shipping to 48 countries), HazeSticks: The Jimi Hendrix Collection, the-first-of-its-kind 710Shark oil cartridge filling machine and it's GrayLabel design and branding division. Convectium has been in business for over two years and brings 30+ years of combined industry experience.














We couldn't have brought this amazing product to market without the help of great collaborators and partners on our team:



Danny Davis - Convectium Investor for DevelopmentChristy Harner - Creative Principal Binary Ventures for DesignRick Wayne - Creative Director Underscore Films for Creating Our VideoNick Gross - Founder of STRZ Studio for the Music as well as artist "Bean"


Now, we need YOUR help! We want to bring Hi-Lifer to the masses and end the complicated, inconvenient way people are transporting their dry herbs, oils, waxes, accessories and tools. 

It just makes sense that we have a standard carrying case for our most prized possessions!  Any help you can give is appreciated, no matter how small.


FAQ's


Q: Where is this designed and what is it made of?A: Designed in the US and made of Recyclable HDPE Plastic
Q: Is this product intended for carry of items illegal in nature?A: No, at no point should you use the Hi-Lifer to conceal any product that is illegal.
Q: Who is this product intended for?A: Anyone who needs to carry and transport small personal items in a uni-sex discreet case.

story:
Leaf the Ground needs $12,000 dollars to successfully leaf the ground and begin spreading the seeds of tree climbing around Nashville.

This will buy climbing harnesses for all-sized adults and children, ropes, carabiners, cambium  savers (leather sleeves that protect the bark from rope damage), throw lines, gloves, hammocks and insurance.

With this gear, we will safely guide you into the canopies, where you are sure to find peace of mind among one of nature’s most interesting living organisms.

Short-Term Goals

Leaf the Ground will host both public and private climbs.  A public climb is an event held at a park where interested passerby can pay to learn how to ascend a tree and spend the afternoon perusing its canopy.  A private climb is anything from a birthday party for kids to a team-building activity meant to get you out of the office with your co-workers for a day.  Private climbs can take place in your own backyard and accommodate up to ten people.

Long-Term Goals

Leaf the Ground would love to guide small groups on overnight treetop expedition trips, where you pay to spend the night in the tree, sleep in a hammock and observe the stars.

In time, Leaf the Ground wants to offer instructional courses to tree climbers hoping to learn enough to be able to integrate recreational tree climbing into their own lives and become proficient climbers.

Being a working arborist, Aaron is also excited to one day offer introductory tree work climbing courses to those interested in pursuing a career in arboriculture.

How You Can Help

Any donation will help us reach our goal of $12,000 and is greatly appreciated! 

If you are unable to make a monetary donation, please help spread the word by sharing this campaign with family and friends.  Share our campaign on Facebook, tweet about it, follow us on Instagram, or even tattoo our logo across your forearm!

The givebacks are hard to resist, however, so treat yourself to a sticker or patch, a turned wooden bowl by the founder of Leaf the Ground himself, or the promise of a free pass into one of our public climbs!  Photos of all the givebacks can be found directly under the campaign video.

story:
T-Track's 20 unique features, including the T-Track brain and vibrating alert, help you keep track of your valuables. You'll receive alerts when something is missing so you can focus on more important things.


 

 

 

 

We've found that backpack users often need the following:

With T-Track, you can organize your belongings and never leave anything behind.


 




 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  
  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

*The T-Track Power Bank is an add-on accessory that allows you to charge your electronic devices on the go. We’re offering the T-Track Power Bank at the special price of $19 dollars (35% off)! The T-Track backpack USB charging port will work with standard USB 2.0/ 3.0 outputs.

Click here to find out how to make sure your referrals earn you rewards. If you don't follow those instructions, we'll be unable to provide you with your well-deserved prizes! 

 

The free iOS and Android T-Track app let you easily register your items and monitor your belongings.



 

Set up your device In just 3 easy steps:

 

 

What you get with your pre-order:

 

 

 

Advanced tech, discreet design.

 

 

The T-Track is the result of a collaborative process in which Totto’s culture of innovation shines through T-Labs: a laboratory that allows the employees of the renowned Latin American brand to join different phases for the development of a product: research, planning, design and/or implementation.

 

Inspired by and committed to our environment, employees, partners, and customers alike, TOTTO is a leading provider of consumer accessory solutions including bags, clothes and various other accessories. TOTTO takes pride in merging fashion and functionality to provide products that are designed to support day-to-day living while remaining on trend. Founded in 1987 in Bogota, Colombia, TOTTO is present in 52 countries and more than 600 locations worldwide.

The T-Track is the result of a collaborative process between TOTTO and T-Labs, TOTTO's innovation laboratory. The laboratory allows employees of the renowned Latin American brand to join different phases for the development of the product’s research, planning, design and implementation. As such, T-Track features the quality and innovation of a TOTTO product while boasting the technologically advanced approach to design provided by T-Labs. All of our products project a balance between aesthetic, practicality, and functionality. We are confident that consumers will love T-Track.

 

 

 

 

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

We plan to ship T-Track in Nov 2017. Additional batch shipments dates will be announced. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.    

By backing now, you'll get to own one of the very first T-Track ever. Plus, get exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of T-Track.

 

 

Just 30 seconds of your time can make a difference. Hit one of the buttons and tag a friend or coworker who needs this! The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become.

 

What is it? T-Track is a backpack that can track items and prevent the user from forgetting items by knowing what they need, what they have, and what they have forgotten through T-Track Brain (Vibrating Alert)
Who created it? Totto, which is a leading provider of consumer accessory solutions such as bags, clothes and accessories, merging fashion and functionality to provide products that are designed to support day-to-day living while remaining on trend.
Why should we use it? Because it will save you from forgetting very important things (items) that you will need throughout the course of daily life.
How much does it cost?  Earliest Bird price starts at $99.
Where can we buy it? You will be able to buy it right here, right now on T-Track Indiegogo campaign. 
What do we get when we order T-Track? (1) T-Track, (2) T-Track Smart Tracking Tags, and (1) T-Track Brain.
Why are you crowdfunding? To validate the product idea, to enter the global market, and to launch our brand in the USA, We've already finished the development of this product. We also want to provide our earliest supporters with the best pricing, which is why the earlier you purchase, the better the deal!

 

What features are available? Features include the smart tracking capabilities (T-Track Brain) that also comes with 20 killer features. 
What colors do you offer?

Royal Purple, Coal Black, Desert Baige
What sizes do you offer? T-Track backpack offers 1 size fits all
Is it comfortable / attractive / discreet? Yes. We are experts when it comes to bag design, and we have designed T-Track to feel comfortable while having a unique, modern look. Aside from the electronic components, the backpack is filled with useful features that the user will love

 

Is there a warranty? 5 year warranty for every T-Track order. 
What is your refund policy? Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped. 
What is your return / exchange policy? If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees.
How do I choose more than one reward?  To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.
How can I check the status of my pre-order? By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.
I'm interested in becoming a Beta Tester.  Please contact us at: ttrack@totto.com
Why do I have to wait longer than usual? This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build the device, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.
If I have other questions, who should I contact? Press: ttrack@totto.com
Investment Inquiries: ttrack@totto.com
Support: ttrack@totto.com

story:
NOMAD Survival Multi-Tool (Made and assembled in the USA)

As a product designer that loves gadgets an the outdoors I decided to take a stab at the EDC ( Every Day Carry) market by creating a unique item that embellishes some of the most important tools for survival. Our early ancestors were credited with hunting and gathering, making fire, and creating tools out of rocks which revolutionized the world. This is where the name NOMAD comes from. Nomads moved from place to place and needed to adapt to the harsh environment and most important to survive. The NOMAD (Survival Multi-Tool) was designed for today's mankind with those things in mind.

story:
Overall 22 essentials that you will need while traveling in case of emergencies. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

EssenPack uses eco-friendly solutions to ensure maximum comfort during travel without harm to Mother Earth. 

 

From a small 6x15 cm roll, this blanket expands to 100x170 cm. That's a 20,000% increase! 

 

 

So small & light you'll forget you have it with you.

 

 

Our Rain Jacket's low denier nylon provides amazing durability and waterproofness for a fraction of the weight.

 

 

Made of 190 T Polyester Taffeta, this grocery bag is ready to carry up to 10kg of your sweets, fruits... or even a kettlebell!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Choose colors and item sizes after the end of the campaign (we’ll contact you)

 

By 2050 the oceans will contain more plastic than fish!

Millions of animals ⁠— from birds to fish and other marine organisms — are killed by plastics every year. 60% of disposable plastic waste is cutlery, bottles, straws, and bags.

 

Americans use 100 billion plastic bags a year. Over 1,000 sea turtles are killed every year from plastic bags.

 

A million plastic bottles are bought around the world every minute and the number will jump another 20% by 2021.

 

Maybe you think, “It’s just one fork,” but the number of plastic utensils wasted is around 40 billion per year in the United States alone.

 

The plastic straw is one of those items that won’t get recycled even when you put it in the recycling. It’s too contaminated. It’s too small.

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

What is EssenPack? EssenPack is the solution to the age-old travel dilemma. Do you travel light, cover more ground and see more without the hassle of heavy luggage and check-in counters, delays and long queues? Or do you travel prepared, with everything you might need in an emergency such as a delay, missed flight, lost luggage or forgotten items? EssenPack features a set of bespoke ultralight essential travel items, packed into a minimalist pouch that allows owners to be ready for any kind of situation or emergency, be it a 10-day business trip or an arduous hike. From a toothbrush to a rain jacket, UV sterilizer to a neck pillow—travel in comfort and stress free.
Why should I buy EssenPack? There are actually lots of reasons to buy EssenPack: This compact and ultralight pouch has all the essentials you’ll need during your travels. Having everything packed for you in advance, it also gives you the peace of mind you haven’t forgotten something important for your trip. With EssenPack you can hit the road both hands-free and stress-free!
What items are included? There are 3 versions of EssenPack:
EssenPack Lite includes 11 essential travel items: Neck Pillow, Earplugs, Eyemask, Picnic Blanket, Rain Jacket, Clean T-shirt, Cap, Toothbrush, SIM tray pin, Straw, Multi-tool, Neck Pillow.
EssenPack Classic includes 16 items: everything included in EssenPack Lite plus an additional 5 items—Gloves, Neck Warmer, Microfiber Towel, Water Bottle, Grocery Bag.
EssenPack Pro includes 22 items: everything in EssenPack Lite and Classic plus an additional 6 items—Eyeglasses Cleaner, Backpack, UV Sterilizer, Spoon & Fork, Chopsticks, Toy.
In what colors does it come in? For now, the EssenPack comes in Black, Blue and Brown. But as more backers join us, we’ll be able to unlock more colors in our stretch goals!
What materials is it made of? All materials are hand-picked and of the highest quality. The pack itself is made of premium vegan leather, whereas the items inside are made of packable, durable and lightweight materials. In particular:
Neck Pillow is made of PVC material.
Earplugs are made of Silicone rubber.
Eyemask, Picnic Blanket and Cap are made of 100% Polyester.
Gloves are made of Knitted Polyester Fabric.
Neck Warmer is made of Polyester Polar Fleece.
Rain Jacket is made of 100% Polyester fabric with Uly coating.
Clean T-shirt is made of 48% Cotton and 52% Polyester.
Microfiber Towel is made of Microfiber Polyester.
Eyeglasses Cleaner is made of Polyester Microfiber.
Water Bottle is made of BPA free reusable plastic.
Grocery Bag is made of 190 T Polyester Taffeta.
Toothbrush is made of bamboo with Nylon 4 bristles.
SIM tray pin is made of Steel.
BackPack is made of Coated 190T Polyester Fabric.
Straw, Spoon, Fork and Chopsticks are made of stainless steel.
Multi-tool is made of Aluminium.
Toy is a non-toxic and harmless magnetic cube.
Why should I buy EssenPack? There are actually lots of reasons to buy EssenPack: This compact and ultralight pouch has all the essentials you’ll need during your travels. Having everything packed for you in advance, it also gives you the peace of mind you haven’t forgotten something important for your trip. With EssenPack you can hit the road both hands-free and stress-free!
How much does it weigh? EssenPack Lite, including all items weighs, 1.1 kg / 40 oz.
EssenPack Classic, including all items, weighs 1.3 kg / 47 oz.
EssenPack Pro, including all items, weighs 1.7 kg / 60 oz.
Each item on its own has the following weights:
Neck Pillow: 68g / 2.39oz
Earplugs: 9g / 0.31oz
Eyemask: 13g / 0.45oz
Picnic Blanket: 165g / 5.82oz
Gloves: 28g / 0.98oz
Neck Warmer: 27g / 0.95oz
Rain Jacket: 185g / 6.52oz
Clean T-shirt: 123g / 4.33oz
Cap: 62g / 2.18oz
Microfiber Towel: 35g / 1.23oz
Eyeglasses Cleaner: 5g / 0.17oz
Water Bottle: 24g / 0.84oz
Grocery Bag: 39g / 1.37oz
Toothbrush: 11g / 0.38oz
SIM tray pin: 2g / 0.07oz
BackPack: 105g / 3.7oz
UV Sterilizer: 5g / 0.17oz
Straw: 10g / 0.35oz
Spoon: 45g / 1.58oz
Fork: 37g / 1.3oz
Chopsticks: 19g / 0.67oz
Multi-tool: 12g / 0.42oz
Toy: 43g / 1.51oz
What are the sizes of each EssenPack version and each included item? EssenPack is for everyone. For those items that are available in multiple sizes—Rain Jacket, T-shirt, and Gloves—at the end of our campaign we'll send out a survey to all backers where you can fill in your clothing size. You'll get your EssenPack containing everything with the perfect fit.
EssenPack Lite measures: 26 x 13 x 10cm / 10.23 x 5.11 x 3.93 inches
EssenPack Classic measures: 30 x 15 x 10cm / 11.81 x 5.90 x 3.93 inches
EssenPack Pro measures: 30 x 15 x 11cm / 11.81 x 5.90 x 4.33 inches
Neck Pillow: 48.5 x 33cm / 19.09 x 12.99 inches
Earplugs: Case: 3 x 3cm / 1.18 x 1.18 inches, length: 58cm
Eyemask: 21 x 10cm / 8.26 x 3.93 inches

Gloves: 25.5 x 8cm / 10.03 x 3.14 inches
Neck Warmer: 24 x 21cm / 9.44 x 8.26 inches
Rain Jacket: 4XS, 3XS, 2XS, XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL
Clean T-shirt: 4XS, 3XS, 2XS, XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL
Cap: Youth, Adult
Microfiber Towel: 60 x 30.5cm / 23.62 x 12 inches
Eyeglasses Cleaner: 18.5 x 14cm / 7.28 x 5.51 inches
Water Bottle: 330ml
Grocery Bag: 40 x 36cm, Capacity: 10L, Max. weight: 10kg
Toothbrush: 18.5cm / 7.28 inches
SIM tray pin: 4 x 1cm / 1.57 x 0.39 inches
BackPack: 68 x 34cm / 26.77 x 13.38 inches, Capacity: approx. 20L
UV Sterilizer: 3 x 1.5cm / 1.18 x 0.59 inches
Straw: 21.5cm / 8.46 inches
Spoon: 18 x 4cm / 7.08 x 1.57 inches
Fork: 18 x 25cm / 7.08 x 9.84 inches
Chopsticks: 21cm / 8.26 inches
Multi-tool: 6.5cm / 2.55 inches
Toy: 5 x 5 x 5mm / 0.2 x 0.2 x 0.2 inches
How easy is it to unpack EssenPack and pack it again? Packing and unpacking EssenPack is a breeze. It includes special labels for each item, which helps you place each of them in its respective pocket, making your packing as easy as 123.
Do you have worldwide shipping? Yes, of course! Traveling should be open to everyone. That’s why we’ve made it possible for the EssenPack to travel all across the world and reach as many of you as possible.
Can it be carried as hand luggage? We designed EssenPack with all kinds of travel in mind. One of the most ubiquitous is air travel, so, by all means, we made the EssenPack and all of its contents TSA friendly. With EssenPack, getting through the security checkpoint is a breeze.
How many pockets does it have? The EssenPack has one main compartment, subdivided into up to 23 convenient pockets for each of the items. There is also one pocket on the outside, perfect for your passport or a small notepad.
Does it have a special pocket for documents? Yes, there is also an outside pocket that makes accessing any documents like passports or boarding passes easy and quick.
Is it waterproof? We hope you’re never caught in a downpour, but if that’s the case, EssenPack is very water resistant. On our journey to designing EssenPack we realized that making a completely waterproof pack is actually very challenging, and nearly impossible. But the rain jacket is, of course, waterproof.
Can it also serve as a backpack? Absolutely! There is a special backpack inside into which you can put EssenPack and carry it on your shoulder.

 

It was on a very cold and starry night, during a trip to the Himalayas, that Harnihal and Gurdeep first thought of the EssenPack.

Unable to find a hotel, and missing the basic travel essentials, they exchanged stories to keep warm. Gurdeep had just been on a 2-month trip with his wife and two daughters, and Harnihal was a lifelong wanderluster.

The EssenPack was born that day.
Initially, it started as a bag with just 5 essentials. But, unhappy with the initial size and weight, they kept on optimizing and adding more and more products. With every new item that was added, somehow the pack also got smaller!

After countless iterations and testing different materials, shapes, sizes... the perfect EssenPack was finally born.
story_txt:
Overall 22 essentials that you will need while traveling in case of emergencies.       EssenPack uses eco-friendly solutions to ensure maximum comfort during travel without harm to Mother Earth.  From a small 6x15 cm roll, this blanket expands to 100x170 cm. That's a 20,000% increase!   So small & light you'll forget you have it with you.  Our Rain Jacket's low denier nylon provides amazing durability and waterproofness for a fraction of the weight.  Made of 190 T Polyester Taffeta, this grocery bag is ready to carry up to 10kg of your sweets, fruits... or even a kettlebell!          
Choose colors and item sizes after the end of the campaign (we’ll contact you) By 2050 the oceans will contain more plastic than fish!Millions of animals ⁠— from birds to fish and other marine organisms — are killed by plastics every year. 60% of disposable plastic waste is cutlery, bottles, straws, and bags. Americans use 100 billion plastic bags a year. Over 1,000 sea turtles are killed every year from plastic bags. A million plastic bottles are bought around the world every minute and the number will jump another 20% by 2021. Maybe you think, “It’s just one fork,” but the number of plastic utensils wasted is around 40 billion per year in the United States alone. The plastic straw is one of those items that won’t get recycled even when you put it in the recycling. It’s too contaminated. It’s too small.  Frequently Asked Questions What is EssenPack? EssenPack is the solution to the age-old travel dilemma. Do you travel light, cover more ground and see more without the hassle of heavy luggage and check-in counters, delays and long queues? Or do you travel prepared, with everything you might need in an emergency such as a delay, missed flight, lost luggage or forgotten items? EssenPack features a set of bespoke ultralight essential travel items, packed into a minimalist pouch that allows owners to be ready for any kind of situation or emergency, be it a 10-day business trip or an arduous hike. From a toothbrush to a rain jacket, UV sterilizer to a neck pillow—travel in comfort and stress free. Why should I buy EssenPack? There are actually lots of reasons to buy EssenPack: This compact and ultralight pouch has all the essentials you’ll need during your travels. Having everything packed for you in advance, it also gives you the peace of mind you haven’t forgotten something important for your trip. With EssenPack you can hit the road both hands-free and stress-free! What items are included? There are 3 versions of EssenPack:EssenPack Lite includes 11 essential travel items: Neck Pillow, Earplugs, Eyemask, Picnic Blanket, Rain Jacket, Clean T-shirt, Cap, Toothbrush, SIM tray pin, Straw, Multi-tool, Neck Pillow.EssenPack Classic includes 16 items: everything included in EssenPack Lite plus an additional 5 items—Gloves, Neck Warmer, Microfiber Towel, Water Bottle, Grocery Bag.EssenPack Pro includes 22 items: everything in EssenPack Lite and Classic plus an additional 6 items—Eyeglasses Cleaner, Backpack, UV Sterilizer, Spoon & Fork, Chopsticks, Toy. In what colors does it come in? For now, the EssenPack comes in Black, Blue and Brown. But as more backers join us, we’ll be able to unlock more colors in our stretch goals! What materials is it made of? All materials are hand-picked and of the highest quality. The pack itself is made of premium vegan leather, whereas the items inside are made of packable, durable and lightweight materials. In particular:Neck Pillow is made of PVC material.Earplugs are made of Silicone rubber.Eyemask, Picnic Blanket and Cap are made of 100% Polyester.Gloves are made of Knitted Polyester Fabric.Neck Warmer is made of Polyester Polar Fleece.Rain Jacket is made of 100% Polyester fabric with Uly coating.Clean T-shirt is made of 48% Cotton and 52% Polyester.Microfiber Towel is made of Microfiber Polyester.Eyeglasses Cleaner is made of Polyester Microfiber.Water Bottle is made of BPA free reusable plastic.Grocery Bag is made of 190 T Polyester Taffeta.Toothbrush is made of bamboo with Nylon 4 bristles.SIM tray pin is made of Steel.BackPack is made of Coated 190T Polyester Fabric.Straw, Spoon, Fork and Chopsticks are made of stainless steel.Multi-tool is made of Aluminium.Toy is a non-toxic and harmless magnetic cube. Why should I buy EssenPack? There are actually lots of reasons to buy EssenPack: This compact and ultralight pouch has all the essentials you’ll need during your travels. Having everything packed for you in advance, it also gives you the peace of mind you haven’t forgotten something important for your trip. With EssenPack you can hit the road both hands-free and stress-free! How much does it weigh? EssenPack Lite, including all items weighs, 1.1 kg / 40 oz.EssenPack Classic, including all items, weighs 1.3 kg / 47 oz.EssenPack Pro, including all items, weighs 1.7 kg / 60 oz.Each item on its own has the following weights:Neck Pillow: 68g / 2.39ozEarplugs: 9g / 0.31ozEyemask: 13g / 0.45ozPicnic Blanket: 165g / 5.82ozGloves: 28g / 0.98ozNeck Warmer: 27g / 0.95ozRain Jacket: 185g / 6.52ozClean T-shirt: 123g / 4.33ozCap: 62g / 2.18ozMicrofiber Towel: 35g / 1.23ozEyeglasses Cleaner: 5g / 0.17ozWater Bottle: 24g / 0.84ozGrocery Bag: 39g / 1.37ozToothbrush: 11g / 0.38ozSIM tray pin: 2g / 0.07ozBackPack: 105g / 3.7ozUV Sterilizer: 5g / 0.17ozStraw: 10g / 0.35ozSpoon: 45g / 1.58ozFork: 37g / 1.3ozChopsticks: 19g / 0.67ozMulti-tool: 12g / 0.42ozToy: 43g / 1.51oz What are the sizes of each EssenPack version and each included item? EssenPack is for everyone. For those items that are available in multiple sizes—Rain Jacket, T-shirt, and Gloves—at the end of our campaign we'll send out a survey to all backers where you can fill in your clothing size. You'll get your EssenPack containing everything with the perfect fit.EssenPack Lite measures: 26 x 13 x 10cm / 10.23 x 5.11 x 3.93 inchesEssenPack Classic measures: 30 x 15 x 10cm / 11.81 x 5.90 x 3.93 inchesEssenPack Pro measures: 30 x 15 x 11cm / 11.81 x 5.90 x 4.33 inchesNeck Pillow: 48.5 x 33cm / 19.09 x 12.99 inchesEarplugs: Case: 3 x 3cm / 1.18 x 1.18 inches, length: 58cmEyemask: 21 x 10cm / 8.26 x 3.93 inchesPicnic Blanket: 110 x 170cm / 43.3 x 66.9 inchesGloves: 25.5 x 8cm / 10.03 x 3.14 inchesNeck Warmer: 24 x 21cm / 9.44 x 8.26 inchesRain Jacket: 4XS, 3XS, 2XS, XS, S, M, L, XL, XXLClean T-shirt: 4XS, 3XS, 2XS, XS, S, M, L, XL, XXLCap: Youth, AdultMicrofiber Towel: 60 x 30.5cm / 23.62 x 12 inchesEyeglasses Cleaner: 18.5 x 14cm / 7.28 x 5.51 inchesWater Bottle: 330mlGrocery Bag: 40 x 36cm, Capacity: 10L, Max. weight: 10kgToothbrush: 18.5cm / 7.28 inchesSIM tray pin: 4 x 1cm / 1.57 x 0.39 inchesBackPack: 68 x 34cm / 26.77 x 13.38 inches, Capacity: approx. 20LUV Sterilizer: 3 x 1.5cm / 1.18 x 0.59 inchesStraw: 21.5cm / 8.46 inchesSpoon: 18 x 4cm / 7.08 x 1.57 inchesFork: 18 x 25cm / 7.08 x 9.84 inchesChopsticks: 21cm / 8.26 inchesMulti-tool: 6.5cm / 2.55 inchesToy: 5 x 5 x 5mm / 0.2 x 0.2 x 0.2 inches How easy is it to unpack EssenPack and pack it again?
