story:
We at Coalatree are a team of regular folks who love getting outdoors. We recognize the value of functionality and fun, and that's why we design apparel and products that you can use just about anywhere. Our products are ready for anything, whether you're camping in the mountains or spending a weekend adventuring at home with the family.

The Puffy Kachula is the birthchild of our Kachula Adventure Blanket and a good old-fashioned puffy jacket. It serves as a blanket, pillow, cold weather poncho, and so much more. Snuggle-soft and extremely versatile, it's ready for any adventure, near or far!

 

 

 

 

You helped us to raise over $250,000 for our first ever campaign, the Kachula Adventure Blanket. Named the "Swiss Army Knife of blankets," we’re back with a new take on the most versatile blanket that exists!

The Puffy Kachula is another packable, multi-use, eco-friendly product by Coalatree. And as always, it’s ready to adventure with you!

 

 

YOU CAN WEAR IT AS A PONCHO
Use the hideaway hood to convert the Puffy Kachula into a warm snuggly poncho. The hood is attached so you’ll never lose it!

 

IT’S WATER AND SPILL-RESISTANT
Stay dry longer thanks to a vapor-coated Durable Water Repellent finish. Water and other liquids bead right off!

 

THE HOOD PACKS AWAY
For those days when you just want a blanket, stuff the hood into its own zippered pouch.

 

IT’S PACKABLE
Stuff it into its own pocket and use it as a pillow.

IT HAS AN INTEGRATED SNAP SYSTEM
The Puffy Kachula becomes more versatile in a snap! Connect multiple blankets together to make one large Puffy Kachula or layer it with a Kachula V2 Adventure Blanket. You can even fold it in half to make yourself a lightweight sleeping bag.

 

THE COLORWAYS ARE AWESOME
Thanks to feedback from our amazing supporters, we're introducing new vibrant colorways, each with contrasting stitching and piping.

 

YOU CAN CLIP IT ON STUFF
The Puffy Kachula has an attached webbing loop so you can easily clip it on the go.

 

IT’LL STAY IN PLACE
Use the attached webbing loops to stake down the corners.

 

YOU CAN STORE STUFF IN IT
Stow away your phone, keys, books, and more in a secret personal pocket.

 

 

 

The Puffy Kachula will retail for $109. Choose your pledge level now and receive a special Kickstarter price! You’ll be able to pick your colors and add-on items after the campaign ends.

 

 

From cozy nights in, to weekends with the kids, to adventuring in the mountains, the Puffy Kachula is versatile enough for any situation.

 

The Puffy Kachula is offered in four different colorways. Many of them are two-tone, giving you essentially two blankets in one!

 

 

 

  

 

SUSTAINABLE FABRICS
Each of our factory partners is bluesign®-approved, ensuring our goods are made with the most eco-friendly textile solutions. Bluesign technology eliminates the need for harsh chemicals and substances in the entire manufacturing process so that our products are safe for the environment, safe for workers, and safe for you.

SAFE DWR APPLICATION
We use revolutionary Chemical Vapor Deposition technology to apply the durable water repellent (DWR) coating on our fabrics. This not only eliminates the use of harmful solvents but also leaves a thinner layer of finish, giving our fabrics a softer look and feel.

RECYCLED MATERIALS
Scraps and waste are kept out of landfills and are repurposed into this blanket. The Puffy Kachula is made with 100% recycled ripstop nylon.

 

Coalatree started on a rural farm in Western Colorado by a group of friends on a journey to create sustainably sourced apparel and multi-use products. We’ve since grown, moved to Utah, and adopted a new model using Kickstarter to help bring our ideas to life.

It’s our passion to bring elements of the outdoors and the city life together. Whether you’re summiting the tallest peaks or embarking on a family journey at home, our products are practical, stylish, and functional. Being ready for anything and designing for the adventurer in us all is what we’re all about.

We call it a MTN2CTY lifestyle, but you can call it what you want. Whatever you do, we hope you’re ready to Greet The Outdoors with us.

story:
What is dcaze headphone bag? 

1. fits into the airplane seat pocket or storage space

 

2. different ways to hang on airplane seat's hooks

 

3. different ways to attach to your hand carry bag, backpack, etc..

 

4. durable materials and protect your over-ear headphone 

 

5. fits different travel size headphones such as Bose QC35, Sony MDR-1000X, Sony MDR-1ADAC, B&W P9 Signature etc.

 

6. many ways to use

Ready for production!!

Ready to ship!!

 *Headphone is NOT included.

If you have any questions about dcaze headphone bag, please contact: info@dcaze.com

Instagram : dcazedcaze

Customs and Duties - Please note that duties, VAT and GST tax is not included in our price, you may need to pay for it according to your country requirement. 

Thank you for your support!

story:
Travel like a local + Make a difference!

AlleyCat's founders and contributors are addicted to travel.  We are driven to fill up our passports with stamps and journals with stories from unique experiences of different cultures, local food, small towns, and friends new and old.  We also believe in leaving a place better than we found it.  AlleyCat was developed to accomplish both!  

We look to you; fellow travelers and those with the thirst for travel for support in getting this project off the ground!

 

 

The product.

This app is for the explorers, the wanderers, and the curious!  You know who you are.

We are compiling the most interesting history, pop culture, nightlife, and local experiences into one intuitive application.  Designed for travelers of all budgets, locals, and recent transplants, the app uses your current location to show you the best a city has to offer, how to interact with it, and how to combine multiple things you are interested in into your own custom walking tour.  

Unlike guide books, AlleyCat is never out of date which means you have the latest and most up to date information at your fingertips.

Key features include: Locally sourced content (history and attractions), custom based walking tours, social media integration, public transit info for each attraction, taxi fare predictor, calendar of upcoming events, integrated filterable maps, attraction bookmarking, practical and safety information, and so much more.

 

 

Make a positive and local impact.

Once the app is released, part of our profits go right back into the cities we serve.  We want to leave a place better than we found it and we do so by donating 5% of each cities profit to a local charity in that city.  This means we can make a big impact and help to target specific local needs.

For San Francisco, our first release, we have chosen to target youth homelessness by partnering with Larkin Street Youth Services, a local organization working tirelessly to get young people off the streets and give them the tools they need to pursue their dreams and get ahead.  AlleyCat will donate 5% of profits to Larkin Street Youth Services when the app is released.

 

 

The money we raise...

The money we raise will allow us to complete the app's functionality, perform testing to work out any kinks, and take the required steps to get the app to our audience via the app store.  Any money that is left over will be spent preparing for our Android release and completing content for additional cities.

How much will it cost?

We expect the app to cost between $3 and $9 dollars.  We are currently knee deep in pricing strategy and are considering the following factors in our decision making process:  the rate of customer acquisition at different price points, pricing of similar (but less awesome) apps, and how we can best serve the charity component of AlleyCat.

iPhone, Android and Windows Phone

AlleyCat will be available first on the iPhone and next on the Android.  We anticipate the Android release to occur approximately 6 months after the iPhone release.  We have not yet begun developing this app for Windows Phone, but with your help we hope to get started!

Thank you Indiegogo!

We appreciate you taking time to learn about what has been our passion since 2011! Contact us or check out our website should you have any questions!

Video filmed and edited by Jesse Alvarez (detuneddreams@gmail.com)

story:
Short Summary

My name is Nick Ressler and I'm the Executive Director of Kenbrook Bible Camp. I started to come to the camp when I was 8 years old and eventually became a summer counselor, program director and eventually a pastor. 

One of the things that impressed me about Kenbrook was watching numerous campers, who had their share of disabilities, do incredible things like hike, shoot archery and even climb our climbing tower. Nothing stopped them because there was a staff and camp who went out of their way to support what they were doing.

I recently took this position at camp and found that in the building that was built and designed for handicap accessibility and ease the elevator no longer works! It's really quite simple: EVERY person should have the ability to participate in activites done on a retreat no matter the floor of the lodge they are on.

We've got to fix this and we need your help to do it!

What We Need & What You Get

We need $10,000 to fix the elevator. It's old and the components came from multiple companies who no longer exist. Lancaster Elevator gave us the best quote they could. One hitch, we can't start the project until we get $5,000 in hand. 

Every penny given to this, even if we don't hit our goal, will go into fixing the elevator. Any excess money raised will be used to purchase other accessible items like shower seats or hand rails.

For every person that gives we'll thank you on the Kenbrook Facebook Page.
For every person that gives $100 you'll get a personalized thank you video on the Kenbrook Facebook Page. 
For every person who gives $500 we'll invite to one of our staff lunches made by Chef Patrick and schedule you and 15 friends a bonfire at Kenbrook.
For every person who gives $1000  we'll invite you to staff lunch made by Chef Patrick, schedule you a bonfire and we'll take you on a ride in the fixed elevator.

Other Ways You Can Give

If you want to give but would rather not online then feel free to send a check to:

Kenbrook Bible Camp
190 Pine Meadow Road
Lebanon, PA 17046

Just place "Fix the Elevator" in the memo line.


We also know that not everyone can give but everyone can share this need. So help us out by getting your friends, family and church involved. 

Finally, we need prayer. Lots of it. So pray for the camp, staff, guests and for this project to be completed. 

Thanks!

Nothing stopped them because there was a staff and camp who went out of their way to support what they were doing.
I recently took this position at camp and found that in the building that was built and designed for handicap accessibility and ease the elevator no longer works! It's really quite simple: EVERY person should have the ability to participate in activites done on a retreat no matter the floor of the lodge they are on.
We've got to fix this and we need your help to do it!   What We Need & What You Get We need $10,000 to fix the elevator. It's old and the components came from multiple companies who no longer exist. Lancaster Elevator gave us the best quote they could. One hitch, we can't start the project until we get $5,000 in hand. 
Every penny given to this, even if we don't hit our goal, will go into fixing the elevator. Any excess money raised will be used to purchase other accessible items like shower seats or hand rails.
For every person that gives we'll thank you on the Kenbrook Facebook Page. For every person that gives $100 you'll get a personalized thank you video on the Kenbrook Facebook Page. For every person who gives $500 we'll invite to one of our staff lunches made by Chef Patrick and schedule you and 15 friends a bonfire at Kenbrook.For every person who gives $1000  we'll invite you to staff lunch made by Chef Patrick, schedule you a bonfire and we'll take you on a ride in the fixed elevator.

    Other Ways You Can Give If you want to give but would rather not online then feel free to send a check to:
Kenbrook Bible Camp190 Pine Meadow RoadLebanon, PA 17046
Just place "Fix the Elevator" in the memo line.

We also know that not everyone can give but everyone can share this need. So help us out by getting your friends, family and church involved. 
Finally, we need prayer. Lots of it. So pray for the camp, staff, guests and for this project to be completed. 
   Thanks!

story:
Concept:

The inspiration for The Fly Pry(TM) Patent Pending design came about thanks to a broken zipper slide on my sleeping bag.  This zipper slide was sitting in my toolbox for a few years until one day I was faced with a horrific encounter.  A cold German beer and no bottle opener in sight.  I was about to use a pair of channel lock pliers when this old, broken zipper slide smiled at me from inside the tool drawer.  I performed a quick modification on the little guy and bam...instant bottle opener.  This was my light bulb moment so I quickly hit the drawing board.  The result was what is now known as The Fly Pry(TM)!


Originally designed to replace the zipper pull on your jacket or gear with something a little more useful. The Fly Pry(TM) is a titanium multi-tool designed to be as small as possible while still maintaining practical functionality. The Fly Pry(TM) has over 10 features in a package no bigger than a standard zipper slide. Not only can you use it as a zipper pull, but it also works great on a backpack, key chain, briefcase, neck lanyard, fishing vest, scuba gear...the possibilities are endless.

The Fly Pry(TM) is made from military grade titanium for its corrosion resistance, strong but lightweight properties, and not to mention cool factor. The Fly Pry(TM) is made right here in the USA. They are water jet cut by machine and then finished one at a time by hand in my shop. Chisel edge is hand ground to ~45 degrees. Sharp enough to cut boxes or open a tuna can, but not sharp enough to cut yourself. 

Dimensions: 1.25"x.5" and 1"x.5"

Features:

It's a bottle opener...

Pull-tab Lifter


Can Opener - Gone fishing, camping, or hiking and forgot to pack a can opener?  No problem.  Just use the chisel ground edge to cut through! 

Scraper/Pry Bar - Use The Fly Pry for scraping, prying staples, thumb tacks, or brad nails.  It's even sharp enough to cut open boxes!

Zipper Pull - Use The Fly Pry as a zipper pull on your jackets, backpacks, briefcases, fishing gear, scuba gear or tie it to your boot laces for a tool that's always there with you.

Hex Bit Adapter - Accepts 1/4 hex bits (flat head, phillips head, torx bit, star bits, etc) for repairs "On The Fly".

Key Chain Attachment - Features a key chain hole or just use the 1/4 hex bit adapter as your attachment point.

Box Opener - Sharp enough to cut open boxes, but not enough to cut open a finger!

Hook Screw Driver - Trying to screw in a plant hook or similar into solid surface may be a little difficult at times.  We found the Fly Pry makes this task effortless by giving you a larger grip surface.

Rust Proof:


Options:

King Fly(TM):



Colors:

Available in Blue, Purple, Gold, Bronze, Green, or Natural

Finish:

Satin Finish - Stone Washed




----

Materials:

Standard Version: Titanium - Type 6AL-4V Grade 5. 

Brass Version - Naval Brass

Bronze Version - Bronze

Limited Edition: Timascus/MokuTi - A patented process of corrosion resistant, non-magnetic, lightweight titanium Damascus, without the disadvantages of steel Damascus.  Made from 2 or more different types of titanium alloy.  A very exotic material that can run $100+ per inch!  No two Timascus Fly Pry(TM) will be the same.  Very unique and one of a kind.  The photo below is of the first prototype.  It is very hard to photograph due to the fact that every angle gives a different color  and pattern reflection.  Final version will be satin polished which will give the best pattern/color combination.


2015 Timeline:

January: Workout Concept, Initial Prototypes - COMPLETED

February - Prototype Revisions, Testing, Refinement - COMPLETED

April - Material & Manufacturing Sourcing - COMPLETED

May - CAD Design, Logo Design, 2nd Prototype  - COMPLETED

June - Anodizing & Manufacturing Test Runs - COMPLETED

July - Launch Website, Facebook Page, Final Proto - COMPLETED

August: Campaign Launch - NOW LIVE!

September 2nd: Campaign Ends Early-September: Surveys Go Out For Options/Color Choices

Mid September: Release Funds

Mid-Late September: Order Material, Water Jet Cut Parts, Misc. Materials Ordered, Shipping Supplies, etc.

Early-Mid October: Receive All Parts and Start Production

Late October: Start Shipping First Orders

November: Shipment Of All Remaining Orders ----

Orders:

IMPORTANT:

Once the campaign is successfully funded you will be sent backer surveys that will ask you for which model, color, and finish you prefer.  Do not worry about picking those at this time.  Thanks again for your support! ---- Warranty: If you somehow manage to break, maul, or damage your Fly Pry(TM) just send it in and we will take care of it for you. If you're not completely satisfied with it within the first 30 days of using it, just send it back for a full refund. I want you to love my "On The Fly" creations and if you don't, I want you to at least love my customer service!

Final Words:

The Fly Pry's(TM) used in most of the video and campaign photos are just prototypes.  They've been abused, beaten, and tossed around, all in the name of testing. They were sacrificed in order to work out any potential issues during the different manufacturing stages.  Poor things have been through a heck of an ordeal just to bring you the perfect multi-tool. The final production version will be finished with deburred edges, acid etched for more even and vibrant colors, and just simply a nicer overall finish.  While they won't be as rough around the edges as their brothers, they will be just as bad a**.  I guarantee it!  ----

Questions/Comments?

If you have any questions about the Fly Pry(TM) or this campaign, feel free to drop me a quick note in the comments section below or email me directly at: sales@TheFlyPry.com. 

Please sign up for our Newsletter at: www.TheFlyPry.com so you can be involved in project updates and future On The Fly creations! 

Thank you for your support! Flavio Pellegrino 


The Fly Pry The Fly Pry! The Fly Pry - It's Cool! Copyright 2015 - Gear On The Fly, LLC The Fly Pry(TM) is Patent Pending and Trademarked by Gear On The Fly, LLC - All Rights Reserved


Risks and challenges

While unexpected issues can always arise, I consider myself well experienced in product development. The product that will be shipped out to you has already been prototyped with the same methods and vendors we intend to use for final production. This limits any unexpected delays in the release. My goal is to under promise and over deliver while guaranteeing that you will be pleased with your product!

Funding period

Jul 30 2015 - Sep 1 2015 (33 days)

story:
Last year I was fortunate enough to go on an amazing journey with VIDA Volunteer Travel in Guatemala. This March I will be returning to Central America to provide primary medical care to underserved communities in Nicaragua.

VIDA is a U.S. non-profit organization that provides continuous medical care to rural communities that would otherwise not have access to care. It is VIDA' s mission to positively impact the quality of life in underserved communities of Central America while offering volunteers a life changing experience.

A Very Brief Introduction to me, Shannon:

I graduated from Queen's University Belfast (UK) with a degree (BsC hons) in biomedical science in 2013. While at Queen's I completed my dissertation in acute myeloid leukemia at the QUB Centre for Cancer Research and Cell Biology. Shortly after, I attended Georgetown University for a post baccalaureate pre-medical program where I became involved with VIDA. I enjoy nerding out to science journals and being blonde. I hope to incorporate my love of research and traveling into a medical career.

Currently, in Nicaragua there are only 0.37 physicians per 1,000 persons. Moreover, the government can only afford to spend $335 per person on health care with little of this money going to remote communities. Your kind support and generous donations will help  fund my trip as well as provide medical supplies to communities that need it as well as the Nicaragua VIDA branch. There are a total of 16 volunteers headed to Nicaragua, and we are also looking for support for the team to help VIDA, a 501c3 charity, directly.  Last year we saw over 300 patients in Guatemala, please help us to treat Nicaragua!

Donations:

$10 buys a 2 month supply of children's vitamins

$15 buys lice treatment for a family of 4

$20 buys prenatal vitamins for an expectant mother.

$25 buys a box of sterile gloves

$30 buys a medical first aid kit

Medical donations will be accepted and greatly appreciated!

story:
Spinal Ride

Kris Sanford is going to ride his hand cycle from Idaho Falls to Huntington Beach (1100 miles) to break the world record, but more importantly to raise money for others in wheelchairs that can't afford therapy on their own. 

Kris has always been highly ambitious with a great deal of motivation. From a young age he has used those attributes in his favorite things; playing competitive sports and doing service for others. After breaking his neck in a roll over accident on April 25, 2009, he ended up a quadriplegic. For many, this injury would have a largely negative effect. However, Kris has seen it as an opportunity. It has given him several new sports in which to compete, as well as new ways he is able to do service. Kris put both of those aspects together when coming up with Spinal Ride!

Your contributions will not only help Kris complete his goal, they will go to helping many others! Therapy is ABSOLUTELY ESSENTIAL after a spinal cord injury. It helps them gain strength, independence, and more importantly confidence! If you want your dollar to be well spent, you have chosen the right place. Improving someones life is something you can be proud to contribute towards!!

Where Your Money is Going

This venture is going to cost in between $10 and $15 thousand depending on how long it takes. The goal is 11 days but it could take as long as 15. After funding the record breaking ride, every additional cent will be donated to Neuroworx! 

Neuroworx has set up a scholarship to help those who need therapy but cant afford it. The money raised will be put into that scholarship and be given out accordingly based on the Neuroworx financial scholarship application.

If the goal is not reached the money will be put towards the event and with any luck, sponsors will make up the rest.

The Impact

Almost everyone knows someone with a disability, whether it be mental or physical. It is common place for them to be low income simply because their disability makes it difficult or impossible for them to work. Purchasing an incentive package for Spinal Ride will help a tremendous amount for both getting me to Huntington Beach and help pay for therapy for someone who is in desperate need and cant afford it themselves

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can make a financial contribution. However, there are other ways you can help that are just as valuable!!!

  • Share this video with as many people as you can. Your shares may lea to several contributions.
  • Indiegogo share tools are a great way to share this message and cause!

story:
Outdoor adventures should not be complicated or limited by your surrounding environment. Most outdoor gear is built for a single purpose, which causes problems if you can’t find a flat piece of land to pitch your tent or two trees to hang your hammock between.

The Crua Hybrid offers the perfect solution and you'll never need to worry again about where to sleep. You can be confident your Crua companion will capably handle every situation you may face on your adventures.

 

 

  • A highly hydrophobic Rip-stop Nylon coats the tent protecting the user from the penetration of water.
  • The interior of the tent is also protected by a bug proof mesh to keep out unwanted intruders.
  • Lightweight and durable aircraft grade aluminium arch poles, equipped with a shock chord system. 
  • Ability to link up with other Hybrid tents universally, so you can start your own little tent city if you needed to.
  • Everything you need for a comfortable nights sleep while out on your adventure is already built-in to the Crua Hybrid, including an insulated air mattress and a tailored sleeping bag.
  • In hammock form the tent can hold a total weight of 285lbs
  • The Crua Hybrid comes equipped with two ventilation outlets which are strategically positioned to tackle the problem of condensation forming within the tent.
  • Total weight is approx. 7lbs - including tent/hammock, insulated air mattress, and sleeping bag.

 

The talk

 

 

 

 

 

The Crua Hybrid is constructed from highly water repellent Rip-stop Nylon with a hydrostatic head of 5000mm. This is sufficient to survive even the heaviest of rainfalls. 

It's not just another tent/hammock. The Crua Hybrid also includes a built-in sleeping bag and an insulated mattress for a comfortable nights sleep under the stars.

The bedroll packaging allows for easy setup.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Quality Matters

Here at Crua Outdoors we strive to produce high-quality products for our backers.

The backers of last year's successful campaign have received their rewards and are now contacting us to share their reviews. It's thrilling that they are all so positive!

Note: Packing

The tent hammock weighs 4.3lbs 
The sleeping bag weight 1.4lbs or 2.2lbs (there is a choice of bag, +1C or -7C Comfort Rating) 
The insulated air mattress weights 1.3lbs 
Total weight approx 7lbs

It all packs into 2 x attachable bags.

Bag 1 for the Tent/Hammock and mattress is approx 20 inch x 9 inch diameter 
Bag 2 for sleeping bag is approx 12 inches x 6 inch diameter 
These can be carried individually or clipped together 
Longest pole is 14 inches (approx 40 cm)

story:
Our story

  The inspiration for our backpack came from our own experiences. Being travelers ourselves, both for business and fun, we encountered a couple of issues with the backpacks we used. While designing our product we wanted to address those issues and that’s how we got the idea of “all-in-one” backpack. And by “all-in-one” we didn’t mean packing it with a bunch of advanced technological features. We just wanted to make it super functional and we believe we succeeded. Of course, functionality means different things for people and here we present our idea of it. We are sure though that there are a lot of people out there who share our view on it and who would love their backpack to be:

  • Stylish
  • Comfortable 
  • Organizational
  • Spacious
  • Lightweight 
  • Durable 
  • Water-resistant 

  If you are one of them, look no further! Our backpack combines all of these and so much more. Let’s dive into the world of a simply cool backpack. 

 Sleek design and top-quality materials allow you to wear NEWEEX backpack and still be rocking that fancy suit or jacket of yours!

Six contoured pads give extra support for your back, shoulders and neck and provide maximum ventilation - no more sweaty back! 

Over 20 cleverly-designed pockets and compartments will make you a master of organization! 

 

 

Steady and durable materials allow the backpack to hold its shape, yet it’s still lightweight. 

 

 USB charging port will keep your battery always full! (power bank is not included)

 Secret pocket for your valuable documents is easily accessible for you but not for a thief. 

Suction cups for your phone in case you need both hands free - coffee and a bagel, please!               

 Water-resistant fabric and seamless water-repellent YKK zippers will keep your electronics safe (we include rain cover for extra protection - those Thailand showers can be pretty rough :)

And so much more... 

 

 

 Whether you are backpacking in Yosemite, rushing to that big meeting or taking an unexpected weekend trip with friends, the NEWEEX backpack has a place for everything you'll need. Paired with a sleek laptop case and easy-to-use-and-store travel pouches, you'll have everything you need for every new experience.

 Neweex laptop bag and two packing cubes all work together to provide the optimal travel companion away from home or in the city.

 After two successful crowdfunding campaigns on Indiegogo & Kickstarter where we’d had supporters from more than 30 countries and great experience at CES 2019 we decided create new products and share it with more wonderful people who love unique and innovative things.

In the press

“Anyone searching for a multifunctional compact everyday backpack, combining both design and durability into a versatile gadget bag, may be worth giving the new Neweex backpack and laptop case further investigation.”  -Julian Horsey, Geeky-Gadgets.com 

"When i saw this backpack, i was completely seduced

If you wear NEWEEX backpack, you are ready to discover the world again!" 

Daniel Bohbot - Designer, The creator of the brand "Hale Bob"

_____________________________________________

 

 

Two colors will be available for order. Choose yours!

 

 

Please share our project on social networks

 

 

Subscribe to our newsletter

 

Creation and Manufacturing

 Support us on our journey and we shall support you on yours!!!   

 

Shipping & custom information 

  When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package. Every country has different customs policies. Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes. You will be responsible to pay customs duty.
              For international customers who are required to pay customs, you will receive an email or call from your local post office or local customs authorities. Once you make the payment to the customs broker your order will be processed for final delivery.

Warranty

  Love it or we'll buy it back from you! If you’re not 100% satisfied with the design or quality of our backpack, simply send it back for a full refund of the purchase price (Shipping and handling fees are non-refundable). We’re pretty sure though the NEWEEX backpack will make a great addition to your lifestyle.

Risks and challenges

Timing is the main challenge when it comes to making a new product. The good thing is it's not our first rodeo. We already ran and fulfilled another crowdfunding campaign so we have a good understanding of the process. In case any unforeseen issues come up, we promise to handle them with the utmost care and transparency. 
Thank you all for your support! It means the world to us!
story_txt:
Our story  The inspiration for our backpack came from our own experiences. Being travelers ourselves, both for business and fun, we encountered a couple of issues with the backpacks we used. While designing our product we wanted to address those issues and that’s how we got the idea of “all-in-one” backpack. And by “all-in-one” we didn’t mean packing it with a bunch of advanced technological features. We just wanted to make it super functional and we believe we succeeded. Of course, functionality means different things for people and here we present our idea of it. We are sure though that there are a lot of people out there who share our view on it and who would love their backpack to be:
Stylish
Comfortable 
Organizational
Spacious
Lightweight 
Durable 
Water-resistant 
  If you are one of them, look no further! Our backpack combines all of these and so much more. Let’s dive into the world of a simply cool backpack.  Sleek design and top-quality materials allow you to wear NEWEEX backpack and still be rocking that fancy suit or jacket of yours!Six contoured pads give extra support for your back, shoulders and neck and provide maximum ventilation - no more sweaty back! Over 20 cleverly-designed pockets and compartments will make you a master of organization!   Steady and durable materials allow the backpack to hold its shape, yet it’s still lightweight.   USB charging port will keep your battery always full! (power bank is not included) Secret pocket for your valuable documents is easily accessible for you but not for a thief. Suction cups for your phone in case you need both hands free - coffee and a bagel, please!                Water-resistant fabric and seamless water-repellent YKK zippers will keep your electronics safe (we include rain cover for extra protection - those Thailand showers can be pretty rough :)And so much more...    Whether you are backpacking in Yosemite, rushing to that big meeting or taking an unexpected weekend trip with friends, the NEWEEX backpack has a place for everything you'll need. Paired with a sleek laptop case and easy-to-use-and-store travel pouches, you'll have everything you need for every new experience. Neweex laptop bag and two packing cubes all work together to provide the optimal travel companion away from home or in the city. After two successful crowdfunding campaigns on Indiegogo & Kickstarter where we’d had supporters from more than 30 countries and great experience at CES 2019 we decided create new products and share it with more wonderful people who love unique and innovative things.In the press“Anyone searching for a multifunctional compact everyday backpack, combining both design and durability into a versatile gadget bag, may be worth giving the new Neweex backpack and laptop case further investigation.”  -Julian Horsey, Geeky-Gadgets.com "When i saw this backpack, i was completely seducedIf you wear NEWEEX backpack, you are ready to discover the world again!" Daniel Bohbot - Designer, The creator of the brand "Hale Bob"_____________________________________________  Two colors will be available for order. Choose yours!  Please share our project on social networks  Subscribe to our newsletter Creation and Manufacturing Support us on our journey and we shall support you on yours!!!    Shipping & custom information   When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package. Every country has different customs policies. Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes. You will be responsible to pay customs duty.              For international customers who are required to pay customs, you will receive an email or call from your local post office or local customs authorities. Once you make the payment to the customs broker your order will be processed for final delivery.Warranty  Love it or we'll buy it back from you! If you’re not 100% satisfied with the design or quality of our backpack, simply send it back for a full refund of the purchase price (Shipping and handling fees are non-refundable). We’re pretty sure though the NEWEEX backpack will make a great addition to your lifestyle.Risks and challengesTiming is the main challenge when it comes to making a new product. The good thing is it's not our first rodeo. We already ran and fulfilled another crowdfunding campaign so we have a good understanding of the process. In case any unforeseen issues come up, we promise to handle them with the utmost care and transparency. Thank you all for your support! It means the world to us!

story:
Our Story

Hi, I am Shayne Wermers and I have been given the wonderful opportunity to travel to Kenya this winter break. This past year has been absolutely amazing in the way that God has been working in my life and others around me. The ministry that I've been working with over these past few years is Young Life where I am a leader. I get the privilege to spend time with and invest in these high school kids lives. It has been just amazing to watch these kids grow so much in their faith. I have always had the desire to travel over seas and experience the world, but I was never ready. God has placed it on my heart that this is something that I shall pursue and honor him. 


The Impact 

In Kenya we will be working primarily with orphans, the local church and doing some evangelism. This is a great chance to build friendships and love on others for who they are. Allowing the to show their culture and experience they way the live.  


What We Need & What You Get

It will cost 3,000 and I know that this is something that God has placed on my heart and He has specific people laid out to  allow me to pour into the lives of so many in Kenya. Anything helps so if you feel lead to please contribute what you can. The whole 3000 dollars will be covering the full cost of the trip. I hope through this fundraiser to raise 500$ and get that much closer to my goal.  Thank you for your support. 



Other Ways You Can Help

I will also be sending out letters too! So if you would like me to send you one E-mail me at Swermers@live.com

story:
FLASH CAMPAIGN!!!

HELP GET JACK A NEW BIKE BY TOMORROW!!!

Jackson was recently in a bike accident. Thankfully he walked away from the crash, but the bike was totaled. He had some cash saved, so he was able to get a new bike from Public bikes pretty much immediately.


Tonight he left the house to ride to a friend's house (he was riding to Ed and Ryan's to watch Game of Thrones!) to find his bike STOLEN! His new bike! 


RUDE.


The thing is, Jackson uses his bike to get to his job at the Shanti Project, which is an amazing non-profit that provides services and support for folks who are HIV positive as well as those suffering from breast cancer. As part of his job, he travels to meet people where they are for one-on-one meetings. It's crucial for him to have his mobility so that he can go to these counseling meetings, to group meetings, as well as other organizational functions during his day.


Jackson directly helps a lot of people during his work week, and his bike is the main way he can get to his meetings with folks with the highest possible efficiency. 


My sense is that if we all pitch in a few bucks we can help Jack get a new bike in the early part of this week. 


Every little buck counts. Please pass on the word! Thanks so much y'all!

story:
|| In hopes of funding this mindful journey to the North I will be selling my photography to help with expenses || 

In July 2015 I will be volunteering for a month at a Wellness Center at Lake Orta, Italy (Northern Tuscany). I am hoping to expand my knowledge of meditation, yoga, and living in the present. Days will be spent helping guests around the center, cleaning, organizing, and (hopefully) sitting in on some seminars.


From Italy I will then fly to Iceland to drive around and photograph this beautiful island (a forever dream of mine). After this adventure - I will embark to a small farm outside of Reykjavik to volunteer for a few weeks planting trees, harvesting honey, and distilling herbs. 

The goal of this trip is to become a better, more mindful, and compassionate person. Last summer I moved abroad, broke my leg volunteering in Poland, & started my new life teaching in Prague.  From surgeries, to job interviews, to trying to have a social life - I felt defeated to say the least. What doesn't kill us makes us stronger, right? To lift myself out of my overwhelming thoughts - I started reading a book titled "The Power of Now - The Spiritual guide to Enlightenment" By Eckhart Tolle. I was introduced to a topic (strangely) avoided during my four years getting my Bachelor's in Psychology. Mindfulness - to appreciate life this present moment. That is my goal. And that is why I'm here. 

Unfortunately, some life experiences need start up funds (flights, food, etc)- so I thought to mix my love of Psychology and photography and offer to sell my prints and drawings. I will be offering any of my photographs in several sizes with other goodies to go along. Thank you for your kindness and for helping me start this mindful journey to the North. 


some places to find my work:
photography
blog  
         human nature
         in the mountains
         on the road
         film
instagram: emlyrse ||  e.rosebee@gmail.com
OR
if you'd like to see more - feel free to send me an email with a request 
& find some of my drawings below  :) :)

story:
Five days until I leave for Canada and 2700 mile mountain bike race

Please Send me your hard earned cash and I'll whittle myself down to skin and bone riding 2745 miles in a little over two weeks. I'm flying to Canada the ninth of June  depending on funding.

This Is my dream ride!, Help me get there and on time, and if you cant donate now you can donate while I'm riding. Donations are deposited into my papal account.  I am also looking for a couple of volunteers to send overnight packages to postal offices along the route. I need four shipments.

Here's what I need. If you have any of this stuff or want to get me a ticket to ticket to Calgary, Canada with bike shipping. Please contact me directly.

 Registration fee for online live gps tracking updates, Gps, Maps, Tires, Sealant, 650 Caffeinated sports bars. 2 kilograms of electrolyte powder, five tubes of sun tan lotion, used swimmers wetsuit, camera, 4 tubes tubes of hydro-cortisone cream, Iodine tablets, emergency space blanker, winter gloves, wool sweater, two sheets of carbon fiber panel for wheel enclosure, emergency space blanket, ultra light camping pad, four overnight boxes shipped for back country resupply and If I don't get eaten, frozen, struck by lightning or drown in a flash flood, a ticket home.

Thanks for your love and support! I'm terrified!

story:
The Go Happy Travel Tray 

Imagine a flight with: 1) no more toys and food falling on yucky airplane floors 2) less screen time meltdowns 3) more creativity! 

The Go Happy Travel Tray also offers space to reconnect and engage with our kids while traveling, stuff that makes everyone feel good!

As a mom with four kids, traveling can be quite an event for our family! With the Go Happy Travel Tray we have a clean and fun surface our kids (ages 1-10) use to eat, play, color, and doodle. The tray has made traveling so much easier for us and we have more time to enjoy each other!​

Bria, SUPER MOM

 

What You Get 

  • The Go Happy Travel Tray is made from kid safe ABS plastic 

  • Functions as a whiteboard without the removable, food safe silicone liner

  • Has a grippy bottom surface and elastic clip attachment system to keep it from sliding on hard surfaces and secure on airplane and train tray tables

The Story

Created by a mom, especially for moms! And kids and dads too, of course — the Go Happy Travel Tray is great for everyone when on the go! It makes travel easier and way more fun!

Nicole, a San Francisco based mom who loves to travel with her kids, decided to develop the Go Happy Travel Tray after years of picking up toys and food off yucky yucky airplane floors. Inspired by her passion for making life easier and more fun, her vision of a simple white tray that provides a clean, contained, creative space for her kids to play, color, and eat while traveling has come to life.

 

What We Need 

We need funding — a surprising amount! It actually costs a lot to produce a beautifully designed, durable, functional, and kid safe travel tray.

We are excited to move forward and start manufacturing to meet our market launch date of June 2018. Getting these trays in your hands for summer travel is our goal!

$25,000 would be a great start to kick of the next stage of this journey!

All funds raised during this campaign will fund the tooling (building the molds to build the tray) and manufacturing process. We are lined up to begin tooling this December and expect to deliver pre-orders of the Go Happy Travel Tray by early June 2018.

 

How Far We Have Come

We have worked hard to get the Go Happy Travel Tray to this stage. We have received great feedback from parents and kids who have used various prototypes on flights and in other environments. The tray really does make travel easier and more fun!

We flew from Oakland to Denver and played the whole way — the iPad never came out. We tested the ducktaped prototype version and it worked great! I intentionally brought toys I'd never take on a plane otherwise, and we had a blast! We played with a spinning top, Wiki Stix, crayons and markers, wind-up toys and a game with lots of small pieces. Nothing fell on the floor and my son honestly didn't realize it was time to land because he was so engaged in play. The tray works and I would absolutely use it again. We'd love to fly (and play!) with the final product.

Suzanna, mom of a traveling 4-year-old

 

Design Process - Let's Take a Peek

Working with Stellar Design to design the Go Happy Travel Tray was fun and challenging. We decided on the fixed border and removable elastic clip attachment system after months of brainstorming and testing lots of mock ups.

Brainstorming and testing folding hinge options presented much more of a challenge. After months of back and forth, Nicole and Stellar Design looked at mechanical engineering pros and cons for 2 very different paths. With the help of APROE, an awesome prototype team in San Francisco, they weighed many factors and made the decision keep things simple and drop the hinge feature. Nicole decided to make the tray slightly smaller so it could be stowed easily without folding, but still provide enough surface area for play and meal space.

 

Nicole is mindful of materials as well. She seeks to source the best materials possible while keeping costs in mind. Nicole is passionate about creating a beautiful, durable, kid safe, and functional product at a price point that makes it accessible.

Challenges & Next Steps

WE ARE READY TO PRODUCE THIS TRAY!

We have a great relationship with our manufacturer and are working with a strong team of folks experienced in manufacturing and product launch to help us address the following potential challenges/set backs we could face between now and the product launch:

1) DFM (Design for Manufacturing) revisions

2) Tooling modifications between trial shots

3) Refining the color, material and finish for the part assembly and production

4) Material and final assembly testing (drop, scratch, humidity/ environmental)

5) Approving final production parts

6) Packaging revisions and possible delays

 

GO HAPPY TRAVEL TRAY TIMELINE

We are on track to deliver the Go Happy Travel Tray by early June 2018 — just in time for summer travel!

Please help us make this happen!

Thank you for taking time to learn about and back the Go Happy Travel Tray!

We really appreciate your support!!

 

Spread the Word — Sharing is FUN!

Please share and spread the word with your friends, family, and fellow parents, or be the coolest aunt, uncle, sister, brother, or friend by gifting the Go Happy Travel Tray to someone you love. 

Thanks for supporting Go Happy Kids and helping make travel easier and more fun for parents and kids!

Think simple & go happy!

 

Special Thanks to AN AWESOME CREW!! 

Stellar Design \ Dominic Peralta for Dominic's enthusiasm and hard work, industrial design expertise and help designing the Go Happy Kids Travel Tray, branding collaboration and design support around company name and logo, DFM support, and his team’s enthusiastic and helpful support during all aspects of the design process and Indiegogo campaign set up.

The Carbon Five team \ Suzanna Smith for taking on and enthusiastically supporting Go Happy Kids, and Suzanna’s phenomenal design, branding, and content skills that helped bring the Go Happy Kids website and brand to life. 

Amphibian \ Jackie Dansk for Jackie and her team’s responsiveness, patience, and invaluable operations and manufacturing support.

APROE \ Mose & Andrew for their responsiveness and help working through the Go Happy Travel Tray’s mechanical engineering challenges, and providing feedback needed to make critical functionality/design decisions.

Deeksha Prakash Photography for sharing her talented, fun, amazing self to capture the beautiful Go Happy Kids photos and spirit.

Svetlana Saitsky, Kim Huynh, Eva Frye for putting together our story and creating our awesome video.

Erin Banks PR \ Erin Banks for Erin's patience, responsiveness, and collaboration around all things social media for Go Happy Kids!

 

Additional Information

SHIPPING

We currently ship to: USA, UK, some EU countries (please inquire), Canada

We are working on adding more countries to the list

DISTRIBUTORS AND WHOLESALERS

If you are interested in distributing or buying The Go Happy Travel Tray in bulk, please get in touch with Nicole at nicole@gohappykids.com.

FAQ

Where can you buy The Go Happy Tray?   

You can pre-order The Go Happy Travel Tray here on Indiegogo. During the funding campaign, go to the Perk of your preference in the right hand column and click on the amount you would like to contribute.  

What material is it made of?  

The Go Happy Travel Tray is made with food safe and kid safe ABS plastic, kid and food safe silicone liner, and kid safe grippy bottom surface to prevent sliding on plane and train trays.

Is it food safe?  

Yes, the Go Happy Travel Tray is food safe.

Will there be more colors in the future?  

Possibly, if we get the support we need to lift this version off the ground :)

When do you ship?

Pre-ordered trays will be shipped mid-May for scheduled delivery by June 2018.

How much is the retail price?

Retail prices will be US $39.50 but may be subject to changes.

How will The Go Happy Tray be shipped?   

The Go Happy Travel Tray will be shipped in a cardboard box with secure packaging inside to protect it.

Can I get a refund?  

For a refund please see following articles:

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

Can I be a reseller of The Go Happy Tray?  

Yes, contact us at nicole@gohappykids.com and let’s chat!

If I have any further questions can I contact you?  

Write us at nicole@gohappykids.com and we’ll be happy to answer all your questions.  

FAQ regarding claiming perks

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

Patent information

Design patent TBD - filing soon!

Use of other brands in this campaign

ZenZoi Dry Erase Markers For Kids (Whiteboard Erasable Marker Pens Set) does not sponsor, authorize, or endorse this website or product.

Think simple & go happy!
 
Special Thanks to AN AWESOME CREW!! 

Stellar Design \ Dominic Peralta for Dominic's enthusiasm and hard work, industrial design expertise and help designing the Go Happy Kids Travel Tray, branding collaboration and design support around company name and logo, DFM support, and his team’s enthusiastic and helpful support during all aspects of the design process and Indiegogo campaign set up.

The Carbon Five team \ Suzanna Smith for taking on and enthusiastically supporting Go Happy Kids, and Suzanna’s phenomenal design, branding, and content skills that helped bring the Go Happy Kids website and brand to life. 

Amphibian \ Jackie Dansk for Jackie and her team’s responsiveness, patience, and invaluable operations and manufacturing support.

APROE \ Mose & Andrew for their responsiveness and help working through the Go Happy Travel Tray’s mechanical engineering challenges, and providing feedback needed to make critical functionality/design decisions.
Deeksha Prakash Photography for sharing her talented, fun, amazing self to capture the beautiful Go Happy Kids photos and spirit.
Svetlana Saitsky, Kim Huynh, Eva Frye for putting together our story and creating our awesome video.
Erin Banks PR \ Erin Banks for Erin's patience, responsiveness, and collaboration around all things social media for Go Happy Kids!
 
Additional Information
SHIPPING
We currently ship to: USA, UK, some EU countries (please inquire), Canada
We are working on adding more countries to the list
DISTRIBUTORS AND WHOLESALERS
If you are interested in distributing or buying The Go Happy Travel Tray in bulk, please get in touch with Nicole at nicole@gohappykids.com.
FAQ
Where can you buy The Go Happy Tray?   
You can pre-order The Go Happy Travel Tray here on Indiegogo. During the funding campaign, go to the Perk of your preference in the right hand column and click on the amount you would like to contribute.  
What material is it made of?  
The Go Happy Travel Tray is made with food safe and kid safe ABS plastic, kid and food safe silicone liner, and kid safe grippy bottom surface to prevent sliding on plane and train trays.
Is it food safe?  
Yes, the Go Happy Travel Tray is food safe.
Will there be more colors in the future?  
Possibly, if we get the support we need to lift this version off the ground :)
When do you ship?
Pre-ordered trays will be shipped mid-May for scheduled delivery by June 2018.
How much is the retail price?
Retail prices will be US $39.50 but may be subject to changes.
How will The Go Happy Tray be shipped?   
The Go Happy Travel Tray will be shipped in a cardboard box with secure packaging inside to protect it.
Can I get a refund?  
For a refund please see following articles:
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...
Can I be a reseller of The Go Happy Tray?  
Yes, contact us at nicole@gohappykids.com and let’s chat!
If I have any further questions can I contact you?  
Write us at nicole@gohappykids.com and we’ll be happy to answer all your questions.  
FAQ regarding claiming perks
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...
Patent information
Design patent TBD - filing soon!
Use of other brands in this campaign
ZenZoi Dry Erase Markers For Kids (Whiteboard Erasable Marker Pens Set) does not sponsor, authorize, or endorse this website or product.

story:
AWEH!

We are the Aweh Backpackers in Durban, South Africa. A small friendly business with the emphasis on a family-vibe. But sadly we have to move our Backpackers to a new location. This time we don´t want to rent. We want a place we can call ours, without the fear of losing it after a few years due to rental agreements.

We are going to create a Backpackers with a friendly atmosphere and beautiful scenery.

For the last year, hundreds of tourists made their own contribution towards Aweh Backpackers. In the form of artworks, as well as stories. We don’t want to lose it, as the memories and the people are the heart and soul of Aweh.

It is our home. We need to find a way to keep Aweh alive.

 

Our Project

We are looking at houses in the price range of $175 000 (South African property is amazingly cheap in comparison). In order to qualify for a bond, we have to put down $60 000 for our dream house in an even better location in town. This is our goal for this campaign.

Whatever amount we raise will go as a down payment to a property. If we don´t reach our goal, we would look at options of selling equity to would-be investors.


What we truly believe, is that the best gift we can give to anyone who is willing to help us, is an experience rather than material things. We want you to experience South Africa with its amazing sights.

 

You always wanted to travel through South Africa? Or just need a break from the hard working life? Come and be part of our family!

 

Since the start of our business last year, we have managed to show positive figures - and the business is still growing.

Once we have the bond, we won´t have a problem paying it off every month, since we have a continuous income to maintain the house.

It is only the startup costs, which we are struggling with.

 

NO MONEY? NO PROBLEM

We know what it´s like not to have money to spare. And that is ok. You can help us by sharing our project! Get the word out. And facebook is just a few clicks away. If you like our vibe and what we have to present, give your friends the chance to come visit Aweh.

Let´s make this work, and together we can be truly Aweh! :)

story:
Want to save time and money on your next travel? Holipass is the answer:

 

Test our prices - Click here! 

 

 

We are disrupting the travel industry:

Why introduce yet another travel-booking site? 

Because we are doing what nobody else is doing in spite of the fact that the demand is obvious:

We are making hotels, flights, rental cars, cruises and leisure activities available at no-nonsense cost price:

Holipass is supplied by exactly the same hotel and flight suppliers as all the other booking sites - the difference is that Holipass does not add any mark up on any prices; Holipass will pass on the hotel rooms and the flights to the consumer at exactly the same price that Holipass shall pay to its supplier.

You may expect that this will save up to 90% of the prices that you would otherwise be asked to pay for the same hotel room or the same seat on the same airliner.

Simply subscribe to Holipass - it's only 20 EURO per month with a 12 months subscription term - and you are ready to book. There is nothing hidden behind any curtain: You can surf the Holipass site and fill your basket before you decide to subscribe. Accordingly, you will know for a fact and in advance whether your very first booking will actually result in you saving money even with the Holipass subscription fee taking into consideration.

For almost each and every household and each and every single traveller this concept will make perfect sense: The only way to waste money on a Holipass subscription is if you decide to stay at home for the entire year!

An average subscriber may expect to face the difficult challenge of having to travel twice as much as normally in order to spend his/her normal travel budget - or negotiate this new first world problem of yours by treating yourself with 5 star hotels in stead of the mediocre ones - or maybe you simply prefer to have more spending money in your pocket to satisfy your hunger for shopping or have champagne with your lobster in stead of plain chardonnay?

If you are ready to contribute and help us making your life so much better, then we will treat you with up to 75 % discount on your subscription fee. Check out the pledges on the right side of your screen.

There are no hidden catch - no strings attached !

 

 

Mobile-optimised businesses are ahead

The founders of Holipass have a broad knowledge within IT and will ensure to choose a responsive booking system and website builder. This will definitely include a mobile-optimised template with great UX that loads quickly.

• Mobile bookings in travel have grown by 1700% between 2011 and 2015, moving from 1% to 18% of online revenues (Frederic Gonzalo, 2016)

• 45% of connected travellers use their smartphone to book travel activities pre- trip (TripBarometer, 2015)

• 88% of travellers book their trip on a mobile device (TripBarometer, 2015)

• Nearly 50% of users have visited TripAdvisor via tablet and phone, and the company continues to see an industry rise in engagement on mobile devices (TripAdvisor, 2015)

• Between 2013 and 2017, mobile phone penetration will rise from 61.1% to 69.4%of the global population (eMarketer, 2014)

• Asian travellers are least likely to use oﬄine methods to book accommodation, US, UK and Italian travellers stand out as online booking channel users, and the Chinese are most likely to make bookings via mobile apps (TripBarometer, 2015).

 

 

Win-win situation

There seems to be a lot of travel companies offering flights, hotels, activities and experiences to business and private travellers! - then why Holipass? Because we want to disrupt the old industry and ensuring you the flexibility that is needed in the planning of your private and business life without increasing the cost. Our profit lies within providing you the best offers, that's a win-win!

 

 

We’re working around the clock to make Holipass the ultimate subscription based service for travellers all over the world. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact us.

 

Risks and challenges

Our team is comprised of seasoned entrepreneurs, business leaders, law firm experience, professional board experience, business developers, customer relation experts, business consultants, project and program management and many of these with broad international experience.

We all know that digital platforms are to be preferred but also subject to failure when not developed, build and tested properly. We have chosen one of the absolute best partners on the market and have spend several months in testing the platform, making sure that we can acutally deliver what we promise, in a easy and intuitive way.

The competitive hotel booking platforms out there are huge, experienced and well known. Will people even notice a new small player on the market? - we have asked ourself this question a lot of times and the answer is YES! Current platforms all have the same business model, not bringing any new value to the end users. We want to disprupt that, and with our highly functional platform, we are absolutely sure that we can bring this value to the market. We already now have a lot of development ideas still having in mind, that we want to KEEP IT SIMPLE! Among the co-owners of Holipass we have documented connections to more than 400 business world wide, ready to start the dialogue for selling this wonderful product.

story:
Wireless also means safe! Ultrasonic washers need to be submerged in water to work properly, but most current ultrasonic washers are wired. It’s very dangerous to soak a wired electronic device in water - making these washers potentially hazardous. 

OmiSonic is completely wireless and IPX8 waterproof - meaning you can wash without worry or hazard! 

UltraSonic Cleaning Technology

OmiSonic uses ultrasonic cleaning technology to wash your items. The device generates ultrasonic waves that create thousands of microscopic bubbles in the water. These bubbles float to your item and implode, forming a vacuum that SUCKS out dirt, particles, and bacteria lodged in your clothing, fruits, jewelry, or items.

Because the bubbles are microscopic in size, they have the ability to pull out particles that are deeply lodged in your item. The bubble can go into corners, cracks, and crevices previously unreachable, and the force of the vacuum is powerful enough to dislodge the particles stuck in there.

 

 

When you have thousands on thousands of these micro-cleaning bubbles floating all around your cleaning load, you’ll be sure to get the deepest clean EVER. It’s like having an army of microscopic cleaners go into the deepest corners of your laundry and flushing out every nanometer of debris and bacteria stuck in there.

As a result, OmiSonic’s ultrasonic cleaning technology will wash your clothes, fruits, vegetables, and jewelry deeper, cleaner, and much more effectively than traditional washing methods. 

 

True Wireless Cleaning

OmiSonic is battery powered. This means you don’t need an outlet to have it work!

Take it with you to the remotest of areas and have ultrasonic cleaning ready at hand. 

 

Whether you’re backpacking in the remote reaches of the country or polishing your silverware at home, OmiSonic will make sure you can clean your items quick, easy, and hassle-free. 

 

 

Our app uses bluetooth to connect your phone with the device (no service required). We spent countless hours developing and refining it to be absolutely amazing. 

 

Once finished with the calculations, it will suggest the best washing time, temperature, and amount of detergent needed for the wash - providing the best result every time!

 

Simple Stains to Full Loads

OmiSonic is powerful in quality and quantity. You can wash up to 2kg (~4.4 lbs) per load effectively! 

A 2kg (~4.4lb) load will take around 120 minutes (one full charge) of wash time, whereas a 0.5kg (~1 lb) load will only take about 30 minutes (four loads from one charge).

Wash Any Material

No matter if it’s cotton, polyester, wool, or silk - OmiSonic will get the dirt and stains out of your clothes with ZERO DAMAGE, ZERO SHRINKING, and ZERO COLOR BLEEDING. Wash all your clothing and items in peace! 

Remove Any Stain

Whether it’s mud, wine, soy sauce, oil or blood* - OmiSonic will remove it all! Because OmiSonic cleans at a microscopic level, it can remove even the toughest stains from your clothes and fabrics.

Clean Your Food

Whether you’re trying to remove the dirt in your lettuce or pesticides from your grapes, OmiSonic will wash it all quick, easy, and effectively! 

 

OmiSonic will give you peace of mind about your fruits & vegetables without the hassle. Don’t spend so much time cleaning every ridge and each individual grape - OmiSonic will take care of it for you and make sure every bite you take will be chemical and dirt-free!

 

 

Polish Your Precious Items

Tired of polishing all your silverware & jewelry by hand? OmiSonic’s got you covered. The ultrasonic bubbles will attack the tarnish, rust, and oil on all your precious items and remove them.

From silverware to rings and even watches, OmiSonic will break off the tarnish and get your precious metals shining like new again. No more vinegar sprays and alcohol wipes!

Purify Your Personal Hygiene Tools

Did you know - you can find fecal matter on your toothbrush? That’s right! You might be brushing your teeth with pieces of poop! Not to mention your makeup brush, razor, and other personal hygiene tools you keep in the bathroom.

With OmiSonic, you can make sure all the unwanted bacteria and particles on your brushes, razors, and hygiene tools are washed off before you use them. It’s time you cleaned the things that clean you. 

Sanitize Your Daily Items

When was the last time you cleaned your phone case? How about your keys, backpack or reusable grocery bag? With OmiSonic, you can clean out the years of dirt, sweat, and bacteria that’s likely accumulated on those items. Get into the pores of your daily used items and give them a deep cleansing.

Disinfect Toys & Baby Items

Ever think about what might be growing on/in your child’s toys or baby’s bottle? Well, with OmiSonic, you don’t have to. Clean out all the potential dangers from your kid’s favorite toy(s) and all the things your baby puts her mouth to. 

The World’s Smallest Washing Machine 

OmiSonic is truly the world’s smallest washing machine. Fit the entire device in your pocket and have it ready to go at any notice. You’ll be able to wash clothes, food, silverware, jewelry and more whenever, wherever you need to. It’s like carrying a washing machine with you wherever you go - but without the weight, noise, or hassle!

 

Travel Lighter & Farther

Never overpack again. With OmiSonic, packing for travel and camping just got lighter and easier. Because you can wash practically anywhere, you don’t need to bring as much clothes and definitely don’t need any emergency outfits. 

Make extra room in your bag, decrease your carry weight by half, and go the extra mile!

OmiSonic isn’t just presenting the washing machine of the future - we’re also introducing the detergent of the future. Our environmentally friendly, package-free paper detergent dissolves into the sink or bucket with the OmiSonic device to give an extra punch to the cleaning power. 

 

Get the toughest stains and oils out of your clothes and see stunning results like never before!

Save Water

OmiSonic uses 15x LESS water than a traditional washing machine for a much more powerful and gentler deep clean! Plus, it scales much better to your load size. If you’re just washing one shirt, you only need enough water for that one shirt. No need to wash an entire load because of a simple stain.

Conserve water and adopt a more sustainable way to wash!

Save Energy

In addition to saving water, OmiSonic uses 40x LESS energy than a traditional washing machine! That not only means you’ll be saving on your electric bill - you’ll be decreasing your carbon footprint as well! Less energy means less CO2 produced to generate electricity. 

 

Save the planet while saving money!

OmiSonic is changing washing and cleaning forever. No more wasting water or energy. No more being tied down by wires. No more scrubbing and soaking. Get ultra-clean, microscopically-scrubbed results with everything you wash - and do it ANYWHERE.

This is the future of cleaning. 

OmiSonic is a team of passionate and creative people sharing a love for technology and our natural environments. We're artists, dreamers, experienced designers and industry engineers. We want to make the world a better place through innovation, creativity, and technology.

Founders David Hsu and Anthony Lee always felt that we use too much water and energy in modern life, especially in a time when both are becoming increasingly scarce and costly for the Earth. Moreover, cleaning appliances such as dishwashers and washing machines take up a ton of space just to do a single task. David and Anthony felt there had to be a better way to clean more with less.

After extensive research and experimentation, David and Anthony saw the power of ultrasonic cleaning and believed it was the technology that would change everything. 

12 months later, OmiSonic was born! The device is compact, efficient and removes bacteria. It cleans everything from fruit to jewelry with just a little bit of power and water. Combined with our eco-friendly paper soap, it can even remove stubborn stains on fabrics. 

Not only does it save water and decrease carbon emissions on a consumer level, OmiSonic's manufacturing process creates only a small fraction of carbon footprint compared to other home appliances. 

OmiSonic will wash more, while costing less to the Earth and your pocket!

No more being tied down by wires. No more scrubbing and soaking. Get ultra-clean, microscopically-scrubbed results with everything you wash - and do it ANYWHERE.This is the future of cleaning. Protective Carrying Case
 
OmiSonic is a team of passionate and creative people sharing a love for technology and our natural environments. We're artists, dreamers, experienced designers and industry engineers. We want to make the world a better place through innovation, creativity, and technology.Founders David Hsu and Anthony Lee always felt that we use too much water and energy in modern life, especially in a time when both are becoming increasingly scarce and costly for the Earth. Moreover, cleaning appliances such as dishwashers and washing machines take up a ton of space just to do a single task. David and Anthony felt there had to be a better way to clean more with less.After extensive research and experimentation, David and Anthony saw the power of ultrasonic cleaning and believed it was the technology that would change everything. 12 months later, OmiSonic was born! The device is compact, efficient and removes bacteria. It cleans everything from fruit to jewelry with just a little bit of power and water. Combined with our eco-friendly paper soap, it can even remove stubborn stains on fabrics. Not only does it save water and decrease carbon emissions on a consumer level, OmiSonic's manufacturing process creates only a small fraction of carbon footprint compared to other home appliances. OmiSonic will wash more, while costing less to the Earth and your pocket!

story:
THE STORY BEHIND

We are a team of urban professionals from Hamburg, Germany from STUDIO DESSAU, a small design studio with many years of experience in the leather and bag industry.

As designers, we were in need of a more functional work bag; therefore, we created THE WINGCASE, the perfect work + overnight bag for others like us. If you share the same belief that a bag should feature a clean design, premium quality, unique functionality for work and life, this is the perfect bag for you.

This project was created to offer customers a premium product featuring unique and smart functionality at a reasonable price. With your generous help, we can meet the minimum order quantity to bring THE WINGCASE to life.

Thank you so much for your support! Work smart and live easy with THE WINGCASE!

 

WHY THE WINGCASE?

  • Save time and avoid the frantic feeling of searching through your briefcase. Use one hand to quickly spread the wings of your WINGCASE in a second, when standing in line at the airport, riding your bike, driving your car or during a meeting with a business partner.
     
  • Use only one bag instead of two. Take out the middle compartment and THE WINGCASE becomes the perfect overnight bag for a short business trip or night at your friend's. Put larger items or your neatly ironed shirt in your WINGCASE by opening the larger of the two wings completely and detaching the side panels. Work smart, live easy.
     
  • Never run out of battery again. Charge and use your smartphone / tablet where ever you want, when ever you want. It makes work and life easier so you can focus on doing your job and enjoying your free time, THE WINGCASE takes care of the rest.

 

 

THE EASY AND FAST ACCESS SYSTEM

 
 

2-IN-1:  BRIEFCASE + OVERNIGHT BAG

Take out the middle laptop compartment and THE WINGCASE becomes the perfect overnight bag for a short business trip or night at your friend’s.

 

 

 

THE MAIN FEATURES

 

 

  • Avoid frantic feeling of searching through your briefcase
  • Use one hand to quickly spread the wings of your WINGCASE in a second

 

  • Safely hold your laptop in THE WINGCASE’s protected 15-inch laptop compartment
  • Simply remove the detachable compartment to transform THE WINGCASE into a “mono-capacity” case

 

  • Grab items in your WINGCASE – don’t search for them – with the simple turn of a clasp on the wings
  • Smartly designed pockets and compartments inside hold anything from mobile devices to portfolios

 

  • Take out the middle compartment and THE WINGCASE becomes the perfect overnight bag for a short business trip or night at your friend’s
  • Put larger items in your WINGCASE by opening on of the two wings completely and detaching the side panels

 

  • It is not indispensable, but useful. Always there when you need it
  • Open a bottle, tighten that lose screw on your bike or cut open a parcel

 

  • Keep your smartphone charged by plugging it into the external USB port
  • Continue calling, surfing, texting

 

  • The internal power bank charges your phone inside THE WINGCASE
  • Use it to power your tablet and other devices, too

 

  • Secure your belongings with a simple closure system inside your WINGCASE
  • No visible lock on the outside makes a smarter solution

 

  • Find an extra pocket for your tablet and valuables in your laptop compartment
  • Protect everything with a special combination lock

 

  • Attach your WINGCASE to your luggage by slipping it over the handles
  • Travelling is much easier when you have free hands

 

  • Enjoy THE WINGCASE’s real leather (cow hide) with the durability and style of a premium high quality briefcase
  • The surface is finished with a special print to avoid scratches, a protective coating makes the it resistant against water and spots
  • High performing materials like this, Carbon and more are applied to get the perfect result

 

  • Each wing features a carbon fiber frame that is resistant, yet lightweight
  • Yes, it is the stuff race car chassis are made of

 

 

On a business or private trip by plane? You can easily access things like your ID, ticket, glasses, wallet and mobile phone.

 

Riding your bike? Get access to your shades, lock, keys.. in a second.

 

Low battery? Use the external USB charging port of your WINGCASE. It is that easy.

 

Grab your money in a second.

 

 

THE MATCHING ACCESSORIES

 

Small, handy, classy. For those who believe less is more. And it fits perfectly into your WINGCASE, too.

Carry your documents, business cards, pen….

 … and a 13-inch laptop.

 
 
 

Your companion for an overnight stay.

 Open it from the top side and you get access to all your stuff.

Open it from the bottom side and only your quart-sized / 1 liter resealable bag for liquids is shown (according to TSA Transportation Security Administration) and can be taken out at the airport security checkpoint.

Work smart and live easy - even at the security check.

 
 

The matching shoulder strap comes with a pouch to store it neetly in your WINGCASE when you do not use it.

 

THE DIMENSIONS

 

 

THE REWARDS

THE CITY

 

THE WINGCASE TEAM
